translation.en: In February, Hassans administration lifted bans on four media outlets: Mseto, Mawio, Mwanahalisi and Tanzania Daima.
translation.xho: NgoFebruwari, ulawulo lukaHassan lususe ukuvalwa kwemithombo yeendaba ezine: iMseto, iMawio, iMwanahalisi kunye neTanzania Daima.

translation.en: They  had been shuttered for offenses related to their coverage of alleged corruption, according to Amnesty International.
translation.xho: Babevalelwe ngenxa yezityholo zorhwaphilizo, ngokutsho kweAmnesty International.

translation.en: And Hassan has instructed the Ministry of Information, Communication and Information Technology to work with media stakeholders and others on reviewing laws and possibly loosening restrictions.
translation.xho: Kwaye u-Hassan uye wayala uMphathiswa wezoLwazi, uNxibelelwano kunye neTeknoloji yoLwazi ukuba asebenze nabachaphazelekayo beendaba kunye nabanye ngokuphonononga imithetho kwaye mhlawumbi ikhulule izithintelo.

translation.en: Melo is among those being asked to weigh in on what he calls "draconian" measures such as the 2015 Cybercrimes Act and 2016 Media Services Act.
translation.xho: UMelo uphakathi kwabo bacelwe ukuba baphonononge amanyathelo awabiza ngokuba “yidraconian” afana nomthetho i-Cybercrimes Act ka-2015 kunye noMthetho weeNkonzo zeMedia ka-2016.

translation.en: Ive been part of the team that has been reviewing the laws, said Melo, who had previously felt their bite.
translation.xho: “Ndibe yinxalenye yeqela ebeliphonononga imithetho,” utshilo uMelo owayekhe wakuva ngaphambili ukulunywa yilemithetho.

translation.en: He was convicted in April 2020 of obstructing police investigations, and paid a fine of 3 million Tanzanian shillings, or $1,300, rather than face a year behind bars, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists.
translation.xho: Wafunyaniswa enetyala ngo-Epreli ka-2020 ngokuthintela uphando lwamapolisa, kwaye wahlawula imali ezizigidi ezi-3 zeerandi zaseTanzania, okanye i-1,300 yeedola, kunokuba ajongane nonyaka entolongweni, ngokutsho kweKomiti yokukhusela iintatheli.

translation.en: CPJ, which honored Melo with its 2019 International Press Freedom Award, noted that the "charge stemmed from Melos alleged refusal to disclose the identities of whistleblowers on the Jamii Forums platform.
translation.xho: I-CPJ, ewonge uMelo ngembasa ye-International Press Freedom Award ka-2019, iphawule ukuba “isityholo sibangelwe kukwala kukaMelos ukubhengeza izazisi zabo babetha ikhwelo kwiqonga le-Jamii Forums.

translation.en: Melo told VOA that Jamii Forums, founded as a for-profit business, now is a nongovernmental organization.
translation.xho: UMelo uxelele iVOA ukuba iJamii Forums, eyasekwa njengeshishini elenza inzuzo, ngoku ingumbutho ongekho phantsi korhulumente.

translation.en: We are focusing on good governance, accountability and democracy, he said.
translation.xho: “Sigxile kulawulo olululo, uxanduva nedemokhrasi,” utshilo.

translation.en: Since Hassan took office, Melo said, "people on the cyberspace can now at least criticize the government or critically analyze whatever kind of statement that comes from any political figure.
translation.xho: Ukusukela oko uHassan ethathe isikhundla, uMelo uthe, "abantu abakwi-cyberpace ngoku banokugxeka urhulumente okanye bahlalutye ngokugxekayo naluphi na uhlobo lwengxelo evela kuye nawuphi na umntu wezopolitiko.

translation.en: At the moment, journalists are now writing stories that could not be written in the past six years."
translation.xho: Okwangoku, iintatheli ngoku zibhala amabali ebengakwazi ukubhalwa kule minyaka mithandathu idlulileyo.

translation.en: When it comes to news media, "indeed, the environment is slowly opening up," agreed Roland Ebole, an Amnesty International researcher.
translation.xho: Xa kuziwa kumajelo eendaba, “eneneni, okusingqongileyo kuvuleka kancinci,” wavuma uRoland Ebole, umphandi weAmnesty International.

translation.en: Based in Nairobi, he monitors Tanzania and Uganda.
translation.xho: Uzinze eNairobi, ubeka iliso eTanzania naseUganda.

translation.en: Amnesty praised Tanzanias lifting of the newspaper ban in February but also said the government "must do more to guarantee media freedom going forward."
translation.xho: U-Amnesty uncome abantu baseTanzania ngokususa ukuvalwa kwephephandaba ngoFebruwari kodwa wathi urhulumente "kufuneka enze okungakumbi ukuqinisekisa inkululeko yeendaba ukuya phambili."

translation.en: A free press, Ebole told VOA, "would mean Tanzanians looking into the future with most hope in terms of expressing themselves and getting information – and information that would benefit them in all aspects of their lives, whether its economic, social and cultural."
translation.xho: Umshicileli wamahhala, u-Ebole uxelele i-VOA, "kuya kuthetha ukuba amaTanzania ajonge kwixesha elizayo ngethemba elikhulu malunga nokuzibonakalisa kunye nokufumana ulwazi - kunye nolwazi oluya kubazuzisa kuzo zonke iinkalo zobomi babo, nokuba yeyoqoqosho, intlalontle kunye nenkcubeko."

translation.en: We are somehow optimistic, Melo said of journalists and rights activists. But, he cautioned, "the laws are still there, really draconian laws.
translation.xho: “Ngandlela ithile sinethemba,” utshilo uMelo ngeentatheli nabalwela amalungelo. Kodwa, ulumkise ngelithi, “imithetho isekhona, imithetho engqongqo ngokwenene.

translation.en: If they are not amended, they can be used by anyone who is against us."
translation.xho: Ukuba azilungiswanga, zinokusetyenziswa nguye nabani na ochasene nathi.

translation.en: Separately, a Tanzanian government spokesman told VOA that measures could be loosened – to a point.
translation.xho: Ngokwahlukileyo, isithethi sikarhulumente waseTanzania sixelele iVOA ukuba amanyathelo anokukhululwa - kwinqanaba.

translation.en: You cannot have a profession without rules to govern, like a tire moving without any control, spokesman Greyson Msigwa said in a recent interview.
translation.xho: “Awunakuba nomsebenzi ongenamithetho olawulayo, njengetayara elihamba ngaphandle kokulilawula,” utshilo uGreyson Msigwa kudliwano-ndlebe lwakutsha nje.

translation.en: We must reach a place that we all agree that we need to protect the interests of media and the people as well.
translation.xho: “Kufuneka sifikelele kwindawo apho sonke sivumelana ukuba kufuneka sikhusele umdla wamajelo eendaba nabantu ngokunjalo.

translation.en: Extremist Rebels Launch Deadly Attack in Northeast Nigeria
translation.xho: Abavukeli abaneembono ezibaxiweyo baqalisa uhlaselo olubulalayo kuMntla-mpuma weNigeria.

translation.en: Islamic extremist rebels have killed at least seven people in an attack in northeast Borno state in Nigeria, witnesses told The Associated Press on Wednesday.
translation.xho: Abavukeli abangamaSilamsi abaneengcwangu babulale abantu abasixhenxe ubuncinci kuhlaselo olukumantla mpuma weBorno eNigeria, amangqina axelele I-Associated Press ngoLwesithathu.

translation.en: The rebels attacked Kautukari village in the Chibok area of Borno on Tuesday evening, said residents.
translation.xho: Abavukeli bahlasele ilali yaseKautukari kwingingqi yaseChibok eBorno ngorhatya lwangoLwesibini, batsho abahlali.

translation.en: The attack happened at the same time that U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres was in the state to meet with survivors of jihadi violence.
translation.xho: Olu hlaselo lwenzeka ngaxesha linye apho unobhala-jikelele we-UN u-Antonio Guterres wayekurhulumente ezokudibana nabasinde kubundlobongela be-jihadi.

translation.en: The Chibok area is 115 kilometers (71 miles) away from Maiduguri, the state capital, where Guterres met with former militants being reintegrated into society and thousands of people displaced by the insurgency.
translation.xho: Indawo yaseChibok ikwiikhilomitha ezili-115 (iimiles ezingama -71) ukusuka eMaiduguri, ikomkhulu likarhulumente, apho uGuterres wadibana khona nababesakuba ngabavukeli baphinda badityaniswa kuluntu kunye namawakawaka abantu abagxothwayo ngenxa yovukelo.

translation.en: They came in large number with superior firepower (and) took over the community, said Hassan Chibok, a community leader.
translation.xho: “Beze ngobuninzi babo benamandla omlilo aphezulu (kwaye) baluthatha uluntu,” utshilo uHassan Chibok, inkokeli yabahlali.

translation.en: Troops from a nearby military base were deployed to repel the attack but "the damage had been done," Chibok said, adding that "casualties are up to 10."
translation.xho: Amajoni asuka kwisikhululo somkhosi esikufutshane aye abekwa ukuba athintele uhlaselo kodwa "umonakalo wenziwe," utshilo uChibok, esongeza ukuba "amaxhoba afikelela kwi-10."

translation.en: Another resident Yana Galang said at least seven people were killed in the latest violence before the Nigerian military intervened.
translation.xho: Omnye umhlali u-Yana Galang uthe abantu abasixhenxe babulewe kubundlobongela bamva nje ngaphambi kokuba kungenelele umkhosi waseNigeria.

translation.en: Nigerian police did not immediately respond to a request for confirmation of the attack.
translation.xho: Amapolisa aseNigeria awazange aphendule ngokukhawuleza kwisicelo sokuqinisekisa ngohlaselo.

translation.en: Nigeria, Africa's most populous country with 206 million people, continues to grapple with a 10-year-old insurgency in the northeast by Islamic extremist rebels of Boko Haram and its offshoot, the Islamic State West Africa Province.
translation.xho: INigeria, ilizwe laseAfrika elinabantu abaninzi abazizigidi ezingama-206, liyaqhubeka nokulwa novukelo oluneminyaka eyi-10 kumntla-mpuma ngabavukeli benkolo yamaSilamsi beBoko Haram kunye nehlumelo layo, i-Islamic State West Africa Province.

translation.en: The extremists are fighting to establish Shariah law and to stop Western education.
translation.xho: Ababantu baneembono ezibaxiweyo balwela ukuseka umthetho weShariah nokuyekisa imfundo yaseNtshona.

translation.en: More than 35,000 people have died and millions have been displaced by the extremist violence, according to the U.N. Development Program.
translation.xho: Bangaphezu kwama-35,000 abantu abaye bafa kwaye izigidi ziye zashiya amakhaya ngenxa yogonyamelo olugqithiseleyo, ngokutsho kweNkqubo yoPhuhliso ye-UN.

translation.en: Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari said earlier this week that the war against the extremists is "approaching its conclusion," citing continued military airstrikes and the mass defection of thousands of the fighters, some of whom analysts say are laying down their arms because of infighting within the jihadi group.
translation.xho: Umongameli waseNigeria u-Muhammadu Buhari uthe ekuqaleni kwale veki ukuba imfazwe echasene nee-extremes "isondela esiphelweni," ecaphula uhlaselo lwasemkhosini oluqhubekayo kunye nokuvukela kwamawakawaka abahlalutyi, abathi abanye abahlalutyi babeka phantsi izixhobo zabo ngenxa yokulwa ngaphakathi. iqela lejihadi.

translation.en: The violence, however, continues in border communities and areas closer to the Lake Chad region, the stronghold of the Islamic State-linked group, ISWAP.
translation.xho: Ubundlobongela, nangona kunjalo, buyaqhubeka kwiindawo ezihlala kwimida kunye neendawo ezikufutshane nommandla weLake Chad, inqaba yeqela le-Islamic State-linked, i-ISWAP.

translation.en: Things are getting worse in Kautukari village in Chibok and adjourning areas closer to the forest, said community leader Chibok, saying the extremists' presence near the forest is a contributing factor.
translation.xho: “Izinto ziya zibambi kakhulu” kwilali yaseKautukari eChibok nakwindawo ezimiyo kufutshane nehlathi, itshilo inkokeli yabahlali uChibok, isithi ubukho babaxhwila kufutshane nehlathi bungunobangela.

translation.en: Reporting Under Attack in South Sudan, Sudan.
translation.xho: Ukunika ingxelo phantsi kohlaselo eSouth Sudan, eSudan.

translation.en: Journalists in both Sudan and South Sudan say threats, intimidation and arbitrary arrests are part of everyday life, limiting their ability to inform the public.
translation.xho: Iintatheli zaseSudan naseSouth Sudan zithi izoyikiso kunye nokubanjwa ngokungekho mthethweni yinxalenye yobomi bemihla ngemihla, okubangela kunciphe amandla abo okwazisa uluntu.

translation.en: South Sudan ranks 128th and Sudan ranks 151st out of 180 countries in Reporters Without Borders annual World Press Freedom Index, released Tuesday to coincide with the United Nations annual recognition of World Press Freedom Day.
translation.xho: I-South Sudan ibeka ku-128 kunye ne-Sudan ku-151 kumazwe angama-180 kwiingxelo zeReporters Without Borders yonyaka we-World Press Freedom Index, ekhutshwe ngoLwesibini ukuba ihambelane neZizwe eziManyeneyo zokuqaphela uSuku lweWorld Press Day.

translation.en: The bigger the number, the worse the environment for news media.
translation.xho: Ukuba likhulu kwenani, kokukhona imeko imbi kakhulu kumajelo eendaba.

translation.en: Irene Ayaa of the Association for Media Development in South Sudan says government censorship in her country is widespread.
translation.xho: U-Irene Ayaa woMbutho woPhuhliso lweMedia eSouth Sudan uthi ukujongwa kukarhulumente kwilizwe lakhe kuxhaphakile.

translation.en: Last month, we registered four articles removed from newspapers, she said.
translation.xho: “Kwinyanga ephelileyo, sibhalise amanqaku amane asuswe kumaphephandaba,” utshilo.

translation.en: Between January and March alone, security personnel removed dozens of articles from the Juba Monitor, Anna Namiriano, editor-in-chief of an English-language daily, told South Sudan in Focus.
translation.xho: Phakathi kukaJanuwari noMatshi kuphela, abasebenzi bezokhuseleko basuse intaphane yamanqaku kwiJuba Monitor, uAnna Namiriano, umhleli oyintloko wemihla ngemihla yolwimi lwesiNgesi, uxelele iSouth Sudan kuFocus.

translation.en: They removed stories and we left the space blank.
translation.xho: “Bawasuse amabali saza sashiya indawo ingenanto.

translation.en: They say why we are not listening to them, so on 17th of March, they suspended the newspaper."
translation.xho: Batsho ukuba kutheni singabamameli, ngoko nge-17 kaMatshi, balinqumamisa eli phephandaba.

translation.en: In February, a handful of journalists were briefly detained for covering a press conference by opposition lawmakers in parliament.
translation.xho: NgoFebruwari, iqaqobana leentatheli liye labanjwa ngokufutshane ngenxa yokuthetha ngenkomfa yabezomthetho abaphikisayo epalamente.

translation.en: A Juba Monitor newspaper article about the incident was removed by security agents at the printing plant.
translation.xho: Inqaku lephephandaba leJuba Monitor malunga nesi siganeko lasuswa ngamagosa okhuseleko kwindawo yokushicilela.

translation.en: We dont have freedom of the press in the country, Namiriano said.
translation.xho: “Asinayo inkululeko yeendaba kweli lizwe,” utshilo uNamiriano.

translation.en: The solution is let us do our work as media houses. We have the code of conduct, we have the media law to guide us, and removal of stories is really very bad.
translation.xho: “Isisombululo kukuba masenze umsebenzi wethu njengamaziko eendaba.

translation.en: South Sudans information minister, Michael Makuei, insists press freedom is alive and well in his country.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wezolwazi waseSouth Sudan, uMichael Makuei, unyanzelisa inkululeko yeendaba iyaphila kwaye iphilile kwilizwe lakhe.

translation.en: South Sudan is the only place where journalists are free, where they enjoy absolute freedom according to the law.
translation.xho: ISouth Sudan kuphela kwendawo apho iintatheli zikhululekile, apho zixhamla inkululeko epheleleyo ngokomthetho.

translation.en: I say, 'according to the law,' because there is nothing absolute in this world," Makuei told South Sudan in Focus.
translation.xho: Ndithi, 'ngokomthetho,' kuba akukho nto iqinisekileyo kweli hlabathi, "uMakuei uxelele iSouth Sudan kuFocus.

translation.en: The United Nations Commission on Human Rights refutes that assertion.
translation.xho: IKomishoni YeZizwe Ezimanyeneyo Yamalungelo Abantu iyakukhaba oko.

translation.en: In a report issued last October, it said the government is harassing activists, journalists and their families, limiting their activities and targeting their work and finances.
translation.xho: Kwingxelo ekhutshwe ngo-Okthobha odlulileyo, yathi urhulumente uhlukumeza abagqugquzeli, intatheli kunye neentsapho zabo, ukunciphisa imisebenzi yabo kunye nokujolisa umsebenzi wabo kunye nemali.

translation.en: South Sudan is one of the most dangerous places in the world to be a journalist, according to the commission.
translation.xho: ISouth Sudan yenye yezona ndawo ziyingozi kwihlabathi ukuba yintatheli, ngokwekhomishini.

translation.en: South Sudan has a lot of work to do to establish and solidify the institutions that are critical to a well-functioning democratic state, David Renz, charge
translation.xho: ISouth Sudan inomsebenzi omninzi ekufuneka wenziwe ukuseka kunye nokuqinisa amaziko abalulekileyo kurhulumente wedemokhrasi osebenza kakuhle, utshilo uDavid Renz.

translation.en: daffaires for the U.S. Embassy in South Sudan, said in a statement Tuesday, adding that the U.S. remains deeply concerned about the state of press freedom in South Sudan.
translation.xho: I-daffaires ye-Embassy yase-US e-South Sudan, itshilo kwingxelo ngoLwesibini, yongeza ukuba i-US ihlala ixhalabile kakhulu ngenkululeko yeendaba eSouth Sudan.

translation.en: We have seen some of the local radio stations shut down over very trivial matters, Renz said. "And we also are aware that journalists of radio and television and even social media are self-censored" and wary of local and national governments actions "to penalize journalists who say things the government would prefer that they not say."
translation.xho: “Sizibonile ezinye izikhululo zikanomathotholo zalapha ekhaya zivaliwe ngenxa yezinto ezingenamsebenzi,” utshilo uRenz. "Kwaye siyayazi ukuba iintatheli zikanomathotholo kunye nomabonwakude kunye nemithombo yeendaba zentlalo ziyazivavanya" kwaye zilumkele izenzo zoorhulumente basekhaya kunye nesizwe "zokohlwaya iintatheli ezithetha izinto urhulumente anokukhetha ukuba zingazithethi."

translation.en: Further complications from coup
translation.xho: Ezinye iingxaki ezivela kubhukuqo-mbuso

translation.en: In Sudan, journalists in the capital city of Khartoum say harassment and threats have increased since the October 25 military takeover.
translation.xho: ESudan, iintatheli kwikomkhulu laseKhartoum zithi ukuxhatshazwa kunye nezoyikiso zonyukile ukusukela oko kuthabathe umkhosi nge-25 ka-Okthobha.

translation.en: Shoggi Abdulazeem, an investigative journalist in Sudan, said he received a death threat in November and was warned not to speak to international media.
translation.xho: UShoggi Abdulazeem, intatheli ephandayo eSudan, uthe wafumana isoyikiso sokufa ngoNovemba kwaye walumkiswa ukuba angathethi namajelo eendaba ehlabathi.

translation.en: I was hosting live on Al Jazeera and after leaving their office, eight armed security men followed me in a pickup.
translation.xho: “Bendisindleke bukhoma eAl Jazeera kwaye emva kokushiya iofisi yabo, amadoda asibhozo axhobileyo andilandela ngemoto.

translation.en: They surrounded my car," Abdulazeem said.
translation.xho: “Bayirhangqa imoto yam,” utshilo u-Abdulazeem.

translation.en: He told South Sudan in Focus he was blindfolded and moved around "for more than two hours" and was ordered "not to criticize the military again."
translation.xho: Uxelele iSouth Sudan kuFocus ukuba wayevalwe amehlo kwaye ejikeleziswa "isithuba esingaphezu kweeyure ezimbini" kwaye wayalelwa ukuba "angaphinde agxeke umkhosi."

translation.en: Covering pro-democracy protests in Sudan continues to be a dangerous endeavor, Abdulazeem said.
translation.xho: Ukugubungela uqhanqalazo lwe-pro-demokhrasi eSudan isengumzamo onobungozi, utshilo u-Abdulazeem.

translation.en: Many newspapers, TV channels and radio stations received directives not to host or conduct interviews with some named individuals who criticize military leaders, Abdulazeem said.
translation.xho: Amaphephandaba amaninzi, izitishi zikamabona kude kunye nezikhululo zikanomathotholo zifumene imiyalelo yokuba mazingabamba okanye aqhube udliwano-ndlebe nabantu abathile abagxeka iinkokeli zomkhosi, utshilo u-Abdulazeem.

translation.en: He added, "There are intelligence officers who are assigned to monitor this situation."
translation.xho: Wongeze ngelithi, “Kukho amagosa ezobuntlola abelwe ukubeka esweni le meko.

translation.en: Aisha Assamani, an executive member of the independent Sudanese Media Network, told South Sudan in Focus he has recorded more than 10 attacks on journalists and media houses since last year's coup.
translation.xho: U-Aisha Assamani, ilungu elilawulayo le-Sudan Media Network ezimeleyo, uxelele i-South Sudan ku-Focus ukuba urekhode ngaphezu kwe-10 uhlaselo kwiintatheli kunye nezindlu zeendaba ukusukela kubhukuqo lonyaka ophelileyo.

translation.en: "They are targeting freedom of speech with so much excessive force, Assamani said.
translation.xho: “Bajonge inkululeko yokuthetha ngamandla agqithisileyo,” utshilo u-Assamani.

translation.en: "The majority of our journalists now are fearful and their lives are in danger.
translation.xho: “Uninzi lweentatheli zethu ngoku ziyoyika kwaye ubomi bazo busesichengeni.

translation.en: Most of them remain anonymous due to the danger of the situation."
translation.xho: Uninzi lwabo luhlala lungaziwa ngenxa yobungozi bale meko. "

translation.en: On December 30, Sudanese security forces stormed the offices of three television stations — al-Arabiya, al-Hadath and al-Sharq — firing tear gas, assaulting staff and destroying broadcast equipment, according to local news media.
translation.xho: Nge-30 kaDisemba, imikhosi yezokhuseleko yaseSudan yangena kwii-ofisi zezikhululo ezintathu zikamabonwakude - i-al-Arabiya, i-al-Hadath kunye ne-al-Sharq - iqhumisa igesi yeenyembezi, ibetha abasebenzi kwaye itshabalalisa izixhobo zokusasaza, ngokutsho kweendaba zasekuhlaleni.

translation.en: That same day, security forces detained al-Sharq correspondents Maha Al-Talb and Sally
translation.xho: Kwangolo suku lunye, imikhosi yezokhuseleko yavalela umnxibelelanisi we-al-Sharq uMaha Al-Talb noSally Othman iiyure phambi kokubakhulula.

translation.en: Othman for hours before releasing them.
translation.xho: Nge-16 kaJanuwari, abasemagunyeni baseSudan barhoxisa ilayisenisi yosasazo yeAl Jazeera Live kwaye bavala iofisi yabo eKhartoum.

translation.en: On January 16, Sudanese authorities withdrew the broadcast license of Al Jazeera Live and closed its office in Khartoum.
translation.xho: Ileta evela kwi-Information Ministry eya kumlawuli we-TV ye-Al Jazeera e-Sudan iyalela unobangela wokuvala "okukusebenza ngendlela engafanelekanga" kunye nomxholo weendaba "owonakalisa umdla aphezulu welizwe kunye nokhuseleko lwelizwe."

translation.en: A letter from the Information Ministry to the director of Al Jazeera television in Sudan attributed the closing to an "unprofessional approach" and media content that "harmed the countrys higher interests and national security." The Doha-based network condemned the closure.
translation.xho: Inethiwekhi esekwe eDoha ikugxekile okukuvalwa.

translation.en: In February, Sudanese authorities arrested a group of BBC reporters in Khartoum and questioned them for several hours before releasing them.
translation.xho: NgoFebruwari, abasemagunyeni baseSudan babamba iqela leentatheli ze-BBC eKhartoum kwaye bababuza imibuzo iiyure ezininzi ngaphambi kokuba babakhulule.

translation.en: VOA repeatedly called Sudans government for comment, but those calls — to Brigadier General Attahir Abu Haja, press advisor to military leader Abdul Fattah al-Burhan — went unanswered.
translation.xho: I-VOA yabiza ngokuphindaphindiweyo urhulumente waseSudan ukuba anike izimvo, kodwa ezo fowuni - kuBrigadier General Attahir Abu Haja, umcebisi weendaba kwinkokeli yezempi u-Abdul Fattah al-Burhan - akazange aphendule.

translation.en: Michael Atit reported from Khartoum, Sudan; Deng Ghai Deng and Manyang David Mayar reported from Juba, South Sudan.
translation.xho: UMichael Atit unike ingxelo evela eKhartoum, eSudan; UDeng Ghai Deng kunye noManyang David Mayar babike bevela eJuba, eSouth Sudan.

translation.en: At Least 30 Burundian AU Soldiers Killed in Al-Shabab Attack, Official Says
translation.xho: Ubuncinci ngama-30 amajoni e-AU aseBurundi abulawa kuhlaselo lwe-Al-Shabab, igosa litsho.

translation.en: At least 30 Burundian soldiers were killed and 20 others injured in Tuesday's attack by al-Shabab militants on an African Union base in southern Somalia, according to a Burundian official.
translation.xho: Ubuncinci amajoni angama-30 aseBurundi abulewe kwaye amanye angama-20 onzakele kuhlaselo lwangoLwesibini lwamajoni e-al-Shabab kwiziko le-African Union kumazantsi eSomalia, ngokutsho kwegosa laseBurundi.

translation.en: The official, who requested anonymity because he is not allowed to speak to media, told VOA Somali that 10 soldiers died on the spot, and the rest of the soldiers succumbed to their wounds.
translation.xho: Eli gosa, nelicele ukungachazwa igama lalo kuba lingavumelekanga ukuba lithethe noonondaba, lixelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni alishumi abhubhele apho, kwaye amanye abhubhela kumanxeba awo.

translation.en: He confirmed that other soldiers are still missing.
translation.xho: Uye waqinisekisa ukuba amanye amajoni awakafumaneki.

translation.en: Al-Shabab said it killed 173 soldiers in the attack on the AU base in the village of El-Baraf, about 150 kilometers north of Mogadishu.
translation.xho: I-Al-Shabab ithi ibulale amajoni alikhulu elinamashumi asixhenxe anesithathu kuhlaselo lwesiseko se-AU kwilali yase-El-Baraf, malunga neekhilomitha ezili-150 kumntla weMogadishu.

translation.en: The casualty figure has not been independently verified.
translation.xho: Inani elenzakeleyo alikaqinisekiswa ngokuzimeleyo.

translation.en: A separate source told VOA Somali that 161 soldiers were at the camp at the time of attack.
translation.xho: Umthombo owahlukileyo uxelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni alikhulu elinamashumi amathandathu ananye ayesenkampini ngexesha lokuhlaselwa.

translation.en: The Burundian official confirmed that number.
translation.xho: Igosa laseBurundi liqinisekise elo nani.

translation.en: The Burundian official told VOA Somali that the soldiers had intelligence al-Shabab was gathering in a nearby village about 48 hours prior to the attack.
translation.xho: Igosa laseBurundi lixelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni anobuntlola be-al-Shabab bebehlanganisene kwilali ekufutshane malunga neeyure ezingama-48 phambi kohlaselo.

translation.en: He said the soldiers prepared to defend themselves and dug trenches.
translation.xho: Uthe amajoni azilungiselela ukuzikhusela omba imisele.

translation.en: He said what caught the soldiers by surprise was the enormity of al-Shabab explosives detonated at the camp. He said the militants used three truck bombs, one of which fell into a ditch.
translation.xho: Uthe eyona nto yamangalisekayo amajoni bubuninzi beziqhushumbisi ze-al-Shabab eziqhunyiswe enkampini. Uthi aba bavukeli basebenzise iibhombu ezintathu zelori, enye yazo yawela emhadini.

translation.en: He estimated the militants detonated about 20 kilograms of explosives, and that 450 militants overran the camp.
translation.xho: Uqikelele ukuba amajoni aqhushumba malunga neekhilogram ezingama-20 zeziqhushumbisi, kwaye amajoni angama-450 abhukuqa inkampu.

translation.en: The official said the suicide truck bombs caused most of the casualties.
translation.xho: Eli gosa lathi ezi lori eziziqhushumbisi zibangele uninzi lwamaxhoba.

translation.en: Earlier, the government of Burundi reported 10 of their soldiers were killed, with five others missing and 25 injured.
translation.xho: Kwangoko, urhulumente waseBurundi uxele ukuba i-10 yamajoni abo abulewe, abanye abahlanu belahlekile kwaye abangama-25 bonzakala.

translation.en: Burundi also said 20 al-Shabab militants were killed in the attack.
translation.xho: IBurundi ikwathe kwabulawa amajoni angama-20 e-al-Shabab kolu hlaselo.

translation.en: On Twitter, Burundi President Evariste Ndayishimiye said there are no words strong enough to condemn the terrorist attack against the Burundian contingent.
translation.xho: Kwi-Twitter, uMongameli waseBurundi u-Evariste Ndayishimiye uthe akukho mazwi anamandla ngokwaneleyo okugxeka uhlaselo lwabanqolobi ngokuchasene neqela laseBurundi.

translation.en: He wrote, "I join with all of Africa which has just lost sons and daughters … to console the hard-hit families."
translation.xho: Ubhale wathi, "Ndijoyina yonke iAfrika esandul' ukuphulukana noonyana neentombi ... ukuthuthuzela iintsapho ezibethakeleyo."

translation.en: The African Union, the Somali government and the embassy of the United States in Mogadishu have all strongly condemned the al-Shabab attack.
translation.xho: IManyano yeAfrika, urhulumente waseSomalia kunye nonozakuzaku waseMelika eMogadishu bonke balugxeke kabukhali uhlaselo lwe-al-Shabab.

translation.en: AU chief Moussa Faki Mahamat paid tribute to the Burundian soldiers killed, and said the "heinous" attack will not lessen support of AU forces to Somalia.
translation.xho: Inkosi ye-AU uMoussa Faki Mahamat unike imbeko kumajoni aseBurundi abuleweyo, kwaye wathi olu hlaselo “loyikekayo” aluzukuyithoba inkxaso yemikhosi ye-AU eSomalia.

translation.en: The Somali ministry of foreign affairs called on the international community to increase and provide higher-end capability to Somali security forces and AU forces so they can effectively combat terrorism in Somalia.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wemicimbi yangaphandle yaseSomalia uhlabe ikhwelo kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ukuba lwandise kwaye lubonelele ngesakhono esiphezulu kwimikhosi yokhuseleko yaseSomalia kunye nemikhosi ye-AU ukuze bakwazi ukulwa ngokufanelekileyo nobunqolobi eSomalia.

translation.en: The U.S. embassy in Mogadishu said the U.S. extends condolences to the families of the troops killed and wished a quick recovery to those injured.
translation.xho: Uzakuzo lwase-US eMogadishu lithe i-US idlulisa amazwi ovelwano kwiintsapho zamajoni abuleweyo kwaye inqwenela ukuchacha ngokukhawuleza kwabo bonzakeleyo.

translation.en: The Mayor of El-Baraf, Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, told VOA that Tuesday's fighting at the camp was the heaviest the area has seen.
translation.xho: USodolophu wase-El-Baraf, u-Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, uxelele iVOA ukuba umlo wangoLwesibini enkampini ngowona unzima akhe wabonwa.

translation.en: Fighting like this never happened in this area, he said, explaining that the violence also killed two civilians and injured 10 others.
translation.xho: “Umlo onje awuzange wenzeke kule ndawo,” utshilo, ecacisa ukuba olu dushe lukwabulele abantu ababini lonzakalisa abanye abalishumi.

translation.en: It was heavy fighting.
translation.xho: Ibingumlo onzima.

translation.en: The incident marked the first major al-Shabab attack on AU forces since the mission changed its name and operational structures last month.
translation.xho: Esi sehlo siphawule uhlaselo lokuqala olukhulu lwe-al-Shabab kumkhosi we-AU ukusukela oko eli phulo litshintshe igama kunye nezakhiwo zalo kwinyanga ephelileyo.

translation.en: The U.N. Security Council, which authorized the new mission called the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia, gave it a mandate to reduce the threat posed by al-Shabab, support the capacity building of Somali security forces, and conduct a phased handover of security responsibilities to the Somali government.
translation.xho: IBhunga lezoKhuseleko le-UN, eligunyazise i-mission entsha ebizwa ngokuba yi-African Union Transition Mission eSomalia, linike igunya lokunciphisa isoyikiso esibangelwa yi-al-Shabab, ukuxhasa ukuxhotyiswa kwemikhosi yokhuseleko yaseSomalia, kunye nokunikezela ngezigaba uxanduva lokhuseleko. kurhulumente waseSomalia.

translation.en: The mission's mandate runs through the end of 2024.
translation.xho: Umyalelo wemishini uqhuba ukuya ekupheleni kuka-2024.

translation.en: South Africa Urges Africa’s First COVID-19 Vaccine Plant to Keep Its Doors Open
translation.xho: UMzantsi Afrika Ubongoza iZiko lokuqala lase-Afrika lokugonya i-COVID-19 ukuba ligcine iingcango zaso zivulekile

translation.en: South African health officials are urging COVID-19 vaccine manufacturer Aspen to keep its plant in the Eastern Cape province open.
translation.xho: Amagosa ezempilo eMzantsi Afrika abongoza umenzi wesitofu sokugonya i-COVID-19 i-Aspen ukuba igcine isityalo sayo sivulekile kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni.

translation.en: This follows a Reuters article quoting Aspens senior director saying they may have to shut down as there have been no orders for their rebranded COVID vaccine.
translation.xho: Oku kulandela inqaku leReuters licaphula umlawuli omkhulu wakwa-Aspens esithi kungafuneka bavale njengoko kungakhange kubekho zi-odolo zesitofu sabo sogonyo se-COVID.

translation.en: A South African-owned subsidiary of pharmaceutical giant Aspen struck a deal with American company Johnson & Johnson in March to package, price, sell and distribute its vaccine in Africa.
translation.xho: Inkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika ephantsi kwenkampani enkulu samayeza i-Aspen yenze isivumelwano nenkampani yaseMelika iJohnson & Johnson ngoMatshi yokupakisha, ixabiso, ukuthengisa kunye nokusasaza isitofu sayo sokugonya e-Afrika.

translation.en: This vaccine was rebranded as Aspenovax.
translation.xho: Esi sitofu sathiywa ngokutsha njenge-Aspenovax.

translation.en: The move was hailed by many as there had been much concern about Africas reliance on imported vaccines which were often costly and at times in short supply.
translation.xho: Eli nyathelo liye lanconywa ngabaninzi njengoko bekukho inkxalabo enkulu malunga nokuxhomekeka kweAfrika kumayeza ogonyo asuka kumazwe angaphandle ebesoloko eneendleko kwaye ngamanye amaxesha enqongophele.

translation.en: But there have been no orders for Aspenovax.
translation.xho: Kodwa akukhange kubekho ziodolo ze-Aspenovax.

translation.en: South Africas National Health Department Spokesperson Foster Mohale said the lack of orders is due to low vaccination rates not only at home, but globally.
translation.xho: Isithethi seSebe lezeMpilo kuzwelonke eMzantsi Afrika uFoster Mohale uthe ukunqongophala kwee-odolo kungenxa yamazinga aphantsi okugonya kungekuphela nje ekhaya, kodwa kwihlabathi jikelele.

translation.en: Vaccine hesitancy is one of the factors which contribute to these low vaccination rates or demand for more vaccines which also affect the production.
translation.xho: “Ukuthandabuza kugonyo yenye yezinto ezinegalelo kula mazinga aphantsi ogonyo okanye imfuno yogonyo engaphezulu echaphazela imveliso.

translation.en: Because obviously we understand that they are in a business, they cant keep on producing vaccines when they know that the demand for vaccines is very low.
translation.xho: Kuba ngokucacileyo siyaqonda ukuba abakwishishini, abakwazi ukuqhubeka bevelisa izitofu zokugonya xa besazi ukuba imfuno yogonyo iphantsi kakhulu.

translation.en: So, we understand the situation where they are, and we sympathize with them," he said.
translation.xho: Ke, siyayiqonda imeko abakuyo, kwaye siyavelana nabo,” utshilo.

translation.en: Mohale said for now, South Africa has enough vaccines.
translation.xho: UMohale uthe okwangoku, uMzantsi Afrika unezitofu ezaneleyo.

translation.en: He adds that in March, 100,000 vaccines expired.
translation.xho: Wongeza ngelithi ngoMatshi, amayeza ogonyo ayi-100,000 aphelelwe lixesha.

translation.en: And more are due to expire in June and July.
translation.xho: Kwaye ngaphezulu kulindeleke ukuba ziphelelwe ngoJuni nangoJulayi.

translation.en: However, he said that Aspens vaccine plant is important because no one knows what the future holds.
translation.xho: Nangona kunjalo, uthe isityalo sokugonya i-Aspens sibalulekile kuba akukho mntu waziyo ukuba ikamva lisiphathele ntoni.

translation.en: We will try to engage them not to rush their decision precisely because we anticipate especially our scientists, our epidemiologists, we anticipate that the fifth wave might hit the country, South Africa, during the winter season which is a few weeks away from now.
translation.xho: Siza kuzama ukuthetha nabo ukuba bangasingxameli isigqibo sabo ngokuchanekileyo kuba silindele izazinzulu zethu, iingcali zethu zezifo, ukuba iliza lesihlanu lingabetha ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika ngexesha lasebusika elisele kwiiveki ezimbalwa ukusuka ngoku.

translation.en: As you can see the number of daily COVID-19 patients has been rising for the past seven days," he said.
translation.xho: Njengoko ubona inani lezigulana ze-COVID-19 zemihla ngemihla zinyuka kwezi ntsuku zisixhenxe zidlulileyo,”utshilo.

translation.en: Professor Petro Terblanche, who is the managing director of South African company, Afrigen, which in a continent-first made an mRNA COVID vaccine using Modernas data — said the situation at Aspen is a tragedy for the industry.
translation.xho: Unjingalwazi uPetro Terblanche, ongumlawuli wenkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika, i-Afrigen, ethe kwilizwekazi lokuqala yenza isitofu sokugonya i-mRNA COVID isebenzisa Idatha yeModernas - uthe imeko yase-Aspen yintlekele kwishishini.

translation.en: This is just indicating again how important it is that this continent looks at policy reform.
translation.xho: “Oku kubonisa kwakhona indlela ekubaluleke ngayo ukuba eli lizwekazi lijonge uhlengahlengiso lomgaqo-nkqubo.

translation.en: This is about how are we going to make sure that we give preferential procurement to local companies.
translation.xho: Oku kumalunga nendlela esiza kuqinisekisa ngayo ukuba sinikezela ngokukhethekileyo kwiinkampani zasekhaya.

translation.en: How are we going to make sure that we create a marketplace and eco-system that will absorb local capacity?
translation.xho: Siza kuqinisekisa njani ukuba sivelisa indawo yokuthengisa kunye ne-nkqubo yendalo eya kuthatha umthamo wasekhaya?

translation.en: Otherwise, we will not have capacity locally in a sustainable manner and were going to get the next pandemic and we will be unprepared, and we will not have health security," said Terblanche.
translation.xho: Ngaphandle koko, asiyi kuba nomthamo wasekhaya ngendlela ezinzileyo kwaye siyakufumana ubhubhane olandelayo sibe singalungiselelanga, kwaye asiyi kuba nokhuseleko lwezempilo, ”utshilo uTerblanche.

translation.en: She believes money should also be put into educating people on the importance of vaccines.
translation.xho: Ukholelwa ukuba imali kufuneka ifakwe ekufundiseni abantu ngokubaluleka kwezitofu zokugonya.

translation.en: We need to ensure that we also put effort into advocacy for vaccination.
translation.xho: “Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba sikwabeka iinzame zokuxhasa ugonyo.

translation.en: Because we now have 17% of the continent that is vaccinated.
translation.xho: Kaloku ngoku sine-17% yelizwekazi eligonyiweyo.

translation.en: We need to get them to at least 40% to ensure that we fully arrest this pandemic," she said.
translation.xho: Kufuneka sibenze bafikelele kwi-40% ubuncinci ukuqinisekisa ukuba siwubamba ngokupheleleyo lo bhubhani, utshilo.

translation.en: Mohale was unable to say when the Health Department would be meeting with Aspens executives.
translation.xho: UMohale akakwazanga ukuchaza ukuba iSebe lezeMpilo lizakuhlangana nini nabaphathi baseAspens.

translation.en: Disinformation, Censorship, Trigger Global Retreat of Press Freedom.
translation.xho: I-Disinformation, i-Censorship, i-Trigger i-Global Retreat ye-Press Freedom.

translation.en: Led by the Kremlin's example, a global rise in disinformation and propaganda is having a disastrous effect on independent news around the world, a new report finds.
translation.xho: Ikhokelwa ngumzekelo we-Kremlin, ukunyuka kolwazi olungelulo kunye ne-propaganda ehlabathini kunempembelelo embi kwiindaba ezizimeleyo kwihlabathi jikelele, ngokwengxelo yeendaba.

translation.en: In its 2022 World Press Freedom Index released Tuesday, the Paris-based Reporters Without Borders (RSF) said Russia's invasion of Ukraine has contributed vastly to the spread of fake news and propaganda.
translation.xho: Kwi-World Press Freedom Index ka-2022 ekhutshwe ngoLwesibini, iiNtatheli ezisekwe eParis ngaphandle kwemida (RSF) zathi ukuhlasela kweRussia eUkraine kube negalelo elikhulu ekusasazeni iindaba zobuxoki kunye nobuxoki.

translation.en: The journalism watchdog group said its findings are worrying, as they show deep divisions among media within countries and between countries at the international level.
translation.xho: Iqela elijonga ubuntatheli lithe iziphumo zalo ziyaxhalabisa, njengoko zibonisa iyantlukwano enzulu phakathi kwamajelo eendaba kumazwe naphakathi kwamazwe akwinqanaba lehlabathi.

translation.en: In 2022, it's really undeniable that media polarization and information chaos are really fueling social divisions in ways that are pretty new, said Clayton
translation.xho: Ngo-2022, ayinakuphikiswa into yokuba ukuchasana kwemithombo yeendaba kunye nesiphithiphithi solwazi siphembelela iyantlukwano ekuhlaleni ngeendlela ezintsha,” utshilo uClayton.

translation.en: Weimers, deputy director of RSF for the United States, told VOA.
translation.xho: Weimers, usekela-mlawuli we-RSF e-United States, uxelele i-VOA.

translation.en: He said the prevalence of partisan news around the world has come at the expense of authentic journalism.
translation.xho: Uthe ukuxhaphaka kweendaba zamaqela kwihlabathi jikelele kufike ngeendleko zobuntatheli obuyinyani.

translation.en: The group's annual report ranks 180 countries based on the environment for independent journalism.
translation.xho: Ingxelo yonyaka yeli qela ibala amazwe ali-180 ngokusekelwe kwimekobume yobuntatheli obuzimeleyo.

translation.en: This year, however, RSF said it used a new method that blends each country's political, legal, economic, sociocultural and security conditions.
translation.xho: Kulo nyaka, nangona kunjalo, iRSF ithe isebenzise indlela entsha edibanisa iimeko zelizwe ngalinye kwezopolitiko, ezomthetho, ezoqoqosho, ezentlalo kunye nokhuseleko.

translation.en: Now, the index classifies a record 28 countries as "having very bad media freedom.
translation.xho: Ngoku, isalathiso sichaza irekhodi lamazwe angama-28 "njengenkululeko embi kakhulu yeendaba.

translation.en: That group includes China, which is exporting censorship beyond its borders while also amplifying the Kremlin's propaganda on Russia's devastating war against Ukraine.
translation.xho: Elo qela libandakanya i-China, ethumela ugcino-mthetho ngaphaya kwemida yalo ngelixa ikhulisa inkohliso ye-Kremlin malunga nemfazwe etshabalalisayo yaseRussia ngokuchasene neUkraine.

translation.en: Since its invasion of Ukraine on February 24, Russia has sought total control over news coverage, passing a new law that carries 15-year prison terms for reporting "false news" on the military, and even forbids calling the conflict a "war."
translation.xho: Ukusukela ekuhlaseleni kwayo i-Ukraine nge-24 kaFebruwari, iRussia ifune ulawulo olupheleleyo malunga neendaba, ipasisa umthetho omtsha othwala iminyaka eli-15 entolongweni ngokuxela "iindaba zobuxoki" ngomkhosi, kwaye iyakwalela ukubiza kongquzulwano lwayo ne Ukraine ukuba "yimfazwe."

translation.en: That has forced most remaining independent news outlets, including the renowned Novaya Gazeta newspaper, Ekho Moskvy radio and Dozhd TV, to shut down or move outside Russia to continue operating.
translation.xho: Oko kunyanzelise uninzi lweendaba eziseleyo ezizimeleyo, kubandakanya iphephandaba elidumileyo leNovaya Gazeta, unomathotholo we-Ekho Moskvy kunye ne-Dozhd TV, ukuba bavale okanye bahambe ngaphandle kweRussia ukuze baqhubeke nokusebenza.

translation.en: With independent voices absent, experts say, the Russian government has been able to flood state-run airwaves with propaganda that downplays the war and spreads false or misleading justifications for the Kremlin's invasion.
translation.xho: Ukungabikho kwamazwi azimeleyo, iingcali zithi, urhulumente waseRussia ukwazile ukusasaza usasazo ngepropaganda ethoba ubunzulu bemfazwe kwaye isasaze izizathu zobuxoki malunga nohlaselo lweKremlin.

translation.en: Russia's media repression stands at 155 out of 180 countries included in RSF's index, where one is the most free and 180 the least.
translation.xho: Ingcinezelelo yamajelo eendaba yiRassia ime kwi-155 kumazwe angama-180 afakwe kwi-RSF index, apho enye ikhululekile kwaye i-180 ngeyona ingakhululekanga.

translation.en: It's safe to say at this point that the free press is a thing of the past in Russia, Clayton said.
translation.xho: Kukhuselekile ukuthetha ngoku ukuba amajelo eendaba akhululekileyo yinto yakudala eRussia, utshilo uClayton.

translation.en: Throughout Russian President Vladimir Putin's 22 years in power, Moscow has been targeting journalists and the independent press, he said.
translation.xho: Kuyo yonke iminyaka engama-22 kaMongameli waseRussia uVladimir Putin elawula, iMoscow ibijolise kwiintatheli kunye nakumaphephandaba azimeleyo, utshilo.

translation.en: But since the invasion of Ukraine, it seems that Putin has really finished off the independent media once and for all in Russia, Clayton said.
translation.xho: Kodwa ukusukela oko kwahlaselwa iUkraine, kubonakala ngathi uPutin uwagqibile amajelo eendaba azimeleyo kwaphela eRussia, utshilo uClayton.

translation.en: At this point, it is impossible to accurately report on the war in Ukraine.
translation.xho: Okwangoku, akunakwenzeka ukunika ingxelo echanekileyo ngemfazwe yaseUkraine.

translation.en: China ranked 175th in the new report. And now that it is firmly under Beijing's influence, Hong Kong also registered a dramatic decline, ranking 148th out of 180 following a lengthy series of raids and arrests that shuttered pro-democracy news sites.
translation.xho: I-China ibeke indawo ye-175 kwingxelo entsha. Kwaye ngoku iphantsi kwempembelelo yeBeijing, iHong Kong iphinde yabhalisa ukwehla okumangalisayo, ikwindawo ye-148 kwi-180 kulandela uhlaselo olude lokubanjwa kunye nokuvala iindawo zeendaba zedemokhrasi.

translation.en: RSF's country file on China says it is the world's biggest jailer of journalists, with 120 in detention.
translation.xho: Ifayile yelizwe le-RSF e-China ithi ngoyena mgcini-mabanjwa omkhulu weendaba emhlabeni, kunye ne-120 eluvalelweni.

translation.en: The regime uses coercion, harassment, intimidation and surveillance to keep independent and foreign journalists from reporting on issues deemed "sensitive."
translation.xho: Ulawulo lusebenzisa ukunyanzeliswa, ukuxhatshazwa, ukugrogrisa kunye nokucupha ukugcina iintatheli ezizimeleyo kunye nezangaphandle ukuba zinike ingxelo kwimiba ethathwa njenge miba "ebucayi."

translation.en: President Xi Jinping, in power since 2013, has restored a media culture worthy of the Maoist era, in which freely accessing information has become a crime and to provide information an even greater crime, RSF's country file states.
translation.xho: Umongameli u-Xi Jinping, osegunyeni ukususela ngo-2013, ubuyisele inkcubeko yeendaba efanelekile kwixesha le-Maoist, apho ukufikelela ngokukhululekileyo kulwazi kuye kwaba lulwaphulo-mthetho kunye nokubonelela ngolwazi lulwaphulo-mthetho olukhulu ngakumbi, ngokokutsho kwefayile yelizwe ye-RSF.

translation.en: Rising authoritarianism.
translation.xho: Ukunyuka kokulawula ngegunya

translation.en: North Korea remains the worst country in the rankings at 180th. Elsewhere in the Asia-Pacific region, political turmoil, conflict and rising authoritarianism have wiped out years of progress.
translation.xho: INorth Korea iselelona lizwe libi kakhulu ngokomgangatho liku-180. Kwenye indawo kummandla waseAsia-Pasifiki, izidubedube zezobupolitika, ungquzulwano nokwanda kolawulo-ngegunya olungqongqo kuye kwayitshayela yonke iminyaka yenkqubela.

translation.en: The 2021 coup in Myanmar marked a 10-year setback for media rights, with journalists detained, media licenses revoked, and many news outlets returning to exile.
translation.xho: Ubhukuqo-mbuso lwaseMyanmar lwango-2021 luphawule iminyaka eli-10 yokubuyela umva kumalungelo eendaba, iintatheli zibanjiwe, iilayisensi zemithombo yeendaba zarhoxiswa, kunye neendaba ezininzi ezibuyela elubhacweni.

translation.en: Under the military junta, Myanmar, ranking 176th, is one of the world's biggest jailers of journalists.
translation.xho: Phantsi komkhosi womkhosi, iMyanmar, ekwindawo ye-176, yenye yezona ntolongo zinkulu zehlabathi zeentatheli.

translation.en: In Afghanistan, the Taliban insurgents pledged to uphold press freedom when they took power in August 2021.
translation.xho: E-Afghanistan, abavukeli beTaliban bathembisa ngokuyigcina inkululeko yeendaba xa bathatha ulawulo ngo-Agasti ka-2021.

translation.en: Instead, RSF said the "Taliban's seizure of power has further worsened conditions for reporters and news organizations, who are the targets of all forms of intimidation and violence."
translation.xho: Endaweni yoko, i-RSF yathi "ukuhluthwa kwamandla eTaliban kuye kwanda ngakumbi iimeko zeentatheli kunye nemibutho yeendaba, ekujoliswe kuyo kuzo zonke iindlela zokoyikisa kunye nobundlobongela."

translation.en: Afghanistan ranked 154th.
translation.xho: I-Afghanistan ikwindawo ye-154.

translation.en: Across Africa, laws criminalizing online journalism have dealt a new blow to the right to information, RSF said, while the spread of rumors, propaganda, and disinformation has contributed to undermine access to quality information.
translation.xho: Kwi-Afrika iphela, imithetho eyenza ubuntatheli be-intanethi ibe lulwaphulo-mthetho iye yachaphazela ilungelo lolwazi, i-RSF yatsho, ngelixa ukusasazeka kwamahemuhemu, ipropaganda, kunye nolwazi olungelulo ibe negalelo ekujongeleni phantsi ukufikelela kulwazi olusemgangathweni.

translation.en: In Ethiopia, the war in the Tigray region, with its communication blackouts and restricted access, were the main factors that placed the country 114 on the index.
translation.xho: E-Ethiopia, imfazwe kwingingqi yaseTigray, kunye nokucima konxibebelwano kunye nokufikelela okuthintelweyo, zezona zinto ziphambili ezibeka ilizwe ku-114 kwisalathisi.

translation.en: Neighboring Eritrea and Djibouti are far worse, ranking near the bottom at 179 and 164, respectively.
translation.xho: Ummelwane i-Eritrea kunye ne-Djibouti zimbi kakhulu, zibekwe kufuphi nezantsi kwi-179 kunye ne-164, ngokulandelanayo.

translation.en: African media continue to struggle economically, RSF said it its accompanying analysis.
translation.xho: Amajelo eendaba ase-Afrika ayaqhubeka nokusokola kwezoqoqosho, iRSF ithe luhlahlelo olukhaphayo.

translation.en: Despite a wave of liberalization in the 1990s, there are still, too often, cases of arbitrary censorship, especially on the internet, with occasional network shutdowns in some countries, arrests of journalists and violent attacks, the group saidClayton said the rising authoritarianism feeds on itself.
translation.xho: Ngaphandle kwamaza enkululeko ngeminyaka yoo-1990, kusekho amaxesha amaninzi, amatyala ovavanyo olungekho mthethweni, ngakumbi kwi-intanethi, ngokuvalwa kwenethiwekhi ngamanye amaxesha, ukubanjwa kweentatheli kunye nokuhlaselwa ngobundlobongela, utshilo uClayton.

translation.en: When we allow a culture of impunity to exist where authoritarians are allowed to go after journalists, harass them, arrest them, beat them in the streets and kill them, it has a knock-on effect, he said.
translation.xho: “Xa sivumela isiko lokungohlwaywa ukuba libekho apho oozwilakhe bevunyelwa ukuba baye emva kweentatheli, bazixhaphaze, bababambe, bazibethe ezitalatweni bazibulale, loo nto ibaneziphumo,” utshilo.

translation.en: It emboldens that same authoritarian to do it again next time, and it emboldens other authoritarians who are watching to do the same.
translation.xho: Iqinisekisa kwa lowo unegunya linye ukuba ayenze kwakhona kwixesha elizayo, kwaye iqinisekisa abanye abasemagunyeni ababukeleyo benze okufanayo.

translation.en: US is not perfect.
translation.xho: I-US ayigqibelelanga.

translation.en: After a period of seeing its media attacked as "fake news" by former President Donald Trump, the United States retained a relatively high ranking of 42 in RSF's index.
translation.xho: Emva kwexesha lokubona amajelo eendaba ehlaselwa "njengeendaba zobuxoki" ngowayesakuba nguMongameli uDonald Trump, iUnited States yagcina inqanaba eliphezulu le-42 kwisalathiso seRSF.

translation.en: That is largely thanks to the return of regular White House and federal agency press briefings.
translation.xho: Oku kubulela kakhulu ekubuyeni kwe-White House rhoqo kunye nezishwankathelo ze-arhente yomanyano.

translation.en: But RSF said problems persist, including "the disappearance of local newspapers, the systematic polarization of the media, and the erosion of journalism by digital platforms amid a climate of animosity and aggression toward journalists, among others."
translation.xho: Kodwa i-RSF ithe iingxaki ziyaqhubeka, kubandakanya "ukunyamalala kwamaphephandaba asekhaya, ukuhlukaniswa okucwangcisiweyo kwemithombo yeendaba, kunye nokukhuliseka kobuntatheli ngamaqonga edijithali phakathi kwesimo sentiyo kunye nobundlongondlongo kwiintatheli, phakathi kwezinye."

translation.en: Barriers exist, for instance, when it comes to covering state governments and protests.
translation.xho: Izithintelo zikhona, umzekelo, xa kufikwa ekugqumeni oorhulumente bamazwe kunye noqhanqalazo.

translation.en: We typically find that this is either due to just a blatant disregard for the laws governing open records or meetings, or they're simply misinterpreting them.
translation.xho: Siye sifumanise ukuba oku kungenxa yokungahoywa okucacileyo kwemithetho elawula iirekhodi ezivulekileyo okanye iintlanganiso, okanye bayitolika gwenxa.

translation.en: An individual is misinterpreting whether a journalist can be present at a particular event," said Beth
translation.xho: Umntu utolika ngendlela engeyiyo ukuba intatheli inokubakho kumsitho othile, utshilo uBeth Francesco, umlawuli omkhulu weNational Press Club Journalism Institute.

translation.en: A few bright spots.
translation.xho: Iindawo ezimbalwa eziqaqambileyo.

translation.en: Despite an overall trend of decline, Clayton said there are positives.
translation.xho: Ngaphandle komkhwa wokuhla ngokubanzi, uClayton uthe kukho izinto ezintle.

translation.en: Some governments provide funding for news media without interfering in their operations, to ensure independence from political influence.
translation.xho: Abanye oorhulumente banikela ngemali kumajelo eendaba ngaphandle kokuphazamisana nemisebenzi yabo, ukuze baqinisekise ukuzimela geqe kwimpembelelo yezobupolitika.

translation.en: If you look at the top of our list, some of the things that stand out are these are countries that have robust public funding for media, he said, noting that "it's always important to separate state funding for media and state-controlled media."
translation.xho: Ukuba ujonga phezulu kuluhlu lwethu, ezinye zezinto ezibalaseleyo ngala mazwe anenkxaso-mali eqinileyo kuluntu kumajelo eendaba, utshilo, ephawula ukuba "kubalulekile ukwahlula inkxaso-mali karhulumente kumajelo eendaba kunye nokulawulwa ngurhulumente."

translation.en: Three Scandinavian countries — Norway, Denmark and Sweden — respectively come at the top of RSF's index.
translation.xho: Amazwe amathathu aseScandinavia - iNorway, iDenmark kunye neSweden - ngokulandelelana eza phezulu kwisalathiso seRSF.

translation.en: Estonia, a former Soviet Union republic, ranked 4th.
translation.xho: I-Estonia, eyayisakuba yiriphabliki yeSoviet Union, ikwindawo yesi-4.

translation.en: RSF said the free exercise of journalism plays a major role in emerging democracies such as East Timor, ranked 17, Bhutan, ranked 33, and Mongolia, ranked 90.
translation.xho: I-RSF ithe ukusetyenziswa ngokukhululekileyo kobuntatheli kudlala indima enkulu kwiidemokhrasi ezivelayo ezifana ne-East Timor, indawo ye-17, iBhutan, ibekwe kwi-33, kunye ne-Mongolia, i-90.

translation.en: East Timor was one country whose ranking skyrocketed, rising 54 places.
translation.xho: I-East Timor yayililizwe elinomgangatho ophakamileyo, lenyuka ngeendawo ezingama-54.

translation.en: But RSF cautioned that because of its change in methodology this year, "care should be taken when comparing the 2022 rankings and scores with those from 2021."
translation.xho: Kodwa i-RSF ilumkise ukuba ngenxa yokutshintsha kwendlela yokusebenza kulo nyaka, "kufuneka kuthathwe unonophelo xa kuthelekiswa umgangatho kunye namanqaku ka-2022 ethelekiswa nalawo ka-2021."

translation.en: Executions, Detentions Hang Over Saudi Legal Reforms.
translation.xho: Ukubulawa, Ukuvalelwa Kuxhonywe phezu koHlaziyo lwezomthetho lwaseSaudi.

translation.en: Saudi Arabia is pushing to revamp its harsh justice system but reforms are overshadowed by executions and tough treatment of dissidents, raising questions about how much will change.
translation.xho: ISaudi Arabia ityhala ukuba ihlaziye inkqubo yayo yezobulungisa eqatha kodwa uhlaziyo lugutyungelwe kukubulawa kwabantu kunye nempatho enzima yabachasayo, iphakamisa imibuzo malunga nokuba kungatshintsha kangakanani na.

translation.en: The kingdom is known for its strict interpretation of Islamic sharia law, which forms the basis of its judicial system.
translation.xho: Ubukumkani baziwa ngokutolika ngokungqongqo umthetho we-sharia yamaSilamsi, osisiseko senkqubo yawo yokugweba.

translation.en: But in recent months it has moved ahead with reforms that analysts say could make its courts function more like others in the Middle East.
translation.xho: Kodwa kwezi nyanga zidlulileyo uye waqhubela phambili nohlaziyo abathi abahlalutyi banokwenza iinkundla zabo zisebenze njengezinye ezikuMbindi Mpuma.

translation.en: That effort hinges on a series of new laws for sensitive issues like women's divorce rights and judges' power to determine criminal sentences.
translation.xho: Loo nzame ixhomekeke kuthotho lwemithetho emitsha kwimiba ebuthathaka efana namalungelo oqhawulo-mtshato lwabasetyhini kunye negunya lejaji lokumisela izigwebo zolwaphulo-mthetho.

translation.en: Announced last year by de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, the measures, including the first written penal code, appear to align with Saudi Arabia's goal of opening up to the world and softening its extremist image.
translation.xho: Yabhengezwa kulo nyaka uphelileyo ngumlawuli we-de facto Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, amanyathelo, kuquka ikhowudi yokuqala yesohlwayo ebhaliweyo, ibonakala ihambelana nenjongo yeSaudi Arabia yokuvula ihlabathi kunye nokuthambisa umfanekiso walo ogqithiseleyo.

translation.en: Even critics concede the changes could make Saudi courts more predictable, in some cases.
translation.xho: Nditsho nabagxeki bayavuma ukuba utshintsho lunokwenza iinkundla zaseSaudi ziqikeleleke ngakumbi, kwezinye iimeko.

translation.en: But there is no expectation that restrictions on free speech will ease, or that the legal system will treat more favorably perceived opponents of the government.
translation.xho: Kodwa akukho lindelo lokuba izithintelo kwinkululeko yokuthetha ziya kudamba, okanye inkqubo yomthetho iya kubaphatha ngokufanelekileyo abachasi bakarhulumente.

translation.en: And despite the reforms, authorities have simultaneously provided reminders of what gave Saudi Arabia its ruthless reputation in the first place, notably the mass execution of 81 men in a single day in March for offenses related to "terrorism."
translation.xho: Kwaye ngaphandle kohlaziyo, abasemagunyeni ngaxeshanye babonelele ngezikhumbuzo zento eyanika iSaudi Arabia igama layo elikhohlakeleyo kwasekuqaleni, ngokukodwa ukubulawa kwabantu abaninzi be-81 ngosuku olunye ngo-Matshi ngenxa yezono ezinxulumene "nobunqolobi."

translation.en: Two new laws have already been approved by the Saudi Cabinet. One governs the admissibility of evidence, previously at the judges' discretion.
translation.xho: Imithetho emibini emitsha sele yamkelwe yiKhabhinethi yaseSaudi. Omnye ulawula ukwamkelwa kobungqina, ngaphambili ngokwengqiqo yabagwebi.

translation.en: The second, a family law, is to take effect in June.
translation.xho: Owesibini, umthetho wosapho, uza kuqala ukusebenza ngoJuni.

translation.en: In a traditionally male-dominated system, it expands the rights of divorced women to alimony and custody of their children.
translation.xho: Kwinkqubo eqhelekileyo elawulwa ngamadoda, yandisa amalungelo abasetyhini abaqhawule umtshato kwisondlo kunye nokugcinwa kwabantwana babo.

translation.en: Announcing the new law in March, Prince Mohammed said it represented "a major qualitative leap" for women's rights and "family stability."
translation.xho: Ebhengeza umthetho omtsha ngoMatshi, iNkosana uMohammed yathi imele "inqanaba eliphezulu lomgangatho" kumalungelo abasetyhini kunye "nozinzo lwentsapho."

translation.en: The reforms seem partly to cater to foreign firms whose investment the kingdom is courting, said Adel al-Saeed, vice president of the European Saudi Organization for Human Rights.
translation.xho: Uhlaziyo lubonakala njengenxalenye yokubonelela iifemu zangaphandle ezityalwa imali kubukumkani, utshilo uAdel al-Saeed, usekela mongameli weEuropean Saudi Organization for Human Rights.

translation.en: The owners of capital are afraid of investing in this country, which is notorious in the legal aspect, so these laws are intended to change the image, he said.
translation.xho: “Abanikazi bongxowankulu bayakoyika ukutyala imali kweli lizwe, elidume kakubi kwicala lezomthetho, ngoko le mithetho yenzelwe ukutshintsha umfanekiso,” utshilo.

translation.en: The new penal code, yet to be unveiled, could bring further dramatic changes.
translation.xho: Umgaqo omtsha wezohlwayo, osaza kutyhilwa, unokuzisa utshintsho olukhulu ngakumbi.

translation.en: Under sharia, only apostasy, theft, revolt, armed robbery, adultery, drinking alcohol and slander carry prescribed sentences. Judges are left to determine punishment in other cases.
translation.xho: Ngaphantsi kwe-sharia, uwexuko kuphela, ubusela, ukuvukela, ukuphanga kuxhobile, ukukrexeza, ukusela utywala kunye nokunyundela kuthwala izigwebo ezimiselweyo. Abagwebi bayekwa ukuba bagqibe ngesohlwayo kwamanye amatyala.

translation.en: With a penal code in place, "the state will expect judges to rely not on their own training in sharia but instead on the legal rules (based on sharia) approved by the state," said Nathan Brown, an academic at George Washington University.
translation.xho: Ngekhowudi yezohlwayo, "urhulumente uya kulindela ukuba abagwebi bangathembele kuqeqesho lwabo kwi-sharia kodwa kunoko kwimithetho yomthetho (esekelwe kwi-sharia) evunywe ngurhulumente," watsho uNathan Brown, isazi kwiYunivesithi yaseGeorge Washington.

translation.en: As a result, Saudi Arabia will look much more like a civil law system, much like most states in the region, said Brown, who has studied the Saudi reforms.
translation.xho: “Ngenxa yoko, iSaudi Arabia iya kujongeka ngakumbi njengenkqubo yomthetho woluntu, njengamazwe amaninzi kulo mmandla,” utshilo uBrown, ofunde ngohlaziyo lwaseSaudi.

translation.en: The result should be more "predictability," said Abdullah Alaoudh, a U.S.-based legal expert and government critic, as new rules "take away from the leeway ... that the judges used to have."
translation.xho: Isiphumo kufuneka sibe ngakumbi "ukuqikelelwa," utshilo u-Abdullah Alaoudh, ingcali yezomthetho esekwe e-US kunye nomgxeki karhulumente, njengoko imithetho emitsha "isusa kwi-leeway ... ababenayo abagwebi."

translation.en: But tighter regulation by the monarchy also "creates a larger problem: lack of independence," he added.
translation.xho: Kodwa ukulawulwa okungqongqo kobukhosi nako "kudala ingxaki enkulu: ukungabikho kokuzimela," wongeze watsho.

translation.en: The king is the head of the Saudi judiciary and acts as the final court of appeal.
translation.xho: Ukumkani uyintloko yenkundla yaseSaudi kwaye usebenza njengenkundla yokugqibela yesibheno.

translation.en: Alaoudh's own father, prominent cleric Salman al-Awdah, has been held since 2017, seemingly in retaliation for a Twitter post that clashed with Saudi Arabia's policy at the time of isolating Qatar.
translation.xho: Utata ka-Alaoudh, umfundisi odumileyo uSalman al-Awdah, ubanjiwe ukusukela ngo-2017, ebonakala ngathi uyaziphindezela ngeposti ye-Twitter eyayingqubana nomgaqo-nkqubo waseSaudi Arabia ngexesha lokuhlukaniswa kweQatar.

translation.en: He is one of many detained in an apparent crackdown on dissent and those who could challenge Prince Mohammed's power.
translation.xho: Ungomnye wabaninzi ababanjiweyo kwingxaki ecacileyo yokuchasa kunye nabo banokucela umngeni kumandla kaNkosana uMohammed.

translation.en: One of the most prominent examples is former crown prince Mohammed bin Nayef, the CIA ally respected in the West for his efforts to counter violent extremism, but who King Salman ousted from the line of succession.
translation.xho: Omnye weyona mizekelo ibalaseleyo ngowayesakuba yinkosana u-Mohammed bin Nayef, umhlobo weCIA ohlonitshwa eNtshona ngeenzame zakhe zokulwa nobundlobongela obugqithileyo, kodwa ngubani owagxothwa nguKumkani uSalman kumgca wokulandelelana.

translation.en: Prince Nayef has not been seen in public since reports of his arrest in March 2020. His detention was never officially confirmed.
translation.xho: INkosana Nayef ayizange ibonwe esidlangalaleni ukususela kwiingxelo zokubanjwa kwakhe ngo-Matshi 2020. Ukuvalelwa kwakhe akuzange kuqinisekiswe ngokusemthethweni.

translation.en: For government opponents, such cases reinforce questions about what difference the ongoing justice reforms will make.
translation.xho: Kwabachasi bakarhulumente, amatyala anjalo omeleza imibuzo malunga nokuba nguwuphi na umahluko oza kwenziwa luhlaziyo lobulungisa oluqhubekayo.

translation.en: In my view, this is all window-dressing, said Madawi al-Rasheed, a U.K.-based academic and spokesperson for the opposition National Assembly Party founded by exiles.
translation.xho: “Ngokokubona kwam, konke oku kukufihla inyani,” utshilo uMadawi al-Rasheed, isifundiswa sase-UK kunye nesithethi seqela eliphikisayo leNdibano yeSizwe eyasekwa ngabathinjwa.

translation.en: It's very, very difficult to see what the meaning is of these reforms apart from the project of portraying (Prince Mohammed) as a reformer.
translation.xho: Kunzima kakhulu ukubona ukuba yintoni intsingiselo yolu tshintsho ngaphandle kweprojekthi yokubonisa (uNkosana uMahammad) njengomhlaziyi.

translation.en: Hanging over any discussion of justice and legal reform in Saudi Arabia is the 2018 murder and dismemberment of critic and columnist Jamal Khashoggi in the kingdom's Istanbul consulate.
translation.xho: Ukuxhoma kuyo nayiphi na ingxoxo yobulungisa kunye nohlaziyo lwezomthetho eSaudi Arabia kukubulawa kunye nokunqunyulwa komgxeki kunye nombhali wemihlathi uJamal Khashoggi kwi-consulate yase-Istanbul yobukumkani ngo-2018.

translation.en: A U.S. intelligence assessment found Prince Mohammed himself "approved" an operation to capture or kill Khashoggi, though Saudi officials deny this and say it was a "rogue" operation.
translation.xho: Uvavanyo lwe-intelligence yase-US yafumanisa ukuba iNkosana uMohammed ngokwakhe "wavuma" umsebenzi wokubamba okanye ukubulala uKhashoggi, nangona izikhulu zaseSaudi ziphika oku kwaye zisithi "ngumsebenzi okhohlakeleyo".

translation.en: In April, before Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan visited Riyadh on Thursday and embraced Prince Mohammed, Turkey transferred the trial in absentia of 26 suspects in the Khashoggi case to Saudi Arabia.
translation.xho: Ngo-Epreli, ngaphambi kokuba uMongameli waseTurkey u-Recep Tayyip Erdogan atyelele i-Riyadh ngoLwesine waza wamkela iNkosana uMohammed, iTurkey yadlulisela ityala ngokungabikho kwabarhanelwa abayi-26 kwimeko yaseKhashoggi eSaudi Arabia.

translation.en: Turkey's decision drew anguished protest from lawyers and Khashoggi's fiancée, who insisted Saudi courts couldn't possibly hold a credible trial.
translation.xho: Isigqibo saseTurkey sitsale uqhanqalazo olunxungupheleyo lwamagqwetha kunye nentombi kaKhashoggi, eyanyanzelisa ukuba iinkundla zaseSaudi azinakukwazi ukumisa ityala elinesihlahla.

translation.en: For the loved ones of those locked away, Khashoggi's killing fuels a uniform fear of speaking out.
translation.xho: Kwabo banabantu ababathandayo abavalelwa kude, ukubulawa kukaKhashoggi kunyusa uloyiko olufanayo malinga nokuthetha ngokukhululekileyo.

translation.en: I want to, many do, but we're scared, said a friend of Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz, who has been detained along with his father since 2018.
translation.xho: “Ndiyafuna, abaninzi bayayenza, kodwa siyoyika,” watsho umhlobo weNkosana uSalman bin Abdulaziz, ovalelwe noyise ukusukela ngo-2018.

translation.en: Everyone knows what happened to Khashoggi.
translation.xho: Wonke umntu uyazi ukuba kwenzeke ntoni kuKhashoggi.

translation.en: Moroccan Prison Program Sets Out to De-Radicalize IS Veterans
translation.xho: IMoroccan Prison Program imisela ukutshintsha i-IS Veterans

translation.en: As a combatant for the Islamic State group who left his native Morocco to join what he felt was a holy fight in Syria, Mohsin says he saw all the horrors of war.
translation.xho: Njengomlwi weqela le-Islamic State oshiye ilizwe lakhe laseMorocco ukuya kuba yinxalenye yento awayecinga ukuba ngumlo ongcwele eSyria, uMohsin uthi wabona yonke inkohlakalo yemfazwe.

translation.en: A terrifying experience, he says.
translation.xho: Amava awoyikisayo, utsho njalo.

translation.en: Now a prisoner, the 38-year-old claims he is no longer the fanatic he was then, enraged with a murderous hatred for non-Muslims.
translation.xho: Ngoku elibanjwa, elineminyaka engama-38 ubudala libanga ukuba akasenguye laa mntu wayenenzondelelo yempambano ngelo xesha, enomsindo wokubulala abantu abangengawo amaSilamsi.

translation.en: Captured in Turkey and extradited to Morocco, he is serving a 10-year prison term on terrorism charges.
translation.xho: Ubanjelwe eTurkey waza wathunyelwa eMorocco, uthothoza iminyaka elishumi entolongweni ngezityholo zobunqolobi.

translation.en: Now the former fighter has graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that might make them more eligible for an early release.
translation.xho: Ngoku lo wayesakuba ngumlwi uphumelele kunye namanye amabanjwa ali-14 agwetywe kulwaphulo-mthetho lwenkqubo yase-Morocco yotshintsho enokuthi ibenze bafaneleke ngakumbi ukukhululwa phambi kwexesha.

translation.en: The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat.
translation.xho: I-Associated Press kunye namanye amajelo eendaba amenyiwe ukuba abukele umsitho wabo wokuphumelela ngoLwesine kwintolongo eseSale kufutshane nekomkhulu laseMorocco, iRabat.

translation.en: And to interview some prisoners under monitored and controlled conditions. Prison administration officials picked out three men they said were willing to be interviewed.
translation.xho: Kwaye enze udliwano-ndlebe namanye amabanjwa phantsi kweemeko ezibekwe esweni nezilawulwayo. Amagosa olawulo lwentolongo akhetha amadoda amathathu athi akulungele ukuba nodliwano-ndlebe.

translation.en: Officials stipulated that the inmates shouldn't be identified by their full names and that their faces mustn't be shown, citing privacy reasons.
translation.xho: Amagosa amisela ukuba amabanjwa akufunekanga achazwe ngamagama awo apheleleyo kwaye ubuso bawo bungaboniswa, echaza izizathu zokufihlwa kwabo.

translation.en: But prison officials didn't listen to the interviews or intervene to shut down media lines of questioning or inmates' answers.
translation.xho: Kodwa amagosa entolongo akazange amamele udliwano-ndlebe okanye angenelele ukuvala imigca yemithombo yeendaba yemibuzo okanye iimpendulo zamabanjwa.

translation.en: The 15 inmates in crisp shirts and trousers stood solemnly for Morocco's national anthem and were handed certificates.
translation.xho: Amabanjwa ali-15 anxibe iihempe neebhulukhwe ema ngokundilisekileyo ephulaphule umhobe wesizwe waseMorocco kwaye anikwa iziqinisekiso.

translation.en: Prison officials said the de-radicalization program consisted of three months of classes in prison on religion, law and economics, and that inmates also received training on how to start a business.
translation.xho: Amagosa entolongo athi inkqubo yotshintsho yayibandakanya iinyanga ezintathu zokufundiswa ngonqulo entolongweni, umthetho nezoqoqosho, kwaye amabanjwa nawo afumana uqeqesho ngendlela yokuqalisa ishishini.

translation.en: These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program started in 2017.
translation.xho: Aba basanda kuphumelela bebeliqela lethoba ukusukela oko yaqala inkqubo ngo-2017.

translation.en: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, the director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."
translation.xho: UMoulay Idriss Agoulmam, umlawuli weSocial-Cultural Action and Prisoner Reintergration kwintolongo yaseMorocco, uthe le nkqubo yeyabo bafunayo kwaye isebenza namabanjwa "ukutshintsha indlela yokuziphatha kunye nokuphucula indlela yabo yokuphila."

translation.en: It enables prisoners to form an awareness of the gravity of their mistakes, he said.
translation.xho: “Ivumela amabanjwa ukuba aqonde ubunzulu beempazamo zawo,” utshilo.

translation.en: Graduating from the program doesn't make inmates automatically eligible for early release, but does increase their chances of getting a royal pardon or a reduced sentence.
translation.xho: Ukuthweswa isidanga kule nkqubo akuwenzi amabanjwa afanelekele ukukhululwa kwangoko, kodwa konyusa amathuba awo okufumana uxolelo lwasebukhosini okanye isigwebo esincitshisiweyo.

translation.en: That's been the case for just over half the program's 222 graduates so far, the prison administration says.

translation.en: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, the director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."

translation.en: Diversity, New Perspectives Are Applied to Middle East Coverage
translation.xho: Iyantlukwano, iimbono ezitsha ziyasetyenziswa kuMbindi Mpuma

translation.en: Natalia Sancha has always adopted a collaborative approach to journalism.
translation.xho: U-Natalia Sancha ebesoloko esamkela indlela yokusebenzisana kubuntatheli.

translation.en: When out on assignment, she speaks to others covering the same story about their perspectives.
translation.xho: Xa eyokwenza umsebenzi wakhe ngaphandle, uthetha nabanye abagubungela ibali elifanayo ngeembono zabo.

translation.en: This partly stems from an interest in telling underreported stories, but as a female journalist in a male-dominated region, she says collaboration and supporting the women she works with have always been important.
translation.xho: Oku ngokuyinxenye kuvela kumdla wokubalisa amabali angabaliswayo ngokwaneleyo, kodwa njengentatheli yasethyini kwindawo elawulwa ngamadoda, uthi intsebenziswano kunye nokuxhasa amanina asebenza nawo ibisoloko ibalulekile.

translation.en: I would talk to male and female journalists, and I always realized that women had a similar perspective, because we had similar experiences while covering the story, the 42-year-old journalist said.
translation.xho: “Bendikhe ndithethe neentatheli zamadoda nabasetyhini, kwaye bendisoloko ndiqaphela ukuba abasetyhini banembono efanayo, kuba nathi besinamava afanayo ngelixa sibhala eli bali,” yatsho intatheli eneminyaka engama-42 ubudala.

translation.en: That collaborative approach came into play in 2020 when a publisher asked Sancha if she was interested in writing a book about Syria.
translation.xho: Le ndlela yokusebenzisana yaqala ukusebenza ngo-2020 xa umvakalisi wabuza uSancha ukuba unomdla wokubhala incwadi ngeSyria.

translation.en: She countered with a better offer.
translation.xho: Wachasa enombono olungcono.

translation.en: I told him that a collective narrative by women journalists about the broader region would have a different effect, she said.
translation.xho: “Ndimxelele ukuba ibali elidityanelweyo leentatheli zabasetyhini malunga nommandla obanzi lingaba nefuthe elahlukileyo,” utshilo.

translation.en: I could have written the book myself, but it would not have the same sense.
translation.xho: Ngendiyibhale ngokwam le ncwadi, kodwa ayinakuba nengqiqo efanayo.

translation.en: Originally from Andalusia in southern Spain, Sancha spent the past 14 years in the Middle East covering conflicts in Iraq, Syria and Yemen, and reporting from Egypt, Lebanon and Tunisia.
translation.xho: Onemvelaphi yaseAndalusia kumazantsi eSpain, uSancha uchithe iminyaka eli-14 edlulileyo kuMbindi Mpuma egubungela ungquzulwano eIraq, eSyria naseYemen, kwaye enika ingxelo eseEgypt, eLebhanon naseTunisia.

translation.en: She has been working more recently with the European Union communications department, after leaving Beirut for health reasons following a mass explosion that rocked the city in 2020.
translation.xho: Usebenze kutsha nje nesebe lezonxibelelwano le-European Union, emva kokushiya i-Beirut ngenxa yezizathu zempilo kulandela ugqabhuko-dubulo olukhulu olwanyakamisa isixeko ngo-2020.

translation.en: Women "have a different experience because we would go to places that our male colleagues were not used to.
translation.xho: Abasetyhini “banamava ahlukileyo kuba besisiya kwiindawo abangaziqhelanga oogxa bethu abangamadoda.

translation.en: Not because we're smarter, but just because the majority of the region is still Arab, Muslim and gender-segregated," Sancha told VOA.
translation.xho: Hay ngenxa yokuba sihlakaniphile, kodwa ngenxa yokuba uninzi lwalo mmandla lusengama-Arabhu, amaSilamsi kunye nolwahlulo ngokwesini, "uSancha uxelele iVOA.

translation.en: Having women reporters has an impact, she noted.
translation.xho: Ukuba neentatheli zabasetyhini kunempembelelo, waphawula.

translation.en: If I put myself in the position of the reader, I would prefer to have a woman telling me the story because it is going to be about 100 percent of the population, which means you are going to have a more inclusive narrative on the conflict.
translation.xho: Ukuba ndizibeka kwindawo yomfundi, ndingathanda ukuba nomntu wasetyhini ondixelela ibali kuba liza kuba malunga ne-100 yepesenti yabemi, oku kuthetha ukuba uya kuba nengxelo ebandakanya ngakumbi kwingxabano. .

translation.en: For her book, Sancha reached out to other women who cover the Middle East, to ensure diverse perspectives from foreign and local reporters.
translation.xho: Kwincwadi yakhe, u-Sancha wafikelela kwabanye abafazi abagubungela uMbindi Mpuma, ukuqinisekisa iimbono ezahlukeneyo ezivela kwiintatheli zangaphandle kunye nezasekhaya.

translation.en: The result of the nearly two-year collaboration is Bullets for All, released in Spanish in April.
translation.xho: Isiphumo sentsebenziswano ephantse ibe yiminyaka emibini yiBullets for All, ekhutshwe ngeSpanish ngoAprili.

translation.en: In the book, "we tell one story with different voices that represent all the women" from the region, Sancha said.
translation.xho: Kulencwadi, "sibalisa ibali elinye ngamazwi ahlukeneyo amele bonke abafazi" bendawo, utshilo uSancha.

translation.en: Each offers a personal perspective on covering historic moments, including the collapse of autocratic governments, popular protest movements and war.
