translation.xho: Nganye ibonelela ngembono yobuqu malunga nokugubungela amaxesha embali, kubandakanya ukuwa koorhulumente bolawulo-melo, intshukumo yoqhanqalazo edumileyo kunye nemfazwe.

translation.en: It also examines the discrimination and harassment women face in the newsroom and on assignment.
translation.xho: Ikwavavanya ucalucalulo kunye nokuxhatshazwa kwabasetyhini abajongana nabo kwigumbi leendaba nakwizabelo.

translation.en: Understanding language and culture goes a long way toward making progress in the region, says Maya Gebeily.
translation.xho: UMaya Gebeily uthi ukuqonda ulwimi nenkcubeko kunegalelo elikhulu ekwenzeni inkqubela kulo mmandla.

translation.en: The Reuters bureau chief for Lebanon, Syria and Jordan is one of the contributors to the book.
translation.xho: Umphathi we-Reuters Bureau yeLebhanon, iSyria kunye neJordani ngomnye wabanegalelo kule ncwadi.

translation.en: There's a lot to say and show from the perspective of women reporters who were also then influenced by the women that they met as they were doing their reporting, she said.
translation.xho: “Kuninzi okuthethwa nokuboniswa ngokwembono yeentathezli zasethyini nazo ezithi ziphenjelelwe ngamakhosikazi athe zadibana nawo ngethuba zisenza ingxelo,” utshilo.

translation.en: Born in the U.S. to Lebanese parents, Gebeily started her journalism career in 2013 with a local news site in Beirut, Lebanon. She went on to cover the region for Agence France-Presse before joining Reuters.
translation.xho: Ozalelwe e-US kubazali baseLibanon, uGebeily waqala umsebenzi wakhe wobuntatheli ngo-2013 kwindawo yeendaba yasekhaya eBeirut, eLibanon. Uqhubekile nokugubungela ummandla we-Agence France-Presse ngaphambi kokujoyina iReuters.

translation.en: Gebeily said her American and Lebanese background helped her understand the region better, which in turn has shaped her reporting.
translation.xho: UGebeily uthe imvelaphi yakhe yaseMelika kunye neLibanon yamnceda ukuba awuqonde ngcono ummandla, nto leyo eye yabumba ingxelo yakhe.

translation.en: Knowing the local language is an important part of that.
translation.xho: Ukwazi ulwimi lwasekuhlaleni yinxalenye ebalulekileyo yoko.

translation.en: When interviewing a minister or a displaced person or an activist, the most important element is getting their trust, she said.
translation.xho: “Xa unodliwano-ndlebe nomphathiswa okanye umntu oshiye ikhaya okanye itshantliziyo, eyona nto ibalulekileyo kukufumana ukuthenjwa ngabo,” utshilo.

translation.en: If you're able to speak the language and make them feel comfortable from the beginning, it changes everything.
translation.xho: Ukuba uyakwazi ukuthetha ulwimi kwaye ubenze bazive bekhululekile kwasekuqaleni, oko kutshintsha yonke into.

translation.en: It grants you a very beautiful kind of access.
translation.xho: Ikunika uhlobo oluhle kakhulu lokufikelela. "

translation.en: In addition to Iraq and Lebanon, Gebeily, 30, has also traveled to Syria to cover the war against the Islamic State (IS) militant group.
translation.xho: Ukongeza e-Iraq naseLebhanon, uGebeily, oneminyaka engama-30 ubudala, naye uye waya eSyria ukuze apapashe imfazwe echasene neqela le-Islamic State (IS).

translation.en: Ive been very privileged to access some communities directly without having to work with a translator or a fixer, which also shapes the way that the stories come out, she said.
translation.xho: “Ndibe nenyhweba yokufikelela kwiindawo ezithile zoluntu ngokuthe ngqo ngaphandle kokuba ndisebenze nomguquleli okanye umlungisi, nto leyo ebumba indlela aphuma ngayo amabali,” utshilo.

translation.en: Syrian-Kurdish journalist Khabat Abbas, who has covered the war in Syria, attests to the importance of that.
translation.xho: Intatheli yaseSyria-Kurdish uKhabat Abbas, obhale ngemfazwe yaseSyria, uyangqina ukubaluleka koko.

translation.en: Its knowing the language and the culture that gives people a sense of comfort to open up to you, she told VOA from Qamishli, Syria.
translation.xho: Kukwazi ulwimi kunye nenkcubeko eyenza abantu bazive bekhululekile ukuba bathethe nawe, uxelele iVOA evela eQamishli, eSiriya.

translation.en: That knowledge helped when Abbas, 34, was on assignment with Sancha in March 2021. They traveled to a Kurdish-run detention camp in northeast Syria ,
translation.xho: Olo lwazi lwanceda xa uAbbas, oneminyaka engama-34 ubudala, ngethuba esebenza ngaphandle noSancha ngoMatshi 2021. Baya kwinkampu yamaKurdish ababevalelwe kumntla-mpuma weSiriya,

translation.en: And interviewed female jihadists affiliated with IS, for a story in El Pais.
translation.xho: Babe nodliwano-ndlebe nama-jihadists abhinqileyo anxulumene ne-IS, ngebali e-El Pais.

translation.en: While in Qamishli [in northeast Syria], I ran into two British journalists, very good colleagues of mine, who were disappointed after Shamima Begum and other women at the came refused to talk to them,
translation.xho: “Ngethuba ndandiseQamishli [kumntla-mpuma weSyria], ndadibana neentatheli ezimbini zaseBritane, oogxa bam abalungileyo, ababedanile emva kukaShamima Begum nabanye namanye amanina enkampini ala ukuthetha nabo,

translation.en: " Sancha said, referring to a young woman who left her home in Britain aged 15 to join IS.
translation.xho: ”utshilo uSancha, ebhekisa kumfazi oselula owashiya ikhaya lakhe eBritane eneminyaka eli-15 ukuya kujoyina i-IS.

translation.en: Their fixer was a man, so the jihadist women didnt talk to them because they are radical, and they dont talk to men. But then I was able to sit with Shamima and other women, who gave fantastic interviews from inside their tents, Sancha said.
translation.xho: Umlungisi wabo wayeyindoda, ngoko ke abafazi be-jihadist abazange bathethe nabo ngenxa yokuba abathethi namadoda. Kodwa ke ndakwazi ukuhlala noShamima kunye nabanye abafazi, abanikela udliwano-ndlebe oluhle ngaphakathi kweentente zabo,  Watsho uSancha.

translation.en: Abbas had a role in getting to talk to those women, she added.
translation.xho: U-Abbas wayenefuthe ekufumaneni ukuthetha nabo bafazi, wongeze watsho.

translation.en: Unlike Sancha and Gebeily, Abbas grew up in the marginalized Kurdish region of Syria, where until the war began in 2011, journalism effectively didnt exist.
translation.xho: Ngokungafaniyo noSancha kunye noGebeily, u-Abbas wakhulela kwingingqi yaseKurdish yaseSyria, apho kwada kwaqala imfazwe ngo-2011, ubuntatheli babungekho.

translation.en: Ordinary people in our region were used to seeing women pick up arms and fight, but they werent used to seeing a woman hold a camera on the streets and on front lines, Abbas said.
translation.xho: “Abantu abaqhelekileyo kwingingqi yethu bebeqhele ukubona abantu basetyhini bethatha izixhobo kwaye besilwa, kodwa bebengaqhelanga ukubona umntu obhinqileyo ebambe ikhamera ezitratweni  nangaphambili,” utshilo u-Abbas.

translation.en: It took a lot of sacrificing for me to convince my family and society that Im as good, if not better, as my male colleagues.
translation.xho: Kwathatha ukuzincama okukhulu ukuze ndiqinisekise usapho lwam kunye noluntu ukuba ndilungile, ukuba andingcono, njengabalingane bam abangamadoda.

translation.en: Journalism appealed to her because the story of the Middle East has often been told by male journalists, both local and foreign.
translation.xho: Ubuntatheli bamtsala umdla kuba ibali loMbindi Mpuma belisoloko libaliswa ziintatheli ezingamadoda, alapha ekhaya nakwamanye amazwe.

translation.en: The narrative hasnt changed because of that, but if local and international women journalists get a real chance to tell the story of the Middle East,
translation.xho: Ibali alitshintshanga ngenxa yoko, kodwa ukuba iintatheli zasekhaya kunye nezamazwe ngamazwe zabasetyhini bafumana ithuba lokwenyani lokubalisa ibali loMbindi Mpuma,

translation.en: that narrative could change, which would affect the way others see this region," Abbas said.
translation.xho: ibali lingatshintsha, elinokuthi lichaphazele indlela abanye abawubona ngayo lo mmandla,”utshilo uAbbas.

translation.en: Sancha also believes women in journalism have an impact on the way issues are viewed in the region, including post-traumatic stress disorder and the effect it has on female health, and subjects such as violence and alcohol.
translation.xho: U-Sancha naye ukholelwa ukuba abafazi kwi-journalism banempembelelo kwindlela imiba ejongwa ngayo kwingingqi, kubandakanywa uxinzelelo emva kokuphazamiseka kunye nomphumo onalo kwimpilo yabasetyhini, kunye nezifundo ezifana nobundlobongela kunye notywala.

translation.en: We talk about all these issues that men normally would not speak about, she said.
translation.xho: “Sithetha ngayo yonke le miba amadoda ebengafuni kuthetha ngayo,” utshilo.

translation.en: Iran's Guards Commander Says Israel Creating Conditions for Own Destruction
translation.xho: Umphathi wabalindi base-Iran uthi i-Israel izenzela iimeko zokuzitshabalalisa

translation.en: Israel's actions are creating conditions for its own destruction, Irans Revolutionary Guards commander on Friday told a Jerusalem Day rally at which the countrys new domestically-made Kheibar Buster missile was displayed.
translation.xho: Izenzo ze-Israel zidala iimeko zokuzitshabalalisa, umphathi we Revolutionary Guards wase-Iran ngoLwesihlanu uxelele indibano yeJerusalem Day apho kwaboniswa khona imijukujelwa ye-Kheibar Buster eyenziwe ekhaya.

translation.en: State television said millions of Iranians joined rallies marking Quds Day, the Arabic name for Jerusalem, in state-organized marches across the country.
translation.xho: Umabonwakude welizwe uthe izigidi zabantu base-Irani bazibandakanya kwiindibano zokuphawula iQuds Day, igama lesiArabhu leJerusalem, kwimingcelele eququzelelwe ngurhulumente kwilizwe liphela.

translation.en: It showed the Israeli flag being set on fire and groups of people around the country shouting choreographed "Death to America, Death to Israel" slogans.
translation.xho: Ibonise iflegi yase-Israel itshiswa kwaye amaqela abantu kwilizwe lonke bekhwaza "Ukufa eMelika, Ukufa ku-Israel" izilogeni.

translation.en: Supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said in a televised speech that anti-Israeli protests and attacks showed that Palestinians rejected compromises by Arab authorities with Israel.
translation.xho: Inkokeli ephakamileyo u-Ayatollah Ali Khamenei uthe kwintetho kamabonakude ukuba uqhanqalazo oluchasene ne-Israeli kunye nohlaselo lubonise ukuba abantu basePalestine bayala ukuthotyelwa ngabasemagunyeni baseArabhu kunye noSirayeli.

translation.en: Opposition to Israel is a touchstone of belief for Iran, which backs Palestinian and Lebanese Islamist militant groups opposed to peace with Israel, which Tehran does not recognize.
translation.xho: Ukuchaswa kwe-Israel ngumlinganiselo wokukholelwa kwi-Iran, exhasa amaqela e-Palestine kunye neLibanon yamaSilamsi achasene noxolo kunye ne-Israel, uTehran angawaniki ngqwalaselo.

translation.en: What has happened in Palestine in recent years annuls all plans for compromise with the Zionist enemy (Israel) because no plan for Palestine can be implemented in the absence or contrary to the opinions of its owners, the Palestinians, Khamenei said, speaking in Arabic and addressing Palestinians and other Arabs.
translation.xho: Into eyenzekileyo ePalestine kule minyaka idlulileyo itshitshisa zonke izicwangciso zokulalanisa notshaba lwaseZionist (Israeli) kuba akukho sicwangciso sePalestine esinokuthi siphunyezwe xa ingekho okanye ngokuchaseneyo nezimvo zabanini bayo, amaPalestine, utshilo uKhamenei. IsiArabhu kunye nokuthetha nabantu basePalestina kunye namanye ama-Arabhu.

translation.en: Thus, Khamenei said, all previous peace agreements -- such as the 1993 Oslo Accords, the two-state solution to resolve the Israeli-Palestinian conflict,
translation.xho: Ngoko, uKhamenei uthe, zonke izivumelwano zoxolo zangaphambili-ezinje nge-1993 Oslo Accords, isisombululo samazwe amabini ukusombulula impixano yase-Israel-Palestina,

translation.en: And former U.S. President Donald Trump's plan dubbed the Deal of the Century "are null and void".
translation.xho: Kwaye isicwangciso sowayesakuba nguMongameli waseMelika uDonald Trump esibizwa ngokuba yiDeal of the Century "ayinamsebenzi kwaye asinto".

translation.en: President Ebrahim Raisi, Irans military commanders and senior officials also attended the rallies in which people were allowed to march through the streets, the first time since the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic two years ago.
translation.xho: Umongameli u-Ebrahim Raisi, abalawuli basemkhosini base-Iran kunye namagosa aphezulu baye bazimasa iindibano apho abantu babevunyelwa ukuba baqhankqalaze ezitratweni, okokuqala okoko kwaqhambuka isifo esihlasele uzwelonke i-coronavirus kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo.

translation.en: Iran's Jerusalem Day rallies are held annually in support of Palestinians, who want East Jerusalem as the capital of a future state in territories captured by
translation.xho: Imikhosi yase-Iran yeJerusalem Day ibanjwa minyaka le ukuxhasa abantu basePalestina, abafuna i-East Jerusalem ibe likomkhulu lelizwe elizayo kwiindawo ezithinjiweyo.

translation.en: Israel in a 1967 war, on the last Friday of the Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.
translation.xho: I-Israel kwimfazwe ka-1967, ngoLwesihlanu wokugqibela wenyanga yokuzila ukutya yamaSilamsi yeRamadan.

translation.en: Stop your vicious deeds.
translation.xho: Yekani izenzo zenu ezikhohlakeleyo.

translation.en: You know well that we are people of action and reaction," Revolutionary Guards commander Hossein Salami, addressing Israel, told demonstrators in Tehran.
translation.xho: Uyaya kakuhle ukuba singabantu abasebenzayo kunye abasabelayo,”umphathi wabaGadi beNguquko u-Hossein Salami, ethetha no-Israyeli, uxelele abaqhankqalazi eTehran.

translation.en: Our responses are painful.
translation.xho: “Iimpendulo zethu zibuhlungu.

translation.en: You create conditions for your own destruction.
translation.xho: Udala iimeko zokutshabalalisa.

translation.en: We will not leave you alone ...
translation.xho: Asizokushiya wedwa...

translation.en: You know better than me what will befall you if you take evil action."
translation.xho: Wazi ngcono kunam okuya kukwehlela xa uthe wathatha isenzo esibi.

translation.en: Iran's military has vowed to retaliate harshly against any attack by Israel, which has often voiced concern over the Iranian nuclear program.
translation.xho: Umkhosi wase-Iran wenze isibhambathiso sokuziphindezela kabukhali kulo naluphi na uhlaselo lwe-Israel, esoloko ivakalisa inkxalabo ngenkqubo yenyukliya yase-Iran.

translation.en: Tehran says the program is for peaceful purposes only.
translation.xho: UTehran uthi le nkqubo yeyeenjongo zoxolo kuphela.

translation.en: Israel, whose existence the Islamic Republic does not recognize, has long threatened military action against Iran if talks between Tehran and world powers fail to curb Iranian nuclear activity. Iran says its nuclear ambitions are peaceful.
translation.xho: I-Israel, ubukho bayo i-Islamic Republic engabuboniyo, kudala isoyikisa ngenyathelo lomkhosi ngokuchasene ne-Iran ukuba iingxoxo phakathi kweTehran kunye namagunya ehlabathi ziyasilela ukunqanda umsebenzi wenyukliya waseIran. I-Iran ithi amabhongo ayo enyukliya aseluxolweni.

translation.en: In February, the Islamic Republic unveiled its "Kheibar Buster" missile with a range of 1,450 km (900 miles).
translation.xho: NgoFebruwari, i-Islamic Republic yatyhila umjukujelwa wayo othi "Kheibar Buster"  olunoluhlu lweekhilomitha ezili-1,450 (iimayile ezingama-900).

translation.en: Iran, which has one of the biggest missile programs in the Middle East, says its ballistic missiles have a range of up to 2,000 km (1,200 miles) and are capable of reaching its arch-foe Israel and U.S. bases in the region.
translation.xho: I-Iran, eneyona nkqubo inkulu yemijukujelwa kuMbindi Mpuma, ithi imijukujelwa yayo ye-ballistic inoluhlu oluya kuthi ga kwi-2,000 yeekhilomitha (1,200 imayile) kwaye iyakwazi ukufikelela kutshaba lwayo olukhulu u-Israyeli kunye neziseko zase-US kulo mmandla.

translation.en: Kheibar refers to an ancient Jewish oasis in the Arabian Peninsula's Hijaz region that was overrun by Muslim warriors in the 7th century.
translation.xho: I-Kheibar ibhekisela kwindawo yamandulo yamaYuda yase-Arabia kwi-Hijaz ingingqi ye-Hijaz eyathi yahlaselwa ngamajoni amaSilamsi ngenkulungwane ye-7.

translation.en: Tehran regards its ballistic missile program as an important deterrent against the United States, Israel and other adversaries, and has rejected Western demands to halt it.
translation.xho: I-Tehran ithatha inkqubo yemijukujelwa njengesithintelo esibalulekileyo ngokuchasene ne-United States, i-Israel kunye nezinye iintshaba, kwaye izalile iimfuno zaseNtshona zokuyimisa.

translation.en: Over the past year, Iran and the United States have engaged in fitful, indirect talks in Vienna to revive a 2015 nuclear deal that then-President Donald Trump reneged on in 2018 and that Iran, in turn, began violating in 2019.
translation.xho: Kunyaka ophelileyo, i-Iran kunye ne-United States ziye zabandakanyeka kwiingxoxo ezifanelekileyo, ezingathanga ngqo eVienna zokuvuselela isivumelwano senyukliya sonyaka ka-2015 awathi ngoko uMongameli uDonald Trump wasirhoxisa ngo-2018 kwaye i-Iran, nayo, yaqala ukowophula ngo-2019.

translation.en: Under the 2015 deal, Iran agreed to limit its nuclear program in return for relief from economic sanctions.
translation.xho: Ngaphantsi kwesivumelwano sika-2015, i-Iran yavuma ukunciphisa inkqubo yayo yenyukliya ukuze ifumane isiqabu kwizohlwayo zezoqoqosho.

translation.en: While they appeared close to resurrecting the deal in March, talks stalled over last-minute Russian demands and whether Washington might drop Iran's Revolutionary Guards from its Foreign Terrorist Organization list.
translation.xho: Ngelixa babonakala besondele ekuvuseni isivumelwano ngo-Matshi, iingxoxo zamisa kwiimfuno zaseRussia zomzuzu wokugqibela kunye nokuba iWashington inokulahla iRevolutionary Guards yase-Iran kuluhlu lwayo loMbutho wabanqolobi bangaphandle.

translation.en: As Fewer Americans Attend Church, Can Coffee Shops Fill the Void?
translation.xho: Njengoko bambalwa abantu baseMelika abaya eCaweni, ingaba iivenkile zekofu zinako ukuzalisa ililize?

translation.en: Churches and other houses of worship have historically played critical social and political functions in American society.
translation.xho: Iicawe kunye nezinye izindlu zonqulo ngokwembali bezidlala indima ebalulekileyo yezentlalo nezopolitiko kuluntu lwaseMelika.

translation.en: But fewer people are attending religious services, and the decline of churches and other houses of worship threatens to leave a void that could potentially be filled by coffee shops.
translation.xho: Kodwa bambalwa abantu abaya kwiinkonzo zonqulo, kwaye ukuwohloka kweecawe kunye nezinye izindlu zonqulo kusongela ukushiya indawo enokuthi ivalwe ziivenkile zekofu.

translation.en: For so much of American history, the church has really been — or their congregations have really been — essential, providing an unheralded role in providing cohesion and connectedness in communities … encouraging civic engagement and political participation, says Daniel Cox, director of the Survey Center on American Life and a senior fellow at the American Enterprise Institute.
translation.xho: Kwimbali enkulu yaseMelika, icawe ibiyeyona nto ibalulekileyo - okanye amabandla abo ebebalulekile, ebonelela ngendima engachazwanga ekuboneleleni ngentsebenziswano kunye nokunxibelelana eluntwini ... Iziko loPhando kuBomi baseMelika kunye nomntu ophezulu kwiZiko loShishino laseMelika.

translation.en: It was not happenstance or luck that the civil rights movement emerged out of the church, Cox says.
translation.xho: “Ayizange ibe sisenzeko nje okanye ithamsanqa ukuba umbutho wamalungelo abantu uphume ecaweni,” utshilo uCox.

translation.en: And you see that cross-culturally … whether it's in predominantly white rural communities, in the suburbs, wherever, churches have historically been really, really important.
translation.xho: Kwaye uyayibona loo nto ngokwenkcubeko ... nokuba kukwiindawo ezihlala abantu abamhlophe ubukhulu becala, kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni, naphi na apho, iicawe bezikade zibalulekile ngokwembali.

translation.en: Churches and other houses of worship have also played a role in helping immigrants assimilate once they arrive in America, Cox says.
translation.xho: Iinkonzo kunye nezinye izindlu zonqulo nazo ziye zadlala indima ekuncedeni abantu abavela kwamanye amazwe ukuba bafane bakuba befikile eMelika, utshilo uCox.

translation.en: In 1999, 70% of Americans said they belonged to a church, mosque or synagogue.
translation.xho: Ngo-1999, i-70% yabantu baseMelika bathi bangamalungu enkonzo, i-mosque okanye indlu yesikhungu.

translation.en: By 2020, that number had dropped to 47%.
translation.xho: Ngo-2020, elo nani lehle laya kutsho kuma-47%.

translation.en: A 2019 survey found that only about three in 10 Americans say they attend weekly religious services.
translation.xho: Uvavanyo luka-2019 lufumanise ukuba bathathu kwabalishumi abantu baseMelika abathi baya kwiinkonzo zeveki ngeveki.

translation.en: Third places  Lack of involvement and affiliation with churches, mosques and synagogues means people might be missing out on what urban sociologist Ray
translation.xho: Iindawo zesithathu Ukunqongophala kokubandakanyeka kunye nokuzibandakanya neecawe, iimosque kunye nezindlu zesikhungu kuthetha ukuba abantu banokuphoswa yintoni isazi ngentlalo yoluntu uRay.

translation.en: Oldenburg dubbed as "third places" — public gathering spots that offer something that home, the "first place," and work, the "second place," might not.
translation.xho: U-Oldenburg ezibizwa ngokuba  "ziindawo zesithathu" - iindawo zokuhlanganisana zikawonke-wonke ezibonelela ngento ethile ekhaya, "indawo yokuqala," kunye nomsebenzi, "indawo yesibini," azingenako zona.

translation.en: Oldenburg argued that third places are critical to a communitys social vitality.
translation.xho: U-Oldenburg waxoxa ukuba iindawo zesithathu zibalulekile kubomi boluntu ekuhlaleni.

translation.en: An October 2021 survey conducted by the American Survey Center found that commercial spaces like coffee houses foster trust and connection in American communities and could help fill the void left by churches.
translation.xho: Uphando luka-Okthobha ku-2021 olwenziwa yiAmerican Survey Center lufumanise ukuba iindawo zorhwebo njengezindlu zekofu zikhuthaza ukuthembana kunye noqhagamshelo kuluntu lwaseMelika kwaye inokunceda ukuvala isithuba esishiywe ziinkonzo.

translation.en: If you're a regular at a cafe, the barista may know what you usually order, and they can make it for you, and that feels good, says clinical psychologist Dr.
translation.xho: Ukuba uqhelekile kwindawo yokusela ikofu, umenzi kofu unokuyazi into oqhele ukuyi-odola, kwaye bakwenzele yona, kwaye oko kuvakala kulungile, utsholo ugqirha wolwazi ngengqondo.

translation.en: Maria Espinola, an assistant professor in the Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Neuroscience at the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine.
translation.xho: UMaria Espinola, unjingalwazi oncedisayo kwiDepartment of Psychiatry and Behavioural Neuroscience kwiYunivesithi yaseCincinnati College of Medicine.

translation.en: It feels good to be recognized, to know that people are expecting you, to know that people care about you, to know that you belong, because the need for belonging and human connection is a fundamental need that we all have, and it's important to have that fulfilled in different ways, Espinola says.
translation.xho: Kuvakala kumnandi ukuqatshelwa, ukwazi ukuba abantu bakulindele, ukwazi ukuba abantu bakukhathalele, ukwazi ukuba unendawo, kuba imfuno yokuba nendawo kunye nokunxibelelana kwabantu sisidingo esisisiseko esinayo sonke, kwaye kubalulekile. ukuba oko kuzalisekiswe ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo,”utshilo uEspinola.

translation.en: So, places like third places can allow us to do that.
translation.xho: Ke, iindawo ezinjengeendawo zesithathu zinokusivumela ukuba senze loo nto.

translation.en: In the past, churches and other houses of worship have been a third place for many Americans.
translation.xho: Ngaphambili, iinkonzo nezinye izindlu zonqulo beziyindawo yesithathu kubantu abaninzi baseMerika.

translation.en: In 2019, 67% of people surveyed said they have a third place
translation.xho: Ngo-2019, iipesenti ezingama-67 zabantu abaphononongwayo bathi banendawo yesithathu

translation.en: a coffee shop, bar, restaurant, park or other places in their community that they visit regularly.
translation.xho: ivenkile yekofu, indawo yokusela, indawo yokutya, ipaki okanye ezinye iindawo kwiindawo abahlala kuzo abazindwendwela rhoqo.

translation.en: That number dropped to 56% in 2021 — a number that could have been affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.xho: Elo nani lehle laya kutsho kwi-56% ngo-2021 - inani elinokuchatshazelwa sisifo sikazwelonke i-COVID-19.

translation.en: What we found was that people who had a third place were much more connected to their community, says Cox.
translation.xho: “Into esiyifumeneyo kukuba abantu ababenendawo yesithathu banxibelelene kakhulu noluntu lwabo,” utshilo uCox.

translation.en: They're much more likely to engage in other activities there.
translation.xho: “Babonakala besenza ezinye izinto apho.

translation.en: They are much more trusting of their neighbors. There's a whole great array of positive social outcomes that were connected to having a third place … and for a lot of Americans, it's a coffee shop or a cafe."
translation.xho: Bakholose ngakumbi ngabamelwane babo. Kukho uluhlu olukhulu lweziphumo ezilungileyo zentlalo ezidityaniswe nokuba nendawo yesithathu ... kwaye kubantu abaninzi baseMelika, yivenkile yekofu okanye ikhefi. "

translation.en: What coffee shops have in their favor is that they can be found almost everywhere, all over the country,
translation.xho: Into iivenkile zekofu ezinayo ezizisebenzelayo kukuba zifumaneka phantse kuyo yonke indawo, kulo lonke ilizwe,

translation.en: And anyone who wants to can stop by regularly.
translation.xho: Kwaye nabani na ofuna ukuya angaya rhoqo.

translation.en: And many are open most days of the week.
translation.xho: Kwaye ezininzi zivuliwe iintsuku ezininzi zeveki.

translation.en: Cox says even brief coffee shop encounters can increase a sense of belonging.
translation.xho: U-Cox uthi kwa iindibano ezimfutshane kwivenkile yekofu zinokunyusa imvakalelo yokuba izive unendawo.

translation.en: I think there's a lot of potential here, and a lot of it is unrealized potential, Cox says.
translation.xho: “Ndicinga ukuba zininzi izinto ezinokwenzeka apha, kwaye uninzi lwazo lunezinto ezingekafezekiswa,” utshilo uCox.

translation.en: But in terms of what they could do, there's a lot there.
translation.xho: Kodwa malunga nento abanokuyenza, kuninzi apho.

translation.en: I've been in places where the same group of folks come in there to play chess.
translation.xho: Ndikhe ndakwiindawo apho iqela elifanayo labantu liza kudlala ichess.

translation.en: Or they have their informal bunch of retirees. …
translation.xho: Okanye baneqela labo elingekho sikweni labadlali abathathe umhlala-phantsi. …

translation.en: They just got together, and they talked and chatted and caught up with each other. …
translation.xho: Badibana nje, bancokola bancokola baxelelana ngobomi babo. …

translation.en: I don't know where else they would have gone — maybe a church, but maybe not — to share information, to encourage each other to maybe get involved in an activity.
translation.xho: Andazi ukuba bebengaya ngaphi na—mhlawumbi ecaweni, kodwa mhlawumbi hayi—ukwabelana ngolwazi, ukukhuthazana ukuba mhlawumbi babandakanyeke kumsebenzi othile.

translation.en: And I think that is what is so powerful about coffee shops."
translation.xho: Kwaye ndicinga ukuba le yeyona nto inamandla malunga neevenkile zekofu. "

translation.en: Are COVID-19 Restrictions Stunting Children’s Immune Systems?
translation.xho: Ingaba izithintelo ze-COVID-19 ziyawoyisa amajoni omzimba abantwana?

translation.en: Some medical experts have expressed concern that COVID-19 preventative measures, like masking and remote schooling, are potentially weakening childrens immune systems by shielding them from the usual childhood illnesses.
translation.xho: Ezinye iingcali zonyango zivakalise inkxalabo yokuba amanyathelo othintelo lwe-COVID-19, njengokugquma imaski kunye nokufundela emakhaya, anokuthi enze buthathaka amajoni omzimba wabantwana ngokubakhusela kwizigulo eziqhelekileyo zobuntwana.

translation.en: There are a lot of reasons to believe that kids need to be exposed to things to keep their immunity complex, so that should they encounter something very dangerous, they have aspects of their immunity that might cross over and help protect them against those things, says Sara Sawyer, a professor of molecular, cellular and developmental biology at the University of Colorado Boulder.
translation.xho: Zininzi izizathu zokukholelwa ukuba abantwana kufuneka bavezwe kwizinto zokugcina amajoni emizimba yabo enamandla, ukuze ukuba bathe badibana nento eyingozi kakhulu, banamanye amajoni omzimba okunokuthi awele kwaye ancede abakhusele kwezo zinto. Utsho uSara Sawyer, unjingalwazi webhayoloji yemolekyuli, yeselula kunye nophuhliso kwiYunivesithi yaseColorado Boulder.

translation.en: At birth, vulnerable infants get antibodies from their mothers breast milk, which helps protect them until they can build their own immunity.
translation.xho: Ekuzalweni, iintsana ezisesichengeni zifumana izilwa-buhlungu ezisuka kunina kubisi lwebele, oluzinceda luzikhusele de zibe nokwakha owazo amajoni omzimba.

translation.en: Its no accident that babies start putting things in their mouths as soon as they gain enough dexterity to pick things up.
translation.xho: Akuyongozi ukuba iintsana ziqalise ukubeka izinto emilonyeni yazo ngokukhawuleza nje ukuba zizuze ubugcisa obaneleyo bokuthatha izinto.

translation.en: They're doing that because they're sampling the environment and building their immunity.
translation.xho: “Bayenza loo nto ngenxa yokuba bavavanya imekobume kwaye bakha amajoni omzimba.

translation.en: That's an evolutionary trait," Sawyer says.
translation.xho: Luphawu lokutshintsha kwezinto,” utshilo uSawyer.

translation.en: Theyre exposing their body to germs in a certain, level way to build their immunity.
translation.xho: “Baveza imizimba yabo kwiintsholongwane ngendlela ethile, ekumgangatho wokwakha amajoni emizimba yabo.

translation.en: So, some people would argue that childhood illnesses, like colds and stomach bugs, build our immunity so that when more dangerous things come along, we're prepared and we don't get as sick from those more dangerous things."
translation.xho: Ngoko ke, abanye abantu banokuthi izigulo zobuntwana, ezinjengokubanda kunye nesisu, zakha amajoni omzimba ukuze xa kuvela izinto eziyingozi ngakumbi, sizilungiselele kwaye singaguli ngenxa yezo zinto ziyingozi."

translation.en: Even before the pandemic, epidemiological evidence suggested that children in more developed countries, where handwashing and the use of sanitizer are more prevalent, might have less-developed immune systems compared to kids in developing nations who are routinely exposed to more bacteria, viruses and allergens.
translation.xho: Ngaphambi kwesifo sikazwelonke, ubungqina be-epidemiology bacebisa ukuba abantwana abakumazwe aphuhlileyo, apho ukuhlanjwa kwezandla kunye nokusetyenziswa kwesicoci sezifo kuxhaphake kakhulu, banokuba namajoni omzimba angaphuhlisiyo xa kuthelekiswa nabantwana abakumazwe asakhasayo abasoloko bedibana neebhaktheriya ezininzi, iintsholongwane kunye nezinto ezinokuthi zenzeke.

translation.en: This makes kids in more industrialized countries more vulnerable to developing autoimmune diseases, according to whats known as the "hygiene hypothesis."
translation.xho: Oku kwenza abantwana kumazwe ahambela phambili kwezoqoqosho babe sesichengeni sokuphuhlisa izifo ezizimelayo, ezaziwa ngokuba yi "hygiene hypothesis."

translation.en: The hygiene hypothesis is actually quite controversial because it's thought that our exposure to microbes isn't the only factor, says Cody Warren, a virologist and immunologist who is a postdoctoral fellow at the University of Colorado Boulder.
translation.xho: “IHygiene Hyphothesis eneneni iyaxabanisa kuba kucingelwa ukuba ukudibana kwethu neentsholongwane ayisiyiyo yodwa into,” utshilo uCody Warren, ugqirha wentsholongwane kunye nogcino lwamajoni omzimba osebenza  kwiYunivesithi yaseColorado Boulder.

translation.en: A lot of this could also be dictated by genetics, diet, and the environment that we live in.
translation.xho: “Uninzi lwale nto lunokuchazwa lufuzo, ukutya, kunye nendawo esihlala kuyo.

translation.en: That also shapes our immune system… it's a real multifactorial thing that we can't fully account for just by wearing masks.
translation.xho: Oku kubumba amajoni ethu omzimba… yinto yokwenyani enezinto ezininzi esingenako ukuziphendulela ngokupheleleyo ngokunxiba iimaski.

translation.en: There are other things that go into that equation."
translation.xho: Kukho ezinye izinto ezingena kulo mba."

translation.en: Warren, the father of three young children, says spending lots of time outdoors is one way to balance the negatives of isolation.
translation.xho: UWarren, utata wabantwana abathathu abancinci, uthi ukuchitha ixesha elininzi ngaphandle yenye yeendlela zokulinganisa izinto ezingalunganga zokuba wedwa.

translation.en: Just exploring microbes in the environment also is benefiting [and] training our immune system, Warren says.
translation.xho: “Ukuphonononga nje iintsholongwane kwindawo esingqongileyo kuluncedo [kwaye] nokuqeqesha amajoni ethu omzimba,” utshilo uWarren.

translation.en: Our immune systems get trained through the foods that we eat, which also have microorganisms on them.
translation.xho: “Amajoni ethu omzimba aqeqeshwa ngokutya esikutyayo, okunezinto ezincinci esingaziboniyo kuko.

translation.en: And so, despite the fact that we've kind of been hunkered down a little bit, I do feel that our immune systems will catch up."
translation.xho: Kwaye ke, ngaphandle kwento yokuba sikhe sabambeka kancinci, diyaqonda ukukuba amajoni ethu omzimba azakubambelela.”

translation.en: There are other things parents can do, he says, to boost their childrens immune systems during pandemic times.
translation.xho: Kukho ezinye izinto abazali abanokuzenza, utsho, ukomeleza amajoni omzimba kubantwana babo ngamaxesha obhubhane.

translation.en: One of the most important things you can do is just to stay up to date on vaccines.
translation.xho: “Enye yezona zinto zibalulekileyo onokuthi uzenze kukuhlala usexesheni ngezitofu zokugonya.

translation.en: That's one of the best ways that we have to train our immune systems," Warren says.
translation.xho: Le yenye yeendlela ezilungileyo ekufuneka siqeqeshele amajoni ethu omzimba,” utshilo uWarren.

translation.en: But also, equally important is making sure our children have a good diet and they regulate stress.
translation.xho: Kodwa kwakhona, okubaluleke ngokulinganayo kukuqinisekisa ukuba abantwana bethu banokutya okufanelekileyo kwaye balawula uxinzelelo.

translation.en: It's been well documented that both of those — having a good diet, a less stressful environment — can have a positive impact on our immune system."
translation.xho: Kubhalwe kakuhle ukuba zombini ezi-zokutya okulungileyo, indawo ephantsi koxinzelelo-zinokuba nefuthe elihle kumajoni ethu omzimba. "

translation.en: Once public health officials say masks are no longer necessary, Sawyer thinks pointing out the positives of putting our masks away could reassure hesitant parents who worry about their children getting sick.
translation.xho: Nje ukuba amagosa ezempilo karhulumente athi iimaski azisafuneki, uSawyer ucinga ukuba ukukhomba izinto ezintle zokubeka iimaski zethu kunokuqinisekisa abazali abathandabuzayo abanexhala lokugula kwabantwana babo.

translation.en: Maybe we should have a public conversation about the possible reasons to take that mask off, if they are in school, and get back to the normal repertoire of relatively safe childhood illnesses, she says.
translation.xho: “Mhlawumbi kufuneka sibe nencoko esidlangalaleni malunga nezizathu ezinokubakho zokususa lo maski, ukuba basesikolweni, kwaye sibuyele kwindawo eqhelekileyo yezigulo zobuntwana ezikhuselekileyo,” utshilo.

translation.en: The plus side of childhood illnesses is that they can build up that hornet's nest of immunity that could protect kids aagainst new things that then come along.
translation.xho: Elona cala libalaseleyo lezigulo zobuntwana kukuba banokwakha indlwane ye-hornet yokungakhuseleki enokukhusela abantwana kwizinto ezintsha ezizayo.

translation.en: World Bank, Nike Team Up for 'The Girl Effect' Initiative
translation.xho: IWolrd Bank, iqela likaNike ziyasebenzisana ngenxa 'ye The Girl Effect'

translation.en: The Adolescent Girls Initiative partners the World Bank, the Nike Foundation and governments of developing and developed nations to empower girls in poor countries.
translation.xho: I-Adolescent Girls Initiative isebenzisana neWorld Bank, i-Nike Foundation kunye noorhulumente bezizwe eziphuhlayo kunye neziphuhlileyo ukuxhobisa amantombazana kumazwe ahluphekileyo.

translation.en: The two-year-old program is helping girls in Asia, Africa and the Middle East gain the education and skills they need to transition into the workforce.
translation.xho: Inkqubo eneminyaka emibini ubudala inceda amantombazana aseAsia, eAfrika naseMbindi Mpuma ukuba afumane imfundo kunye nezakhono ezifunekayo ukuze atshintshele emsebenzini.

translation.en: My name is Sanchita. I come from a small village called Ishwarpur in Bangladesh, American actress Anne Hathaway delivered her lines as powerfully from behind
translation.xho: Igama lam nguSanchita. Ndivela kwidolophana encinane ebizwa ngokuba yi-Ishwarpur e-Bangladesh, umlingisi waseMelika u-Anne Hathaway wahambisa imigca yakhe ngamandla emva

translation.en: podium at the World Bank as she does on the silver screen, telling the story of an impoverished girl.
translation.xho: kwepodium kwiBhanki yehlabathi njengoko wenza kwisikrini sesilivere, echaza ibali lentombazana ehlwempuzekileyo.

translation.en: When a baby is born in Ishwarpur, families desperately hope it will be a boy, she continued.
translation.xho: “Xa umntwana ezalwa e-Ishwarpur, iintsapho zinethemba lokuba iya kuba yinkwenkwe,” uqhubeke watsho.

translation.en: It has been this way for as long as anyone can remember.
translation.xho: “Ibinjalo ixesha elide njengoko nabani na enokukhumbula.

translation.en: It is believed that boys will contribute to the family income in a place where people are very poor.
translation.xho: Kukholelwa ukuba amakhwenkwe aya kuba negalelo kumvuzo wentsapho kwindawo apho abantu bahlupheka kakhulu.

translation.en: These circumstances are familiar to those who benefit from the Adolescent Girls Initiative.
translation.xho: “Ezi meko ziqhelekile kwabo baxhamlayo kwiAdolescent Girls Initiative.

translation.en: Who benefits?A dozen such teenage girls and young women visited the World Bank from developing Asian, Middle Eastern and African countries.
translation.xho: Ngoobani abaxhamlayo? Ishumi elinesibini lamantombazana akwishumi elivisayo kunye nabasetyhini abasebatsha batyelele iBhanki yeHlabathi besuka kumazwe asaphuhlayo aseAsia, kuMbindi Mpuma kunye namazwe aseAfrika.

translation.en: They were just a few of the girls who benefit from training and education programs that help them transition from school to employment.
translation.xho: Yayingamantombazana ambalwa azuzayo kwiinkqubo zoqeqesho nemfundo ezibanceda batshintshe isikolo baye emsebenzini.

translation.en: Hathaway told the audience that, with the help of a development organization, Sanchita gained an education and borrowed $60 to buy a cow and start a vegetable garden.
translation.xho: UHathaway uxelele abaphulaphuli ukuba, ngoncedo lombutho wophuhliso, uSanchita wafumana imfundo waza waboleka i-60 yeedola ukuze athenge inkomo aze aqalise isitiya semifuno.

translation.en: The teenage girl could then afford to pay her own school fees, as well as her brother's, and contribute to her family in such a way that Sanchita's parents hope she does not marry any time soon.
translation.xho: Intombazana ekwishumi elivisayo yayinokukwazi ukuzihlawulela imali yesikolo, kunye neyomninawa wayo, ize ibe negalelo kwintsapho yakowayo ngendlela yokuba abazali bakaSanchita babe nethemba lokuba akayi kutshata kungekudala.

translation.en: Hathaway spoke of her own childhood in a comfortable suburban U.S. neighborhood, and of a time when she had no idea about the kind of circumstances Sanchita faced nor how much girls need safe spaces for education.
translation.xho: UHathaway wathetha ngobuntwana bakhe kwindawo ekhululekileyo yase-US, kunye nexesha apho wayengazi malunga nohlobo lweemeko uSanchita ajongene nazo nokuba angakanani na amantombazana adinga iindawo ezikhuselekileyo zokufunda.

translation.en: Places that could teach them how to take the light they have as girls and ignite the world, explained Hathaway.
translation.xho: “Iindawo ezinokubafundisa indlela yokuthatha ukukhanya abanako njengamantombazana kwaye bakhanyise ihlabathi,” ucacise watsho uHathaway.

translation.en: I wouldn't know how much the world needs 'The Girl Effect.'
translation.xho: Andiyi kukwazi ukuba ihlabathi lifuna kangakanani 'i-Girl Effect.'

translation.en: Girl powerThe Girl Effect" is what the Adolescent Girls Initiative wants to see happen for 600 million girls in developing countries.
translation.xho: Amandla entombazana"Isiphumo sentombazana" yile nto i-Adolescent Girls Initiative ifuna ukuyibona isenzeka kumantombazana angama-600 ezigidi kumazwe asakhasayo.

translation.en: Overall, an estimated one-third of young women in developing nations are not employed and not in school.
translation.xho: Lilonke, kuqikelelwa ukuba isinye kwisithathu samabhinqa aselula kumazwe asakhasayo akaqeshwanga yaye akafundanga.

translation.en: World Bank President Robert Zoellick said underinvesting in girls impedes development.
translation.xho: Umongameli weBhanki yeHlabathi uRobert Zoellick uthe ukungatyali mali kumantombazana kuyaphazamisa uphuhliso.

translation.en: He added that educating girls also makes sense for poor families, noting that an extra year of secondary schooling can raise their wages by 10 to 20 percent.
translation.xho: Wongeze ngelithi, ukufundisa amantombazana kuyavakala nakwiintsapho ezihluphekayo, esithi unyaka owongezelelweyo wemfundo yamabanga aphakamileyo unganyusa umvuzo wabo nge-10 ukuya ku-20 ekhulwini.

translation.en: If they earn greater income they also have greater access to reproductive health information and services, so then more likely to delay marriage and childbirth, have healthier babies and attain higher literacy rates, Zoellick said.
translation.xho: “Ukuba bafumana umvuzo omkhulu banokufikelela ngakumbi kulwazi kunye neenkonzo zempilo yokuzala, ngoko ke banokulibazisa umtshato kunye nokuzala, babe neentsana ezisempilweni kwaye bafikelele kumazinga aphezulu okufunda,” utshilo uZoellick.

translation.en: The evidence strongly suggests that investing in adolescent girls is a key way to break inter-generational patterns of poverty.
translation.xho: Ubungqina bubonisa ngokuqinisekileyo ukuba utyalo-mali kumantombazana afikisayo yindlela ephambili yokuqhawula iipatheni zentlupheko phakathi kwezizukulwana.

translation.en: Current operations The Adolescent Girls Initiative public-private partnership, with its $20 million in funds, is already at
translation.xho: Imisebenzi yangoku I-Adolescent Girls Initiative ubambiswano phakathi kukarhulumente nabucala, kunye ne-20 yezigidi zeerandi kwinkxaso-mali, sele ikwi-

translation.en: work in seven countries, with plans to expand to Haiti and Yemen.
translation.xho: ukusebenza kumazwe asixhenxe, ngezicwangciso zokwandisa ukuya eHaiti naseYemen.

translation.en: Mayra Buvinic talks about the Adolescent Girls Initiative.
translation.xho: UMayra Buvinic uthetha ngeAdolescent Girls Initiative.

translation.en: So where we are in Liberia and Nepal, young women are completing the first rounds of training, explained Mayra Buvinic, director of Gender and Development at the World Bank.
translation.xho: Ngoko apho siseLiberia naseNepal, abafazi abancinci bagqiba imijikelo yokuqala yoqeqesho, kuchaza uMayra Buvinic, umlawuli weGender kunye noPhuhliso kwiBhanki yehlabathi.

translation.en: In South Sudan, 100 adolescent girls' clubs will have opened in four states by the end of this month.
translation.xho: “Emazantsi eSudan, i-100 leeklabhu zamantombazana ezifikisayo ziya kube zivuliwe kumazwe amane ekupheleni kwale nyanga.

translation.en: In Jordan, female community college graduates are gaining access to vouchers.
translation.xho: EJordani, abasetyhini abaphumelele kwiikholeji zasekuhlaleni bafumana ukufikelela kwiivawutsha.

translation.en: In Afghanistan, Lao PDR and Rwanda, assessments are being completed, and the projects will be launched at the end of this quarter.
translation.xho: E-Afghanistan, eLao PDR naseRwanda, uvavanyo luyagqitywa, kwaye iiprojekthi ziya kuqaliswa ekupheleni kwale kota.

translation.en: Thanks and praise Kebbeh Kamara tells the audience how she's benefited from the World Bank/Nike initiative
translation.xho: “Enkosi kwaye simdumise uKebbeh Kamara uxelela abaphulaphuli ukuba uxhamle njani kwiBhanki yeHlabathi/inyathelo likaNike.

translation.en: Kebbeh Kamara said she has benefited from training in Greater Monrovia, Liberia.
translation.xho: U-Kebbeh Kamara uthe uzuze kuqeqesho e-Greater Monrovia, eLiberia.

translation.en: Wearing a pink dress and sporty black headband decorated with rhinestones, she addressed the World Bank audience from the stage.
translation.xho: Enxibe ilokhwe epinki kunye nentloko emnyama yezemidlalo ehonjiswe ngeerhinestones, wathetha nabaphulaphuli beBhanki yehlabathi ukusuka kwinqanaba.

translation.en: I learned how to start a business, how to earn money on your own, how to be self-sustainable, she said, "how to save money and what to spend money for.
translation.xho: “Ndafunda indlela yokuqalisa ishishini, indlela yokuzenzela imali ngokwakho, indlela yokuzimela,” utshilo, “indlela yokonga imali kunye nento ekufuneka uyichithele.

translation.en: Sarah Poni Saturnino, 19, of Juba, Southern Sudan, told VOA she is enjoying her first trip to the United States and all the empowerment training and activities.
translation.xho: USarah Poni Saturnino, oneminyaka eyi-19, waseJuba, eSouth Sudan, uxelele iVOA ukuba uyonwabela uhambo lwakhe lokuqala oluya eUnited States kunye nalo lonke uqeqesho lokuxhotyiswa kunye nemisebenzi.

translation.en: She said she hopes to take the lessons she has learned here in workshops back to the Adolescent Girls Initiative clubs in Southern Sudan.
translation.xho: Uthe unethemba lokuthatha izifundo azifundileyo apha kwiindibano zocweyo ezibuyela kwiiklabhu zeAdolescent Girls Initiative eSouthern Sudan.

translation.en: I learned about how to express yourself.
translation.xho: “Ndifunde indlela yokuthetha.

translation.en: Eye contact.
translation.xho: Uqhagamshelo lamehlo.

translation.en: Speak loud," explained Saturnino.
translation.xho: Thetha phezulu,” ucacise watsho uSaturnino.

translation.en: This way can give me really a voice to speak in front of people.
translation.xho: Le ndlela inokundinika ngokwenene ilizwi lokuthetha phambi kwabantu.

translation.en: And even if I go back home, I'm not longer Sarah again -- I'm somebody now."
translation.xho: Kwaye nokuba ndibuyela ekhaya, andisenguye uSarah kwakhona--ndingumntu ngoku."

translation.en: Somebody who has earned the admiration of a fellow Southern Sudanese citizen, child-soldier-turned-rapper Emmanuel Jal.
translation.xho: Umntu ofumene ukunconywa ngummi waseMazantsi eSudan, ijoni elijike- rapper u-Emmanuel Jal.

translation.en: A supporter of the Adolescent Girls Initiative, Jal performed at the World Bank event.
translation.xho: Umxhasi weAdolescent Girls Initiative, uJal udlale kumsitho weBhanki yehlabathi.

translation.en: The girls joined him on stage, beaming as they danced behind him -- as did at least one World Bank official -- while the audience of staffers in business suits took to their feet and raised their hands in the air as well.
translation.xho: Amantombazana adibana naye eqongeni, eqaqamba njengoko ayedanisa emva kwakhe -- njengoko lenza igosa elinye leBhanki yeHlabathi ubuncinane -- ngeli lixa ababukeli babasebenzi ababenxibe iisuti zoshishino bema ngeenyawo bephakamisela izandla emoyeni nabo.

translation.en: Activists Press for Better Help to End Congo Rapes
translation.xho: Amatshantliziyo anyanzelisa uncedo olungcono lokuphelisa udlwengulo lwaseCongo

translation.en: As U.N. Special Representative for Sexual Violence In Conflict Margot Wallstrom embarks on a new trip to the Democratic Republic of Congo, two activists recently concluded lobbying efforts in the United States for more effective action on trying to end conflict-related rapes in Congo.
translation.xho: Njengoko ummeli okhethekileyo we-UN kubundlobongela obuphathelele kwezesondo kungquzulwano uMargot Wallstrom eqalisa uhambo olutsha oluya eDemocratic Republic of Congo, amatshantliziyo amabini mva nje aqukumbele iinzame zokuphembelela e-United States ngenyathelo elisebenzayo lokuzama ukuphelisa udlwengulo olunxulumene nongquzulwano eCongo.

translation.en: One of them, Justine Masika Bihamba, told a gathering of Washington, D.C., university students and concerned citizens that
translation.xho: Omnye wabo, uJustine Masika Bihamba, uxelele indibano yaseWashington, D.C., abafundi baseyunivesithi nabemi abaxhalabileyo ukuba

translation.en: the area in which she works, Beni, in North Kivu province, is still overrun by Ugandan rebels who regularly rape women.
translation.xho: ingingqi asebenza kuyo, iBeni, kwiphondo laseNorth Kivu, isagutyungelwe ngabavukeli baseUganda abasoloko bedlwengula abasetyhini.

translation.en: She said in these situations women are considered victims, and are not implicated in the search for peace.
translation.xho: Uthe kwezi meko amanina athathwa njengamaxhoba, kwaye awabandakanyeki ekufuneni uxolo.

translation.en: Striving for peace in the region.
translation.xho: Ukuzabalazela uxolo kulo mmandla.

translation.en: Bihamba coordinates an organization called the Synergy of Women Against Sexual Violence.
translation.xho: UBihamba uququzelela umbutho obizwa ngokuba yiSynergy of Women Against Violence.

translation.en: Counselors with the group have been attacked and threatened because of their work.
translation.xho: Abacebisi kunye neqela baye bahlaselwa kwaye basongelwa ngenxa yomsebenzi wabo.

translation.en: When Bihamba was at work one day, Congolese soldiers attacked her home, and sexually assaulted one of her daughters.
translation.xho: Xa uBihamba wayesemsebenzini ngenye imini, amajoni aseCongo ahlasela ikhaya lakhe, aza axhaphaza ngokwesini enye yeentombi zakhe.

translation.en: Bihamba explained that what is needed - above all - is peace in eastern Congo.
translation.xho: U-Bihamba wachaza ukuba into efunekayo - ngaphezu kwayo yonke into - luxolo empuma yeCongo.

translation.en: She said she believes sexual crimes would go down drastically if fighting stopped.
translation.xho: Uthe ukholelwa ukuba izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ngokwesondo ziyakwehla kakhulu ukuba umlo uyaphela.

translation.en: Activist Donatella Rostagno, from the European network for Central Africa, accompanied Bihamba on her trip to the United States.
translation.xho: Itshantliziyo uDonatella Rostagno, ovela kunxibelelwano lwaseYurophu kuMbindi Afrika, wahamba noBihamba kuhambo lwakhe oluya eUnited States.

translation.en: She said she supports the work being done by the U.N. special representative for sexual violence in conflict.
translation.xho: Uthe uyawuxhasa umsebenzi owenziwa ngummeli okhethekileyo we-UN kubundlobongela obuphathelele kwezesondo kungquzulwano.

translation.en: Rostagno also said feels, however, the international community is not doing enough to stop Congo's war, despite having a large U.N. peacekeeping mission there.
translation.xho: U-Rostagno uphinde wathi, nangona kunjalo, uluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe alwenzi ngokwaneleyo ukumisa imfazwe yaseCongo, nangona inomsebenzi omkhulu wokugcina uxolo we-UN apho.

translation.en: The majority of the actions is made to look at the consequences, to work with the women who are victims, but not enough is done to look at the causes of the rapes and the conflict, said Rostagno.
translation.xho: “Ubuninzi bezenzo zenziwa kujongwe iziphumo, kusetyenzwe nabasetyhini abangamaxhoba, kodwa akwanelanga kujongwa oonobangela bodlwengulo nongquzulwano,” utshilo uRostagno.

translation.en: Deteriorating situation amid global concern.
translation.xho: Imeko iya isiba maxongo phakathi kwenkxalabo yehlabathi.

translation.en: She fears the overall situation in eastern Congo is getting worse, not better - despite the international attention - with rebels, militias, and renegade soldiers still running rampant.
translation.xho: Woyika ukuba imeko xa iyonke kwimpuma yeCongo iya isiba mbi kakhulu, hayi ngcono - ngaphandle kokuhoywa ngamazwe ngamazwe - ngabavukeli, amajoni, kunye namajoni avukelayo asaqhuba.

translation.en: A lot of these rebel groups are getting reorganized, and are even getting in a coalition so the movements that we see in the region, it is worrying us, said Rostagno.
translation.xho: “Uninzi lwala maqela abavukeli aphinde alungelelaniswe, kwaye ade angenele umanyano ngoko ke iintshukumo esizibonayo kulo mmandla, ziyasikhathaza,” utshilo uRostagno.

translation.en: I think we were more optimistic on this region six months ago than today.
translation.xho: “Ndicinga ukuba besinethemba kulo mmandla kwiinyanga ezintandathu ezidlulileyo kunanamhlanje.

translation.en: The United Nations has identified three armed groups that gang raped dozens of people about two months ago in a week-long attack in Luvungi, another part of North Kivu province.
translation.xho: “Umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo uchonge amaqela amathathu axhobileyo adlwengule inkitha yabantu

translation.en: months ago in a week-long attack in Luvungi, another part of North Kivu province.
translation.xho: kwiinyanga ezimbini ezidlulileyo kuhlaselo oluthathe iveki yonke eLuvungi, enye indawo kwiphondo laseNorth Kivu.

translation.en: Those implicated are the Mai Mai Cheka, the Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, and followers of an army deserter, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.
translation.xho: Abo babandakanyekayo nguMai Mai Cheka, iDemocratic Liberation Forces yaseRwanda, kunye nabalandeli bomgqakhwe womkhosi, uColonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.

translation.en: Proposals for improvementDuring their presentation, the two activists, Bihamba and Rostagno, also offered concrete proposals to make the situation better.
translation.xho: Izindululo zokuphuculwangexesha lokunikela kwabo intetho, amatsha ntliziyo amabini, uBihamba noRostagno, nabo banike izindululo ezibambekayo zokwenza imeko ibengcono.

translation.en: Rostagno explained that foreign non-governmental organizations get funding to tackle the issue of sexual violence, but local organizations often get ignored.
translation.xho: URostagno ucacisile ukuba imibutho yangaphandle engekho phantsi kukarhulumente ifumana inkxaso-mali yokuqubisana nomba wobundlobongela obuphathelele kwezesondo, kodwa imibutho yasekuhlaleni ihlala ingahoywa.

translation.en: She said complex applications to get outside funding favor bigger organizations.
translation.xho: Uthe izicelo ezintsonkothileyo zokufumana inkxaso-mali yangaphandle zithanda imibutho emikhulu.

translation.en: They can just do it, they send it, they receive the money.
translation.xho: Bangayenza nje, bayayithumela, bayayifumana imali.

translation.en: The problem is that the money in most cases is spent to pay for the fixed cost of the organization, for the salaries of expat people coming to the region and to the country, while the local non-governmental organizations, those working with the communities, with the women, with the children, in the villages, those who need need money to survive in order to do their work do not have access," said Rostagno.
translation.xho: Ingxaki kukuba imali kwiimeko ezininzi isetyenziselwa ukuhlawula iindleko ezimiselweyo zombutho, kwimivuzo yabantu abaphuma kwamanye amazwe beza kummandla kunye nelizwe, ngelixa imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente, abo basebenzisana noluntu, kunye nabasetyhini, nabantwana, ezilalini, abo bafuna imali ukuze baphile ukuze benze umsebenzi wabo abanakho ukufikelela, "utshilo uRostagno.

translation.en: Bihamba said Congolese soldiers should be paid directly through bank withdrawals, rather than being paid through their superiors.
translation.xho: UBihamba uthe amajoni aseCongo kufuneka ahlawulwe ngokuthe ngqo ngokutsalwa kwemali ebhankini, kunokuba ahlawulwe ngabaphathi bawo.

translation.en: Bihamba said with the current system they receive only about a third of their salary, which causes some soldiers to loot and rape.
translation.xho: UBihamba uthe ngokwenkqubo ekhoyo bafumana kuphela isiqingatha sesithathu somvuzo wabo, nto leyo ebangela ukuba amanye amajoni aphange kwaye adlwengule.

translation.en: She also called for an international tribunal for the Congo to help end general impunity, as well as more local tribunals for raped victims to seek justice.
translation.xho: Ukwamemelele inkundla yamazwe ngamazwe ukuba iCongo incede ukuphelisa ukungohlwaywa ngokubanzi, kunye nenkundla zamatyala zasekuhlaleni zamaxhoba odlwengulo ukuba afune ubulungisa.

translation.en: In North Kivu, where more than 5 million people are estimated to live, she said there are only three tribunals.
translation.xho: EMantla eKivu, apho abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezi-5 baqikelelwa ukuba bahlala khona, uthe kukho iinkundla ezintathu kuphela.

translation.en: Desmond Tutu Retires From Public Life.
translation.xho: UDesmond Tutu Uthatha umhlala-phantsi kuBomi boLuntu.

translation.en: Desmond Tutu fought apartheid in South Africa, and was critical of the war in Iraq.
translation.xho: U-Desmond Tutu walwa ucalucalulo eMzantsi Afrika, kwaye wayegxeka imfazwe yase-Iraq.

translation.en: We waged a war that shouldn't have happened, he said.He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.
translation.xho: “Silwe imfazwe ebekungamelanga yenzeka,” utshilo.Ukwathethe ngokubulawa kwabantu eRwanda.

translation.en: We waged a war that shouldn't have happened, he said.He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.
translation.xho: “Silwe imfazwe ebekungamelanga yenzeka,” utshilo.Ukwathethe ngokubulawa kwabantu eRwanda.

translation.en: God have mercy on us, he said.The retired Anglican archbishop announced in July that he would retire from public life on his birthday.
translation.xho: “UThixo abe nenceba kuthi,” utshilo. Ubhishophu omkhulu waseTshetshi osele esidla umhlala-phantsi ubhengeze ukuba uzakurhoxa kubomi boluntu ngomhla wakhe wokuzalwa.

translation.en: The time has come to slow down, and sip maybe rooibos tea with my beloved wife in the afternoons he said.
translation.xho: “Lifikile ixesha lokuba sithobe isantya, ndisele mhlawumbi iti yerooibos nomfazi wam endimthandayo emva kwemini,” utshilo.

translation.en: Tutu rose through the ranks of the Anglican church in South Africa to become the first black Anglican archbishop of Capetown.
translation.xho: UTutu wenyuka kwinkonzo yamaTshetshi eMzantsi Afrika waba ngu-archbishophu wokuqala omnyama waseTshetshi eKapa.

translation.en: He was a vocal critic of South Africa's white-ruled government and encouraged non-violence to end apartheid.
translation.xho: Wayengumgxeka kakhulu urhulumente woMzantsi Afrika owawulawulwa ngabamhlophe kwaye wayekhuthaza ukungaphathwa ngobundlobongela ukuze kupheliswe ucalucalulo.

translation.en: Tutu was the recipient of many awards, and in 1984, he received a Nobel Peace Prize for advocating "a democratic and just society without racial divisions.
translation.xho: UTutu nguye owafumana iimbasa ezininzi, kwaye ngo-1984, wafumana iwonga leNobel Peace Prize ngokumela "uluntu lwedemokhrasi nolunobulungisa ngaphandle kocalucalulo ngokobuhlanga.

translation.en: He used the recognition to step up the anti-apartheid campaign, calling for an economic boycott against South Africa.
translation.xho: “Wasebenzisa olu lwazi ukuqinisa iphulo lokuchasa ucalu-calulo, ememelela ukuba kugxothwe uMzantsi Afrika kwezoqoqosho.

translation.en: After the end of apartheid, Tutu called it an incredible day when Nelson Mandela won South Africa's first all-race elections.
translation.xho: Emva kokuphela kocalucalulo, uTutu wayibiza ngokuba yimini engakholelekiyo xa uNelson Mandela ephumelele unyulo lokuqala lweentlanga zonke eMzantsi Afrika.

translation.en: I would say the highest point for me was when I stood on the balcony in 1994 to introduce our new, brand new president to South Africa and the world, he said.
translation.xho: “Ndingathi eyona nto iphezulu kum kuxa ndandimi ebhalkhoni ngo-1994 ndisazisa umongameli wethu omtsha kraca eMzantsi Afrika nehlabathi,” utshilo.

translation.en: To help mend the nation, President Mandela appointed Tutu as head of the country's Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
translation.xho: Ukunceda isizwe, uMongameli Mandela wonyula uTutu njengentloko yeKomishoni yeNyaniso noXolelwaniso yelizwe.

translation.en: The group issued a report that included numerous confessions of guilt under apartheid in return for amnesty.
translation.xho: Eli qela likhuphe ingxelo equka izivumo ezininzi zetyala phantsi kocalucalulo ukuze kuxolelwe.

translation.en: It makes specific proposals on how we can cultivate a culture of human rights and of structures to insure that the atrocities of the past will not reoccur, Tutu said.
translation.xho: “Yenza izindululo ezithe ngqo malunga nokuba singayihlakulela njani inkcubeko yamalungelo oluntu kunye neziseko zokuqinisekisa ukuba izenzo zenkohlakalo zangaphambili azizukwenzeka kwakhona,” utshilo uTutu.

translation.en: Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.
translation.xho: UTutu ukwakhankasele ukulwa intlupheko kunye nogawulayo.

translation.en: In recent years, he expressed his disappointment in post-apartheid South Africa, especially the level of violent crime.
translation.xho: Kwiminyaka yakutshanje, uvakalise ukuphoxeka kwakhe kuMzantsi Afrika wasemva kocalucalulo, ingakumbi izinga lolwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela.

translation.en: Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statesmen who campaign for peace and human rights.
translation.xho: Ngaphandle kokurhoxa kubomi boluntu, uTutu uthi uzakuqhubeka nokuxhasa isiseko sakhe soxolo kwaye uzakuhlala eyinxalenye yeqela labadala baseburhulumenteni abakhankasela uxolo kunye namalungelo oluntu.

translation.en: But Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."
translation.xho: Kodwa uTutu uthi akasayi kuphinda enze udliwano-ndlebe kwaye, njengoko eyibeka, "uvale umlomo."

translation.en: I have been part of our struggle for freedom and democracy, and I am part of the celebration that we did succeed, he said.
translation.xho: “Ndibe yinxalenye yomzabalazo wethu wenkululeko nedemokhrasi, kwaye ndiyinxalenye yombhiyozo wokuba siye saphumelela,” utshilo.

translation.en: I have been part of the post apartheid dispensation and long for us to do infinitely better.
translation.xho: “Ndibe yinxalenye yolawulo localucalulo kwaye ndilangazelela ukuba senze ngcono kakhulu.

translation.en: Many say his voice will be missed.
translation.xho: Abaninzi bathi ilizwi lakhe liza kukhunjulwa.

translation.en: Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas.
translation.xho: Isikolo saseMalawi seJacaranda seNkedama siBhiyozela iKrisimesi.

translation.en: The management for the Jacaranda School for Orphans in Malawis commercial capital Blantyre recently hosted a party for its students as it closed for Christmas and New Years Day holidays.
translation.xho: Abaphathi besikolo seNkedama iJacaranda kwikomkhulu lezorhwebo eMalawi iBlantyre kutshanje yenze itheko labafundi baso njengoko besivalile ngeeholide zeKrisimesi noSuku loNyaka oMtsha.

translation.en: Around 500 people including students, staff members and others from surrounding areas attended the event, which was held at the schools premises in Chigumula area.
translation.xho: Bamalunga namakhulu amahlanu abantu abaquka abafundi, abasebenzi nabanye abasuka kwiindawo ezingqongileyo bebezimase lo msitho ububanjelwe kumasango ezikolo kwingingqi yaseChigumula.

translation.en: The party included gifts, Santa Claus, and a "dancing show case" by the students.
translation.xho: Itheko laliquka izipho, uSanta Claus, kunye "netyala lomboniso womdaniso" ngabafundi.

translation.en: The school management told VOA that the yearly celebration has been a school tradition for the past 13years.
translation.xho: Abaphathi besikolo baxelele iVOA ukuba lo mbhiyozo waminyaka le ube sisithethe sesikolo kule minyaka ili-13 idlulileyo.

translation.en: The school's director, Luc Deschamps, said: "[We feel] it is very important for us to celebrate Christmas because the children do not have parents.
translation.xho: Umphathi wesikolo uLuc Deschamps wathi: “[Sivakalelwa kukuba] kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba siyibhiyozele iKrismesi kuba abantwana abanabazali.

translation.en: They stay with either a grandmother or a distant aunt or uncle, and they are not able to cerebrate at home or have a party or a little bit of sweets and cake for the children.
translation.xho: Bahlala nomakhulu okanye umakazi okanye umalume okude, kwaye abakwazi ukwenza imibhiyozo ekhaya okanye ukwenza itheko okanye intwana yeelekese nekeyiki yabantwana.

translation.en: So, we provide a happy day for the children to celebrate the spirit of Christmas.
translation.xho: Ke, sinika usuku olonwabileyo lokuba abantwana babhiyozele umoya weKrisimesi.

translation.en: And it is also a way of our children to learn to give."
translation.xho: Kwaye ikwayindlela yabantwana bethu yokufunda ukupha."

translation.en: No media source currently available.
translation.xho: Akukho mthombo weendaba ukhoyo ngoku.

translation.en: Deschamps, who is also an Honorary Consul of France in Malawi, said before the main event the patrons were treated to "a nice meal" from the students.
translation.xho: UDeschamps, okwanguMmeli oHloniphekileyo waseFrance eMalawi, uthe phambi komsitho ophambili abaxhasi baphathelwe "isidlo esimnandi" esivela kubafundi.

translation.en: We had a big, big lunch with good meat and rice,[the dish made from maize flour called] nsima, of course, and vegetables.
translation.xho: Saba nesidlo esikhulu sasemini kunye nenyama emnandi nerayisi, [isitya esenziwe ngomgubo wombona esibizwa] yinsima, kanye nemifuno.

translation.en: And it was the students themselves who cooked the meal for everybody, for over 500 people," he said.
translation.xho: Kwaye yayingabafundi ngokwabo ababephekela wonke umntu isidlo, abantu abangaphezu kwama-500, ”utshilo.

translation.en: One of the students, Eddah Zimba, said, "The celebrations are really cool, ...
translation.xho: Omnye wabafundi uEddah Zimba uthe, “Imnandi kakhulu imibhiyozo,...

translation.en: I have enjoyed myself.
translation.xho: Ndiye ndazonwabela.

translation.en: I have eaten, and now I am here dancing.
translation.xho: Ndityile, ngoku ndilapha ndiyadanisa.

translation.en: What has interested me most is the gift that we have received the like the puffs, the biscuits, the squash and the dance."
translation.xho: Eyona nto indenze ndanomdla kakhulu sisipho esisifumeneyo ezifana neepuffs, iibhiskithi, umngqusho kunye nomdaniso.

translation.en: She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.
translation.xho: Ubulele abaphathi bezikolo ngokwenza itheko leKrisimesi labafundi abathi kwiimeko ezininzi bangabi nayo imibhiyozo elolu hlobo emakhaya.

translation.en: Another student Emmanuel Chisale said good meal aside, the event has taught him the spirit of sharing.
translation.xho: Omnye umfundi u-Emmanuel Chisale uthe ukutya okumnandi ecaleni, lo msitho umfundise umoya wokwabelana.

translation.en: This party has brought a change in my life.
translation.xho: “Eli qela lizise utshintsho ebomini bam.

translation.en: I have learned that we have to have a heart for sharing one another as the Father Christmas was doing, he said.
translation.xho: Ndifunde ukuba kufuneka sibenentliziyo yokwabelana njengokuba iFather Christmas yayisenza,” utshilo.

translation.en: Founded in 2002, the Jacaranda School for Orphans is the only one in Malawi which provides free primary, secondary and tertiary education to children without parents.
translation.xho: Yasekwa ngo-2002, iJacaranda School for Orphans seso sodwa eMalawi esibonelela ngemfundo yasimahla kubantwana abangenabazali.

translation.en: A Malawian woman, Marie Da Silva, started the school after she returned from the United States where she spent nineteen years working as a nanny.
translation.xho: Inkosikazi yaseMalawi, uMarie Da Silva, waqala esi sikolo emva kokuba ebuyile eMelika apho wachitha iminyaka elishumi elinesithoba esebenza njengonozala.

translation.en: Economists Predict Bumpy Road for Malawi's Economy in 2015.
translation.xho: Iingcali zezoQoqosho zibona amagingxingxi kwindlela eya phambili kuQoqosho lwaseMalawi ngo-2015.

translation.en: Economists in Malawi say the country is likely to continue facing financial challenges in 2015 unless the government can regain the confidence of donors, who are still withholding 40 percent of budgetary support due to the corruption scandal known as Cashgate.
translation.xho: Iingcali zoqoqosho eMalawi zithi eli lizwe kusenokwenzeka ukuba liqhubeleke lijongene nemingeni yemali ngo-2015 ngaphandle kokuba urhulumente angaphinda athembeke kubaxhasi, abasabambe umyinge wamashumi amane eepesenti ekhulwini wenkxaso yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali ngenxa yorhwaphilizo olwaziwa njengeCashgate.

translation.en: More than $30 million were looted from government coffers in the scandal, and several people, including government officials, were arrested.
translation.xho: Imali engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-30 zeerandi yaphangwa kwingxowa-mali karhulumente kulo manyala, yaye abantu abaliqela, kuquka namagosa karhulumente, babanjwa.

translation.en: The withholding of donor aid has forced Malawi's government to pass what is known as the Zero Aid national budget for the
translation.xho: Ukubanjwa koncedo lwabaxhasi kuye kwanyanzela urhulumente waseMalawi ukuba aphumeze oko kwaziwa ngokuba yiZero Aid budget yesizwe.

translation.en: 2014-2015 fiscal year. Analysts, such as Abel Mwanyungwe, an economics lecturer at the Polytechnic College of the University
translation.xho: Unyaka-mali ka-2014-2015. Abahlalutyi, abafana noAbel Mwanyungwe, umhlohli wezoqoqosho kwiKholeji yasePolytechnic yeYunivesithi.

translation.en: of Malawi, say the drop in spending has hurt the economy.
translation.xho: waseMalawi, bathi ukuhla kwenkcitho konakalisa uqoqosho.

translation.en: This has been a bumpy year as we are coming from the Cashgate effects that have quite a major dent on the economys performance.
translation.xho: “Lo ibingunyaka wamagingxigingxi njengoko siphuma kwiziphumo zeCashgate ezithe kratya kuqoqosho lweli.

translation.en: We have seen that in most cases the very delicate and crucial departments and service providers have been affected, in the sense that we dont have enough drugs in the hospitals.
translation.xho: Sibonile ukuba kwiimeko ezininzi amasebe abuthathaka nabalulekileyo kunye nabanikezeli beenkonzo baye bachaphazeleka, ngendlela yokuba asinawo amayeza aneleyo ezibhedlele.

translation.en: In schools, in terms of teachers payments is not in time," said Mwanyungwe.
translation.xho: Ezikolweni, intlawulo yootitshala ayifiki ngexesha,” utshilo uMwanyungwe.

translation.en: Mwanyungwe also links Cashgate to the recent depreciation of Malawis currency, the kwacha, which has resulted in strikes by various government workers demanding higher pay.
translation.xho: UMwanyungwe ukwayamanise iCashgate nokuhla kwexabiso lemali yaseMalawi, kwacha, okubangele uqhankqalazo lwabasebenzi abohlukeneyo bakarhulumente befuna ukunyuselwa imivuzo.

translation.en: For example, support staff for the judiciary have been on strike for six weeks, seeking a 45 percent pay increase which the government says it cannot afford because it has no money.
translation.xho: Umzekelo, abasebenzi abanika inkxaso kwiinkundla bezikwisithuba seeveki ezintandathu begwayimba, befuna ukunyuselwa imivuzo ngeepesenti ezingamashumi amane anesihlanu ekhulwini nto leyo urhulumente athi akanako ukuyifikelela kuba akanamali.

translation.en: Workers at Malawi's Anti-Corruption Bureau went on strike demanding a 70 percent pay raise until the government threatened to forfeit their December salaries if they did not return.
translation.xho: Abasebenzi beAnti-Corruption Bureau eMalawi baye bagwayimba befuna ukunyuselwa imivuzo ngamashumi asixhenxe ekhulwini de urhulumente wabagrogrisa ngelithi baza kuphulukana nemivuzo yabo kaDisemba ukuba ababuyi.

translation.en: Mwanyungwe said the government can only avoid further strikes in 2015 if it makes efforts to restore donor confidence in the management of its public finances.
translation.xho: UMwanyungwe uthe urhulumente angalunqanda olunye uqhankqalazo ngo-2015 ukuba wenza iinzame zokubuyisela intembeko yabaxhasi kulawulo lwemali karhulumente.

translation.en: My fear is that if we dont have this donor confidence and donor support coming back to the economy,
translation.xho: “Uloyiko lwam kukuba, ukuba asinalo ukuzithemba kwabaxhasi kunye nenkxaso yabaxhasi ibuyela kuqoqosho,

translation.en: We may force the government to go into serious local borrowing that would lead to serious repercussions in terms of inflation, in terms of interest rates and this may have a sort of catch-catch lose situation, said Mwanyungwe.
translation.xho: Singanyazela urhulumente ukuba angene kwimboleko-mali yasekhaya enokuthi ikhokelele kwiziphumo ezibi malunga nokunyuka kwamaxabiso, ngokwenzala yemali-mboleko kwaye oku kunokuba nemeko yokuphulukana nokubanjiswa,” utshilo uMwanyungwe.

translation.en: The donors are, among other things, demanding that the government prosecute all those involved in the scandal and strengthen its financial management system.
translation.xho: Abaxhasi, phakathi kwezinye izinto, bafuna urhulumente atshutshise bonke abo babandakanyekayo kulo mbhodamo kwaye omeleze inkqubo yolawulo lwemali.

translation.en: Newton Kambala, the president of the Malawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, said the scandal rendered
translation.xho: UNewton Kambala, umongameli weMalawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, uthe ihlazo elenziwe.

translation.en: 2014 as "a very bad year for the business sector, because of huge debts that the government owes the private sector."
translation.xho: U-2014 "njengonyaka ombi kakhulu kwicandelo loshishino, ngenxa yamatyala amakhulu urhulumente awatyala icandelo labucala."

translation.en: He warned that if the situation persists, "2015 will be worse."
translation.xho: Walumkisa ukuba, ukuba imeko iyaqhubeka, "u-2015 uya kuba mbi."

translation.en: In his state of the nation address last Saturday, Malawi president Peter Mutharika said his government is doing everything possible to address the problems caused by the Cashgate scandal.
translation.xho: Kwintetho yakhe yobume besizwe ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo, umongameli waseMalawi uPeter Mutharika uthe urhulumente wakhe wenza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa iingxaki ezibangelwe lihlazo leCashgate.

translation.en: My government has strengthened the financial system to make sure that Cashgate never occurs again in Malawi.
translation.xho: “Urhulumente wam uqinise inkqubo yezemali ukuqinisekisa ukuba iCashgate ayiphindi yenzeke eMalawi.

translation.en: We have resourced fairly well the law enforcement institutions, including the Anti-Corruption Bureau, so that they do a thorough independent job, prosecute all suspects, and recover the stolen resources where possible," said Mutharika.
translation.xho: Siwasebenzise kakuhle amaziko ogcino-mthetho aquka iAnti-Corruption Bureau ukuze enze umsebenzi ozimeleyo ngokucokisekileyo, atshutshise bonke abarhanelwa, abuyise nezixhobo ezibiweyo apho kunokwenzeka,” utshilo uMutharika.

translation.en: Mutharika also said his government is implementing newly-adopted fiscal reforms that seek to grow the countrys economy by 5.5 percent in 2014, up from an estimated 5.0 percent in 2013.
translation.xho: UMutharika ukwathe urhulumente wakhe uphumeza inguqu entsha yezemali efuna ukukhulisa uqoqosho lwelizwe nge-5.5 pesenti ngo-2014, isuka kumyinge we-5.0 yeepesenti ngo-2013.

translation.en: Malawi to Conduct Door-to-Door HIV Testing
translation.xho: IMalawi izakwenza uVavanyo lwe-HIV kwindlu ngendlu

translation.en: Malawians have mixed reactions to government plans to introduce door-to door HIV testing early next year.
translation.xho: Abantu baseMalawi banezimvo ezahlukileyo kwizicwangciso zikarhulumente zokuqalisa ngovavanyo lwe-HIV kwindlu ngendlu ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo.

translation.en: Supporters say the step is urgently needed because 100 Malawians get infected each day, and an average of 138 die from AIDS daily.
translation.xho: Abaxhasi bathi eli nyathelo lifuneka ngokungxamisekileyo kuba abantu baseMalawi abali-100 bayasulelwa suku ngalunye, yaye umlinganiselo we-138 ubulawa nguGawulayo mihla le.

translation.en: Minister of Health Jean Kalirani announced the plans during the recent commemoration of World AIDS Day in the northern district of Karonga.
translation.xho: UMphathiswa wezeMpilo uJean Kalirani ubhengeze ezi zicwangciso ngethuba kutsha nje isikhumbuzo soSuku lweHlabathi lwe-AIDS kwisithili esisemantla eKaronga.

translation.en: We will go in the villages asking for blood samples to check whether that person is HIV positive or not.
translation.xho: “Sizakungena ezilalini sicela ukuba sithathelwe igazi ukuze kujongwe ukuba loo mntu akanayo na okanye akanayo na.

translation.en: And those that will be found HIV positive will definitely be given the care they need.
translation.xho: Kwaye abo baya kufunyanwa bene-HIV ngokuqinisekileyo baya kunikwa ukhathalelo abaludingayo.

translation.en: And those who are found negative will also be counseled so that they remain negative," said Kalirani.
translation.xho: Nabo bafunyenwe bengenayo nabo bazolulekwa ukuze bahlale bengenayo,” utshilo uKalirani.

translation.en: Kalirani said the campaign will start in mid-March and will aim to reach everyone in the country, including people who are
translation.xho: UKalirani uthe eli phulo lizakuqala phakathi kuMatshi kwaye liza kujolisa ukufikelela kumntu wonke kweli lizwe kuquka nabantu abakhoyo

translation.en: far from health facilities that provide HIV testing and counseling services.
translation.xho: kude nezibonelelo zempilo ezibonelela ngeenkonzo zokuvavanyelwa i-HIV kunye neengcebiso.

translation.en: She said the campaign is in line with the goal of ending HIV infection by 2030.
translation.xho: Uthe eli phulo lihambelana nenjongo yokuphelisa usulelo lwe-HIV ngo-2030.

translation.en: Malawi's HIV infection rate is currently at 10 percent, a slight drop from three years ago.
