translation.xho: Umlinganiselo wosulelo lweHIV eMalawi ngoku ukwi-10 ekhulwini, ukwehla kancinci xa kuthelekiswa neminyaka emithathu eyadlulayo.

translation.en: The announcement has raised fears in some Malawians, such as Steven Jailosi, a primary school teacher in rural Blantyre, who feel the campaign will likely infringe upon peoples privacy.
translation.xho: Esi sibhengezo sinyuse uloyiko kwabanye abantu baseMalawi, abanjengoSteven Jailosi, utitshala wesikolo samabanga aphantsi eBlantyre, ocinga ukuba eli phulo lingaphazamisa ubumfihlo babantu.

translation.en: I think it is not okay because they will be invading our privacy.
translation.xho: “Ndicinga ukuba akulunganga kuba baza kuphazamisa ubumfihlo bethu.

translation.en: HIV testing is supposed to be private.
translation.xho: Uvavanyo lwe-HIV kufuneka lube lolwabucala.

translation.en: No one is supposed to know that I went for an HIV testing unless I make a choice to tell them," said Jailosi.
translation.xho: Akukho mntu ekumele ukuba azi ukuba ndiye kuvavanyo lwe-HIV ngaphandle kokuba ndenza ukhetho lokumxelela,” utshilo uJailosi.

translation.en: Ester Makonokaya, a secretary in Blantyre, said that although she has been tested already, she feels the door-to-door HIV testing will violate people's privacy.
translation.xho: U-Ester Makonokaya, unobhala eBlantyre, uthe nangona sele evavanyiwe, uvakalelwa kukuba ukuvavanyelwa intsholongwane kaGawulayo kwindlu ngendlu kuzokophula iimfihlo zabantu.

translation.en: Government should instead take the mobile clinics to the villages where people will be able to access them on their own rather than taking testing in their homes, because that might mean that some of the people who are not supposed to know other peoples status will know because, you know, when someone has been tested you show some reactions, said Makonokaya.
translation.xho: “Urhulumente makathathe ezi kliniki zihambayo azise ezilalini apho abantu bazokwazi ukufikelela kuzo bodwa kunokuba baye kuvavanyo emakhayeni abo, kuba loo nto ingathetha ukuba abanye abantu ekungafanelanga ukuba bazazi iimeko zabanye abantu. kuba uyazi ukuba xa umntu evavanyiwe ubonakalisa ukusabela,” utshilo uMakonokaya.

translation.en: Macpherson Maulana, a journalist in Blantyre and a producer of radio programs on health, told VOA that government would do better to educate Malawians on the need for HIV testing so that people will go for tests on their own "without being pushed."
translation.xho: UMacpherson Maulana, intatheli yaseBlantyre nokwangumvelisi weenkqubo zikanomathotholo ngezempilo, uxelele iVOA ukuba urhulumente uzokwenza ngcono ukufundisa abantu baseMalawi ngesidingo sokuvavanyelwa intsholongwane kagawulayo ukuze abantu baziyele ngokwabo uvavanyo ngaphandle kokutyhalwa.

translation.en: I fear it could end up into fights.
translation.xho: “Ndiyoyika ukuba ingaphelela ekulweni.

translation.en: You see it happened in Liberia recently where people who were coming to help people suspected to have contracted Ebola were even killed.
translation.xho: Uyabona kwenzekile eLiberia mva nje apho abantu ababeze kunceda abantu ekurhaneleka ukuba bosulelwe yi-Ebola bade babulawa.

translation.en: So, civic education is the most important element for people to be encouraged to come out for testing voluntarily," said Maulana.
translation.xho: Ngoko ke, imfundo yezoluntu yeyona nto ibalulekileyo ukuze abantu bakhuthazwe ukuba baphume baye kuvavanywa ngokuzithandela,” utshilo uMaulana.

translation.en: However, HIV/AIDS counselor David Odali, whose NGO Umunthu Foundation runs HIV-related projects, insisted privacy will be protected.
translation.xho: Nangona kunjalo, umcebisi weHIV/AIDS, uDavid Odali, nophethe umbutho i-Umunthu Foundation eqhuba iiprojekthi ezinxulumene ne-HIV, ugxininise ukuba iimfihlo ziza kukhuselwa.

translation.en: Confidentiality will be upheld. Lets consider the household setup.
translation.xho: Imfihlo iya kugcinwa. Makhe siqwalasele ukusekwa kwekhaya.

translation.en: I think the first thing would be to provide group counseling to members of that family.
translation.xho: Ndicinga ukuba into yokuqala iya kuba kukubonelela ngengcebiso yeqela kumalungu olo sapho.

translation.en: [Of course] people can be tested while others are watching, but when it comes to disclosing the results, a counselor is supposed to disclose that results to each and every individual separately," said Odali.
translation.xho: [Ewe] abantu banokuvavanywa ngelixa abanye bejonge, kodwa xa kuthethwa ngeziphumo, umcebisi kufuneka aveze ezo ziphumo kumntu ngamnye ngokwahlukeneyo,” utshilo u-Odali.

translation.en: Odali said it will be up to the person who has been tested to disclose his or her status.
translation.xho: UOdali uthe izakuba kuye umntu ovavanyiweyo ukuba aveze ubume bakhe.

translation.en: In 2006, the charity Development Aid from People to People conducted door-to-door HIV testing in the district of Thyolo and Blantyre, reaching 400,000 people.
translation.xho: Ngo-2006, i-charity Development Aid from People to People yenza uvavanyo lwe-HIV kwindlu ngendlu kwisithili saseThyolo naseBlantyre, lwafikelela kuma-400,000 abantu.

translation.en: The organization says it worked well.
translation.xho: Lo mbutho uthi usebenze kakuhle.

translation.en: Water Crisis Raises Fears of Waterborne Disease in Malawi.
translation.xho: Ingxaki yamanzi Iphakamisa uloyiko lwezifo ezibangelwa ngamanzi eMalawi.

translation.en: Malawians in the country's commercial capital, Blantyre, usually rely on tap water.
translation.xho: Abantu baseMalawi abakwikomkhulu lezorhwebo lelizwe, iBlantyre, bakholisa ukuxhomekeka kumanzi aphuma empompeni.

translation.en: But for the past five months, the taps have often run dry, forcing residents to draw water from unprotected sources like rivers and wells, while work is being done at the city main pumping station.
translation.xho: Kodwa kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo, iitepu bezisoloko zomile, nto leyo enyanzelise abahlali ukuba bakhe amanzi kwimithombo engakhuselekanga efana nemilambo namaqula, logama kusetyenzwa kwisikhululo sokumpompa amanzi edolophini.

translation.en: The risk of contracting water-borne diseases is rising.
translation.xho: Umngcipheko wokufumana izifo ezibangelwa ngamanzi uyakhula.

translation.en: In Blantyre and surrounding areas, residents have spent five days without tap water.
translation.xho: EBlantyre neziphaluka, abahlali bachithe iintsuku ezintlanu bengenawo amanzi aphuma etephini.

translation.en: Women, who by Malawi tradition are responsible for household tasks, complain of the risks they face when fetching water from rivers far from residential areas.
translation.xho: Abasetyhini, abathi ngokwesiko laseMalawi banoxanduva lokwenza imisebenzi yasekhaya, bakhalaza ngeengozi abahlangabezana nazo xa besiya kukha amanzi emilanjeni ekude neendawo zokuhlala.

translation.en: Rhoda Milanzi, a housewife and mother of three, tells VOA the journeys through bushy footpaths are risky.
translation.xho: URhoda Milanzi, umama wekhaya kunye nomama wabantwana abathathu, uxelele iVOA ukuba uhambo oluhamba kwiindledlana zeenyawo lunobungozi..

translation.en: We wake up every day 2 a.m., sometimes 1 a.m., to go and collect water.
translation.xho: “Sivuka yonke imihla ngentsimbi yesi-2 kusasa, ngamanye amaxesha ngo-1 ekuseni, siye kukha amanzi.

translation.en: There are so many risks.
translation.xho: Kukho imingcipheko emininzi.

translation.en: You see, sometimes we would meet witches, snakes on the way," she says, "even hyenas have been chasing us."
translation.xho: Uyabona maxa wambi sasidibana namagqwirha, iinyoka endleleni,” utsho, “neengcuka zazisileqa.

translation.en: Milanzi says to ease the burden of carrying water home for bathing, women prefer to bathe in the river.
translation.xho: UMlanzi uthi ukuthomalalisa umthwalo wokuthwala amanzi okuhlamba ekhaya, abafazi bakhetha ukuhlamba emlanjeni.

translation.en: But she says they have been disturbed by youths who hide in the nearby bush.
translation.xho: Kodwa uthi baye baphazanyiswa lulutsha oluzifihle kumatyholo akufutshane.

translation.en: These youths of today would come there and hide somewhere to see us naked.
translation.xho: “Olu lutsha lwanamhlanje luza kufika apho luzifihle ndaweni ithile ukuze lusibone sihamba ze.

translation.en: This has been a major embarrassment. In fact we complained to the chiefs about it.
translation.xho: Oku kuye kwaba lihlazo elikhulu. Ngenene sakhalaza kwiinkosi ngalo nto.

translation.en: They punished some of them, but you know they would sometimes climb trees just to look at older women like us taking a bath," she explains.
translation.xho: Abanye babo bohlwaya, kodwa uyazi ukuba ngamanye amaxesha bebekhwela emithini ukuze bajonge abafazi abadala njengathi xa sihlamba,” ucacise watsho.

translation.en: The water problem also has affected the delivery of health services.
translation.xho: Ingxaki yamanzi ikwachaphazele ukuhanjiswa kweenkonzo zempilo.

translation.en: Three weeks ago, authorities at Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital in Blantyre confirmed that they had suspended surgical operations due to water scarcity.
translation.xho: Kwiiveki ezintathu ezidlulileyo, abasemagunyeni kwisibhedlele iQueen Elizabeth Central eBlantyre baqinisekise ukuba baye banqumamisa ukwenza utyando ngenxa yokunqaba kwamanzi.

translation.en: Health rights campaigners warn of the possible outbreak of waterborne diseases, especially in densely populated areas, if the situation is left unresolved.
translation.xho: Abakhankasi bamalungelo ezempilo balumkisa ngokuqhambuka kwezifo ezibangelwa ngamanzi, ngakumbi kwiindawo ezixineneyo, ukuba le meko ishiywe ingasonjululwanga.

translation.en: Officials at the Blantyre Water Board attribute the problem largely to an ongoing European Union-funded project that seeks to install new pumping machines at Walkers Ferry, the main pumping station.
translation.xho: Amagosa eBlantyre Water Board abalela ingxaki ikakhulu kwiprojekthi eqhubekayo exhaswa ngemali yi-European Union efuna ukufakela oomatshini bokumpompa abatsha kwi-Walkers Ferry, isikhululo sokumpompa esikhulu.

translation.en: Priscilla Mateyu, the spokesperson for the Blantyre Water Board, says the project is expected to increase water production capacity to 105,000 cubic meters per day from the current daily production of 78,000 cubic meters.
translation.xho: UPriscilla Mateyu, osisithethi sebhodi yamanzi eBlantyre, uthi le projekthi kulindeleke ukuba inyuse umthamo wokuvelisa amanzi ukuya kutsho kwi-105,000 cubic metres ngosuku ukusuka kwimveliso ekhoyo ngoku eyi-78,000 cubic metres ngosuku.

translation.en: January is when the project is finishing. But for the new machines and everything else to start working properly, we have to wait until March [2015].
translation.xho: NgoJanuwari kuxa iprojekthi iphela. Kodwa ukuze oomatshini abatsha nayo yonke enye into iqale ukusebenza kakuhle, kufuneka silinde kude kube nguMatshi [2015].

translation.en: That's when we expect the levels would increase and also production capacity improving to least what we expect it to be," Mateyu said.
translation.xho: Kulapho silindele ukuba amanqanaba anyuke kwaye nomthamo wemveliso uphucuke ubeyilento silindele ukuba ibe yiyo,” utshilo uMateyu.

translation.en: The local consumer rights watchdog, the Consumers Association of Malawi, had been planning to hold vigils at the water board until the water supply was normalized, but the board asked protesters to hold off, promising to distribute water to residents through mobile water tanks.
translation.xho: Iqumrhu elijongene namalungelo abathengi basekuhlaleni, iConsumers Association of Malawi, bebeceba ukubamba imilindelo kwibhodi yamanzi de kube yinto eqhelekileyo ukuhanjiswa kwamanzi, kodwa ibhodi yacela abaqhankqalazi ukuba bayeke, bethembisa ukuhambisa amanzi kubahlali ngokusebenzisa iitanki zamanzi ezihambayo.

translation.en: The consumer rights group has given the water board two weeks to fulfill its commitment before proceeding with the protests.
translation.xho: Iqela lamalungelo abathengi linike ibhodi yamanzi iiveki ezimbini ukuba ifezekise isibophelelo sayo phambi kokuba iqhube noqhanqalazo.

translation.en: Malawi President Under Fire for Giving Money to Journalists
translation.xho: Umongameli waseMalawi uphantsi komlilo ngokunika imali kwiintatheli

translation.en: Malawi President Peter Mutharika is under fire for giving envelopes containing $125 to more than 80 media people at a dinner he hosted last month in Blantyre.
translation.xho: Umongameli waseMalawi uPeter Mutharika utyholwa ngokunika imvulophu equlethe i-125 yeedola kubantu beendaba abangaphezu kwe-80 kwisidlo ebesibambe kwinyanga ephelileyo eBlantyre.

translation.en: The editor of the privately owned Times Television said reporters were told the envelopes contained the presidents plans for the media - which has been critical of the governments economic performance.
translation.xho: Umhleli weTimes Television yabucala uthe abacholacholi baxelelwa ukuba iimvulophu zinezicwangciso zoomongameli kumajelo eendaba - nto leyo ibigxeka ukusebenza kukarhulumente kwezoqoqosho.

translation.en: In his column published in Malawis Sunday Times newspaper, editor Grecian Tukula said he was not sure why the money was given to journalists at the state dinner.
translation.xho: Kwikholamu yakhe epapashwe kwiphephandaba laseMalawi iSunday Times, umhleli uGrecian Tukula uthe akaqinisekanga ngesizathu sokuba le mali inikwe iintatheli kwisidlo sikarhulumente.

translation.en: Tukula said he initially decided to return the money but reversed the decision to avoid "creating a scene."
translation.xho: UTukula uthi uqale wathatha isigqibo sokuyibuyisela le mali kodwa wasirhoxisa eso sigqibo ukuze aphephe “ukuzijongisa.”

translation.en: But the editor for the Weekend Nation newspaper, George Kasakula, told VOA that he returned the money right away.
translation.xho: Kodwa umhleli wephephandaba iWeekend Nation, uGeorge Kasakula, uxelele iVOA ukuba uyibuyise kwangoko le mali.

translation.en: I just felt it was not right for me to receive the money, so I returned it.
translation.xho: “Ndavakalelwa kukuba ayifanelekanga ukuba ndiyifumane loo mali, ngoko ndayibuyisela.

translation.en: My understanding is that if someone invites me to a workshop, its their duty to ensure that they feed me, they accommodate me and they transport me.
translation.xho: Ukuqonda kwam kukuba xa umntu endimema kwiworkshop, yindima yabo ukuqinisekisa ukuba uyandondla, uyandihlalisa kwaye uyandithutha.

translation.en: But in this case, I didnt see why I should get that allowance because I didnt spend anything to go to Sanjika [Palace]," said Kasakula.
translation.xho: Kodwa kule meko, andizange ndibone ukuba kutheni ndifanele ndifumane eso sibonelelo kuba andizange ndachitha nto ukuya eSanjika,” utshilo uKasakula.

translation.en: The issue has attracted more public attention after privately owned Capital Radio aired a story questioning the meaning of the cash handouts from the president.
translation.xho: Lo mba utsale umdla woluntu emva kokuba inkampani yabucala yeCapital Radio yasasaza ibali elibuza ngentsingiselo yemali evela kumongameli.

translation.en: As Capital FM we serve the interest of the public.
translation.xho: “SiyiCapital FM sisebenzela uluntu.

translation.en: This issue has been all over the social media, and even we as a media are implicated [we believe] it is paramount that we follow up and get to the bottom of the matter," said Steven Dakalira, the head of news and current affairs at Capital Radio.
translation.xho: Lo mcimbi ubugcwele kumakhasi onxibelelwano, kwaye nathi njengamajelo eendaba siyachaphazeleka “sikholelwa ukuba kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba siwulandele kwaye sifikelele ezantsi kulo mba,” utshilo uSteven Dakalira, intloko yeendaba nemicimbi yangoku. kwiCapital Radio.

translation.en: In his column in the Nyasa Times, Malawi professor of law Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa said what President Mutharika did by giving money handouts to journalists at a news event was tantamount to bribery. He has called on Mutharika to resign or face impeachment proceedings.
translation.xho: Kwikholamu yakhe kwiNyasa Times, unjingalwazi wezomthetho eMalawi uDanwood Mzikenge Chirwa uthe into eyenziwa nguMongameli Mutharika ngokunika iintatheli imali kumsitho weendaba kufana nokunyoba. Ucele uMutharika ukuba arhoxe okanye ajongane nenkqubo yokubeka ityala.

translation.en: Local civil society groups said that "by attempting to bribe the journalists" Mutharika subjected his leadership style to disrepute.
translation.xho: Amaqela oluntu asekuhlaleni athi “ngokuzama ukunyoba iintatheli” uMutharika wadelela isidima sakhe sobunkokeli.

translation.en: Meanwhile, some journalists are donating the money to charity.
translation.xho: Ngeli xesha, ezinye iintatheli zinikela ngemali kumbutho wesisa.

translation.en: Brian Ligomeka, the Managing Editor for the Times Group, told Times Television that all four employees there have donated the money to an orphanage.
translation.xho: UBrian Ligomeka, uMhleli oLawulayo weTimes Group, uxelele iTimes Television ukuba bobane abasebenzi abalapho banikele ngemali kwikhaya leenkedama.

translation.en: At first we decided to return the money to the president but we later thought it wise to buy assorted items like sugar, salt, notebooks and donate it to needy children, said Ligomeka.
translation.xho: “Siqale sathatha isigqibo sokuba siyibuyisele kumongameli le mali kodwa sabona bubulumko ukuba sithenge izinto ezahlukahlukeneyo ezifana neswekile, ityuwa, iincwadi zokubhalela sanikezela kubantwana abasweleyo,” utshilo uLigomeka.

translation.en: In his latest Sunday Times column, Raphael Tenthani, who also writes for BBC, apologized on behalf of other journalists "for letting down the public that trust journalists unreservedly."
translation.xho: Kwikholamu yakhe yamva nje yeSunday Times, uRaphael Tenthani, okwabhalela iBBC, ucele uxolo egameni lezinye iintatheli “ngokuphoxa uluntu ukuba luthembe iintatheli ngokungagodli.

translation.en: Tenthani has since donated the money for charity work and said that although the journalists could have done better if they returned the money right away, doing so would have been perceived as disrespect to the head of state.
translation.xho: UTenthani ukhuphe le mali yemisebenzi yesisa esithi nangona iintatheli bezinokwenza ngcono ukuba bezinokubuyisela le mali ngoko nangoko, ukwenza njalo bekuya kubonwa njengokungahloniphi intloko yelizwe.

translation.en: Maclan Kanyangwa, who heads the Department of Journalism and Media Studies at the Polytechnic College of the University of
translation.xho: UMaclan Kanyangwa, okhokela iSebe lezobuntatheli kunye nezifundo zosasazo kwiKholeji yasePolytechnic kwiYunivesithi yase

translation.en: Malawi, said a media code of ethics bars journalists from accepting payment on a story.
translation.xho: IMalawi, ithe ikhowudi yezokuziphatha yeendaba ithintela iintatheli ukuba zamkele intlawulo ngebali.

translation.en: Obviously the meeting at the palace was the newsworthy event.
translation.xho: “Ngokucacileyo indibano eyayisebhotwe yayisisiganeko esibalulekileyo seendaba.

translation.en: There was a possibility that something was going to be published.
translation.xho: Kwakunokwenzeka ukuba kukho into eyayiza kupapashwa.

translation.en: And in the event that this payment would have influenced journalist decision [on news judgment], then that becomes a problem," said Kanyangwa.
translation.xho: Kwaye kwimeko apho le ntlawulo inokuba nefuthe kwisigqibo sentatheli [kwisigwebo seendaba], loo nto iba yingxaki,” utshilo uKanyangwa.

translation.en: Kanyangwa said he feels many journalists failed to return the money immediately because they might have been out of their ethical senses when they got the money.
translation.xho: UKanyangwa uthe uvakalelwa kukuba iintatheli ezininzi zisilele ukubuyisela le mali ngoko nangoko kuba kusenokwenzeka ukuba zazingekho ezingqondweni xa zazifumana le mali.

translation.en: Efforts to talk to Presidential Press Officer Fredrick Ndala were not successful.
translation.xho: Iinzame zokuthetha neGosa likaMongameli weendaba uFredrick Ndala azikhange zibe yimpumelelo.

translation.en: But some government authorities say the payment was not a bribe but meant for a fuel refund to those who attended the night event.
translation.xho: Kodwa abanye abaphathi bakarhulumente bathi le ntlawulo ibingesosinyobo kodwa yenzelwe ukubuyisela amafutha kwabo bebezimase umsitho wasebusuku.

translation.en: Report: Manufacturing Could Free Poorest Nations From Poverty.
translation.xho: Ingxelo: Ukwenziwa kwezinto kunokukhulula izizwe ezihluphekileyo kubuhlwempu.

translation.en: A new United Nations report urges the poorest countries in the world to shift from low- to high-productivity activities to improve their economies.
translation.xho: Ingxelo entsha yeZizwe eziManyeneyo ikhuthaza amazwe ahlwempuzekileyo emhlabeni ukuba atshintshe ukusuka kwizinto eziphantsi ukuya kwimveliso ephezulu ukuphucula uqoqosho lwawo.

translation.en: In its annual Least Developed Countries Report, UNCTAD — the U.N. Conference on Trade and Development — says these countries must structurally transform their economies to free themselves from the "poverty trap," which is stunting economic growth and development.
translation.xho: KwiNgxelo yayo yaminyaka le yaMazwe angaPhuhliswanga kangako, i-UNCTAD — iNkomfa yeZizwe eziManyeneyo yoRhwebo noPhuhliso – ithi la mazwe kufuneka aguqule ngokwesakhiwo uqoqosho lwawo ukuze akhululeke “kumgibe wentlupheko,” nto leyo edodobalisa ukukhula koqoqosho nophuhliso.

translation.en: Of the 48 nations the U.N. considers "Least Developed Countries" (LDCs), only one, Laos, is on track to achieve all seven of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG's) by 2015.
translation.xho: Kwiintlanga eziyi-48 i-U.N. iqwalasela "ILeast Developed Country’s" (LDCs), enye kuphela, iLaos, isendleleni yokufezekisa zosixhenxe iiMillennium Development Goals (MDG's) ngo-2015.

translation.en: Only four African countries — Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda and Uganda — are likely to meet a majority of these targets.
translation.xho: Ngamazwe amane kuphela ase-Afrika - i-Ethiopia, iMalawi, iRwanda kunye ne-Uganda - anokuthi afikelele uninzi lwezi njongo.

translation.en: This assessment is particularly grim in light of the even greater challenges awaiting these countries in the coming years.
translation.xho: Olu vavanyo lubi kakhulu ngenxa yemiceli mngeni emikhulu elindele la mazwe kwiminyaka ezayo.

translation.en: The MDGs set a goal for nations to halve their poverty levels by 2015.
translation.xho: I-MDGs ibeke injongo yokuba izizwe zinciphise amanqanaba entlupheko ngesiqingatha ngo-2015.

translation.en: The so-called Sustainable Development Goals, which carry on from where the MDGs leave off, call for eradication of poverty by 2030.
translation.xho: Izinto ezibizwa ngokuba yiSustainable Development Goals, eziqhubela phambili ukusuka apho i-MDGs ziyeke khona, ibiza ukupheliswa kwentlupheko ngo-2030.

translation.en: According to Taffere Tesfachew, an UNCTAD official who works with African nations, it would be nothing short of a miracle for the LDCs to pull this off.
translation.xho: Ngokutsho kukaTaffere Tesfachew, igosa le-UNCTAD elisebenza nezizwe zase-Afrika, akuyi kuba yinto engummangaliso ukuba ii-LDC zikhuphe oku.

translation.en: In order for the least developed countries to achieve this miraculous performance, he says they will need to structurally change their economies.
translation.xho: Ukuze awona mazwe angaphuhlanga aphumeze lo mmangaliso, uthi kuyakufuneka ukuba atshintshe ngokwesakhiwo uqoqosho lwawo.

translation.en: He tells VOA this means shifting labor from activities with low productivity, such as small-scale agriculture and services to more dynamic activities with higher productivity, such as manufacturing and high-value services.
translation.xho: Uxelela iVOA oku kuthetha ukutshintshwa kwabasebenzi kwimisebenzi enemveliso ephantsi, efana nezolimo ezincinci kunye neenkonzo ukuya kwimisebenzi eguqukayo enemveliso ephezulu, efana nemveliso kunye neenkonzo zexabiso eliphezulu.

translation.en: Countries that have moved up are the ones that are creating opportunities for those that are leaving agriculture to engage in things where they add value, where they get training and as it happens, manufacturing tends to have that sort of feature,
translation.xho: “Amazwe anyukileyo ngawo adala amathuba okuba abo bashiya ezolimo bazibandakanye kwizinto apho bongeza ixabiso, apho bafumana uqeqesho nanjengoko kusenzeka, imveliso ithanda ukuba nolo hlobo,

translation.en: that is why this call for manufacturing, he said.
translation.xho: yiyo loo nto ikhwelo lokwenziwa kwemveliso,” utshilo.

translation.en: Countries that are using policies to shift and influence capital and labor to move into this activity sector tend to do better.
translation.xho: Amazwe asebenzisa imigaqo-nkqubo yokutshintsha kunye nokuphembelela inkunzi kunye nabasebenzi ukuba bangene kweli candelo lomsebenzi bavame ukwenza ngcono.

translation.en: Tesfachew says these high-productivity sectors tend to pay higher wages and create a demand for goods.
translation.xho: UTesfachew uthi la macandelo anemveliso ephezulu athambekele ekuhlawuleni imivuzo ephezulu kwaye enze imfuno yempahla.

translation.en: This, he says, encourages investment.
translation.xho: Oku, uthi, kukhuthaza utyalo-mali.

translation.en: On the surface, it appears that the LDCs are not doing badly.
translation.xho: Ngasentla, kubonakala ngathi ii-LDCs azenzi kakubi.

translation.en: UNCTAD economic data show growth in these poor countries between 2002 and 2008 exceeded the seven percent target set by the international community.
translation.xho: Idatha yezoqoqosho ye-UNCTAD ibonisa ukukhula kula mazwe ahlwempuzekileyo phakathi kuka-2002 kunye no-2008 kugqithise kwiipesenti ezisixhenxe ekujoliswe kuzo ezibekwe luluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe.

translation.en: And, even after the 2008 financial crisis, UNCTAD notes the LDCs grew faster than other developing countries, at an average of 5.7 percent per year.
translation.xho: Kwaye, nasemva kwentlekele yezemali ka-2008, i-UNCTAD iqaphela ukuba ii-LDCs zikhule ngokukhawuleza kunamanye amazwe asaphuhlayo, kumyinge we-5.7 yeepesenti ngonyaka.

translation.en: But U.N. economists say the outlook for the least developed countries in the short and medium term remains uncertain.
translation.xho: Kodwa izazi ngezoqoqosho ze-UN zithi imbonakalo yamazwe angawona aphuhlileyo kwixesha elifutshane neliphakathi ayikaqinisekwa.

translation.en: They say increasing peoples productivity is the best way to break the patter of human and economic underdevelopment that continues to entrap them in poverty.
translation.xho: Bathi ukwandisa imveliso yabantu yeyona ndlela ilungileyo yokuphelisa ukusilela kophuhliso lwabantu kunye noqoqosho oluqhubeka lubarhintyela kubuhlwempu.

translation.en: UN: Most African Nations to Miss 2015 MDG Goals.
translation.xho: I-UN: Uninzi lwezizwe zase-Afrika ziphosakele kwi-MDG Goals ka-2015.

translation.en: Most African countries will not reach the Millennium Development Goals set for 2015 because of the gap between economic and human development.
translation.xho: Uninzi lwamazwe aseAfrika aluyi kufikelela kwiMillennium Development Goals ezimiselwe u-2015 ngenxa yomsantsa phakathi kophuhliso loqoqosho noluntu.

translation.en: That is one of the conclusions in this years annual U.N. report on the Least Developed Countries, presented Thursday.
translation.xho: Eso sesinye sezigqibo salonyaka kwingxelo yonyaka ye-U.N.  kuMazwe angaPhuhlanga kangako, enikezelwe ngoLwesine.

translation.en: Junior Davis, U.N. economic affairs officer for Africa, said African countries have not been able to translate their economic growth into structural transformation.
translation.xho: UJunior Davis, igosa le-UN lemicimbi yezoqoqosho e-Afrika, uthe amazwe ase-Afrika khange akwazi ukuguqulela ukukhula koqoqosho kwinguqu yezakhiwo.

translation.en: We think that is the case because these countries have not focused efficiently on building what we call their productive capacities, Davis said.
translation.xho: “Sicinga ukuba kunjalo kuba la mazwe khange agxile ngokukuko ekwakhiweni kwento esiyibiza ngokuba ngamakhono awo okuvelisa,” utshilo uDavis.

translation.en: These are the basic human and economic development capacities that are needed to promote sustainable economic development.
translation.xho: “La ngamakhono asisiseko ophuhliso lwabantu noqoqosho afunekayo ukukhuthaza uphuhliso loqoqosho oluzinzileyo.

translation.en: And the MDG, as they were constructed, largely ignored the need to develop the productive capacities."
translation.xho: Kwaye i-MDG, njengoko yakhiwa, ayizange ihoye ubukhulu becala isidingo sokuphuhlisa amandla oveliso.”

translation.en: African countries also are not on course to halve poverty by 2015, and their overall progress on reducing hunger is relatively slow.
translation.xho: Amazwe ase-Afrika nawo akakho endleleni yokunciphisa intlupheko ngesiqingatha ngo-2015, kwaye inkqubela yawo iyonke ekunciphiseni indlala ihamba kancinci.

translation.en: Poverty limits human development and undermines productivity.
translation.xho: Ubuhlwempu budodobalisa uphuhliso lomntu kwaye bujongela phantsi imveliso.

translation.en: And economic development is needed to make gains in human development.
translation.xho: Kwaye uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho luyafuneka ukwenza inzuzo kuphuhliso lwabantu.

translation.en: Ethiopia, Rwanda, Uganda and Malawi are the only African countries on track to reach the majority of the development goals.
translation.xho: Yi-Ethiopia, iRwanda, iUganda neMalawi kuphela kwamazwe aseAfrika asendleleni yokufikelela uninzi lweenjongo zophuhliso.

translation.en: They are making progress because they heavily invested in areas that create sustainable development such as infrastructure, health and education.
translation.xho: Benza inkqubela-phambili kuba batyala imali eninzi kwiinkalo ezidala uphuhliso oluzinzileyo olufana neziseko ezingundoqo, ezempilo kunye nezemfundo.

translation.en: The post-2015 development agenda for fragile countries where governance remains an issue — such as South Sudan and the
translation.xho: I-ajenda yophuhliso yasemva kowama-2015 yamazwe abuthathaka apho ulawulo luhlala lungumba - afana noMzantsi Sudan kunye

translation.en: Democratic Republic of Congo — will still largely depend on support from the international community to achieve social and economic development, Davis said.
translation.xho: IDemocratic Republic of Congo - isaxhomekeke kakhulu kwinkxaso evela kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ukufezekisa uphuhliso lwentlalo noqoqosho, utshilo uDavis.

translation.en: Improvements in rural development, industrial productivity, agriculture and the services sectors in these countries will require "ways in which we can have a pattern of growth which is not just sustainable but jobs-rich," Davis said.
translation.xho: Uphuculo kuphuhliso lwasemaphandleni, imveliso yemizi-mveliso, ezolimo kunye namacandelo eenkonzo kula mazwe kuya kufuna "iindlela esinokuthi ngazo sibe nepateni yokukhula engagcini nje ngokuzinzileyo kodwa enemisebenzi," utshilo uDavis.

translation.en: Because we see the growth in jobs and employment is central to any development strategy that aims to reduce poverty in a sustainable way.
translation.xho: Ngenxa yokuba sibona ukukhula kwemisebenzi kunye nengqesho ingundoqo kuyo nayiphi na isicwangciso sophuhliso esijolise ekunciphiseni intlupheko ngendlela ezinzileyo.

translation.en: A country is placed on the Least Developed Countries list based on its per capita income, economic vulnerability, and human development indicators such as health and nutrition.
translation.xho: Ilizwe libekwe kuluhlu lwaMazwe angaPhuhliswanga kangako ngokusekwe kwingeniso yomntu ngamnye, ukuba sesichengeni kwezoqoqosho, kunye nezikhombisi zophuhliso lwabantu ezifana nempilo kunye nesondlo.

translation.en: Of the 48 least developed countries in the world, 34 are in Africa. Three countries have graduated from their least developed status: Botswana, Cape Verde and Samoa.
translation.xho: Kumazwe angama-48 angaphuhliswanga kangako ehlabathini, angama-34 aseAfrika. Amazwe amathathu athweswe izidanga kwinqanaba lawo elingaphuhliswanga kangako: iBotswana, iCape Verde kunye neSamoa.

translation.en: Strike Paralyzes Malawi's Judicial Services
translation.xho: Uqhankqalazo luqhwalelisa iiNkonzo zeNkundla zaseMalawi

translation.en: A week-long strike by the support staff of Malawi's judiciary system has paralyzed the courts, causing overcrowding in police cells and the indefinite suspension of major cases - including government corruption trials.
translation.xho: Uqhankqalazo oluthathe iveki yonke lwabasebenzi bokuxhasa inkqubo yenkundla yaseMalawi liqhwalelise iinkundla, nto leyo ebangele ukuxinana kwizisele zamapolisa kunye nokunqunyanyiswa kwamatyala amakhulu - kuqukwa namatyala urhwaphilizo kurhulumente.

translation.en: Court marshals, clerks and messengers are demanding the 30 percent salary increases promised by the government two years ago.
translation.xho: Iimashali zenkundla, oonobhala kunye nabathunywa bafuna ukonyuselwa imivuzo ngamashumi amathathu eepesenti ekhulwini ababethenjiswe ngurhulumente kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo.

translation.en: Chanting and singing around the court premises has become a pastime activity for the striking court workers since the onset of a sit-in last week.
translation.xho: Ukuxhentsa nokucula kwindawo yenkundla ibe ngumsebenzi wokuzonwabisa kubasebenzi benkundla ababegwayimbile ukusukela oko kuqale ukuhlaliswa kwabantu kwiveki ephelileyo.

translation.en: Linley Hebert, a spokesperson for the striking workers, told VOA the strike is a result of the governments failure to honor a 2012 agreement.
translation.xho: ULinley Hebert, isithethi sabasebenzi abagwayimbileyo, uxelele iVOA ukuba olu qhankqalazo lubangelwa kukungaphumeleli koorhulumente ukuhlonipha isivumelwano sika2012.

translation.en: In October [this year], the government reviewed the salaries of the civil servants, but we were not included in that revision, Hebert said.
translation.xho: “Ngenyanga kaOkuthowbha [kulo nyaka] urhulumente uye waphonononga imivuzo yabasebenzi bakarhulumente, kodwa asizange sibandakanywe kolo hlaziyo,” utshilo uHebert.

translation.en: Yet in 2012, we had an agreement that each time they are revising the salaries of the civil servants, [they will be increasing our salaries as well].
translation.xho: “Kodwa ngo-2012, saba nesivumelwano sokuba qho xa behlaziya imivuzo yabasebenzi bakarhulumente, [babe besonyusa imivuzo yethu].

translation.en: So, [after adhering to the agreement in 2013], we are surprised to see that this time we are left out."
translation.xho: Ke, [emva kokubambelela kwisivumelwano ngo-2013], siyamangaliswa kukubona ukuba ngeli xesha sishiywe ngaphandle. "

translation.en: Government authorities say the failure to increase judicial workers salaries this year is largely because of financial constraints, following a donor aid freeze against Malawi's government.
translation.xho: Abasemagunyeni kurhulumente bathi ukusilela ukonyusa imivuzo yabasebenzi benkundla kulo nyaka kungenxa yokunqongophala kwemali, kulandela ukumiswa koncedo lwabaxhasi ngokuchasene norhulumente waseMalawi.

translation.en: The freeze is a result of a government financial scandal in which more than $30 million was looted from government coffers.
translation.xho: Oku kuqhwanyaza kweliso kubangelwe sisityholo semali sikarhulumente apho kwaphangwa ngaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-30 zeerandi kungxowa-mali karhulumente.

translation.en: Ministry of Finance spokesperson Nations Msowoya told a local radio station it is hard for the government to meet the workers' demand.
translation.xho: Isithethi sesebe lezimali u-UN Msowoya uxelele isikhululo sikanomathotholo sasekuhlaleni ukuba kunzima kurhulumente ukuhlangabezana nemfuno yabasebenzi.

translation.en: It is difficult to promise what the treasury will do. But suffice to say that the prevailing economic circumstances and budgetary constraints will make a little bit difficult for the treasury to bow down to the demands, "Msowoya said.
translation.xho: “Kunzima ukuthembisa into eza kwenziwa ngunondyebo. Kodwa kwanele ukuthi imeko yezoqoqosho egqubayo kunye nokunqongophala kohlahlo lwabiwo-mali kuza kwenza kubenzima kancinci ukuba unondyebo athobele amabango,” utshilo uMsowoya.

translation.en: But according to Hebert, the strikers will not resume work until their demands are met.
translation.xho: Kodwa ngokukaHebert, abahlaseli abazuphinda baqhubeke nomsebenzi de kuhlangatyezwane neemfuno zabo.

translation.en: Since I was born [there has been] no time the government said it had some money.
translation.xho: Oko ndazalwa [akuzange kubekho xesha] urhulumente wathi unemali.

translation.en: It has its own means [of finding the money] and it will find the same means to give us the money," Hebert insisted.
translation.xho: Ineendlela zayo [zokufumana imali] kwaye iya kufumana iindlela ezifanayo zokusinika imali,” utshilo uHebert.

translation.en: The ongoing strike is hampering progress of trials, as court operations remain suspended.
translation.xho: Uqhankqalazo oluqhubekayo luyiqhwalelisa inkqubo yamatyala, njengoko imisebenzi yeenkundla isanqunyanyisiwe.

translation.en: Several trials, including that of former justice minister Ralph Kasambara, who is answering charges in connection with the financial scandal, were indefinitely suspended last week.
translation.xho: Amatyala aliqela, kuquka elo lalowo wayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezobulungisa uRalph Kasambara, nophendula izityholo malunga notyhobo lwemali, anqunyanyisiwe kwiveki ephelileyo.

translation.en: Police are complaining of congestion in jail cells, as no suspects are being taken to court.
translation.xho: Amapolisa akhala ngokuxinana kwizisele zentolongo, nanjengoko kungekho barhanelwa abasiwa enkundleni.

translation.en: Malawi police spokesperson Rhoda Manjolo told VOA the only option they have is "giving police bail to those with minor offenses."
translation.xho: Isithethi samapolisa aseMalawi uRhoda Manjolo uxelele iVOA ekuphela kwendlela abanayo "kukunika ibheyile yamapolisa kwabo banamatyala amancinci."

translation.en: Human rights campaigners and legal experts say the strike is contributing to human rights violations.
translation.xho: Abakhankaseli bamalungelo oluntu kunye neengcali zomthetho zithi olu qhankqalazo lunegalelo ekunyhashweni kwamalungelo oluntu.

translation.en: There are those people who have to be taken to court within 48 hours, noted Lawyer George Kadzipatike who works in a private practice in the northern city of Mzuzu.
translation.xho: “Kukho abo bantu kufuneka basiwe enkundleni kwiiyure ezingamashumi amane anesibhozo,” liqaphele igqwetha uGeorge Kadzipatike osebenza kwindawo yabucala kumantla esixeko saseMzuzu.

translation.en: We cannot make application for them to be granted bail.
translation.xho: “Asinakusenza isicelo sokuba banikwe ibheyile.

translation.en: There are those people who do not want to live with their partners, they would like the court to decree that they be divorced, we cannot file any petition through the courts."
translation.xho: Kukho abo bantu bangafuniyo ukuhlala namaqabane abo, bangathanda ukuba inkundla ikhuphe isigunyaziso sokuba baqhawule umtshato, asinakufaka isicelo kwiinkundla zamatyala.”

translation.en: Government authorities say closed door negotiations to resolve the matter continue in the capital, Lilongwe.
translation.xho: Abasemagunyeni kurhulumente bathi uthethathethwano oluvaliweyo lokusombulula lo mba luyaqhubeka kwikomkhulu, iLilongwe.

translation.en: But the striking workers told VOA whatever the case, they will accept nothing short of a 30 percent increase in their salaries.
translation.xho: Kodwa abasebenzi abagwayimbileyo baxelele iVOA nokuba yintoni na, abazukwamkela nto ngaphandle kokunyuselwa imivuzo yabo ngamashumi amathathu eepesenti ekhulwini.

translation.en: A similar strike lasted three months in 2012 after the magistrates and judges joined the labor action.
translation.xho: Uqhankqalazo olulolu hlobo lwathatha iinyanga ezintathu ngo-2012 emva kokuba oomantyi neejaji bezibandakanye nentshukumo yabasebenzi.

translation.en: The United Nations World Food Program says the famine in southern Africa is even worse than predicted.
translation.xho: IUnited Nations World Food Programme ithi indlala esemazantsi eAfrika imbi kakhulu kunokuba bekucingelwa.

translation.en: WFP officials are warning that 13 million people in six countries: Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Zimbabwe, Swaziland and Mozambique are in danger of starvation if they do not get food aid.
translation.xho: Amagosa eWFP alumkisa ngelithi abantu abazizigidi ezili-13 kumazwe amathandathu: iMalawi, iZambia, iLesotho, iZimbabwe, iSwaziland neMozambique basengozini yokulamba ukuba abalufumani uncedo lokutya.

translation.en: World Food Program officials say they need one million tons of food to alleviate hunger in southern Africa, but they are not confident they will get it.
translation.xho: Amagosa eWorld Food Programme athi adinga isigidi seetoni zokutya ukuze athobe indlala kumazantsi eAfrika, kodwa abaqinisekanga ukuba baza kukufumana.

translation.en: In an appeal to the international community at the beginning of July, WFP officials asked for more than $0.5 billion to buy food.
translation.xho: Kwisibheno kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuqaleni kukaJulayi, amagosa eWFP acele ngaphezu kwe-0.5 yeebhiliyoni zeedola ukuthenga ukutya.

translation.en: So far they have received only 20 percent of that. WFP's director for the southern Africa region, Judith Lewis, says the situation is getting desperate.
translation.xho: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bafumene kuphela ama-20 ekhulwini oko. Umlawuli weWFP kummandla osemazantsi eAfrika, uJudith Lewis, uthi imeko iya isiba maxongo.

translation.en: The window of opportunity to avert what could be a major humanitarian crisis is closing, she said.
translation.xho: “Ithuba lokunqanda into enokuba yingxaki enkulu yoluntu liyavala,” utshilo.

translation.en: We need more assistance now.
translation.xho: “Sidinga uncedo ngakumbi ngoku.

translation.en: We need food on the high seas now, or we need cash to buy commodities that are still available in southern Africa, so we can avert this major, major crisis."
translation.xho: Sifuna ukutya kulwandle oluphezulu ngoku, okanye sifuna imali yokuthenga izinto zorhwebo ezisafumaneka kumazantsi e-Afrika, ukuze sithintele le ngxaki inkulu. "

translation.en: Currently, the WFP is assisting six million of the most vulnerable people in the six most severely affected countries.
translation.xho: Ngoku, iWFP inceda izigidi ezithandathu zabona bantu basemngciphekweni kumazwe amathandathu achaphazeleke kakhulu.

translation.en: About half of these people are in Zimbabwe.
translation.xho: Malunga nesiqingatha saba bantu baseZimbabwe.

translation.en: The agency says it is sure the number of people needing its help will rise.
translation.xho: Le arhente ithi iqinisekile ukuba lizakunyuka inani labantu abadinga uncedo lwayo.

translation.en: The World Health Organization notes southern Africa, in addition to having the highest prevalence of HIV/AIDS in the world, also has the world's highest chronic malnutrition rates.
translation.xho: IWorld Health Organization iphawula ukuba ummandla osemazantsi weAfrika, ukongezelela kukwanda kweHIV/AIDS ehlabathini lonke, ukwanelona zinga liphakamileyo lokungondleki liphakamileyo ehlabathini.

translation.en: It predicts about 300,000 people could die over the next six months from diseases related to malnutrition.
translation.xho: Iqikelela malunga nama-300,000 abantu abanokufa kwiinyanga ezintandathu ezizayo ngenxa yezifo ezinxulumene nokungondleki.

translation.en: Ms. Lewis says the dying has already begun. "We are seeing people moving from their villages," she said.
translation.xho: UNksz Lewis uthi ukufa sele kuqalile. “Sibona abantu befuduka ezilalini zabo,” utshilo.

translation.en: If they know there is going to be a food distribution, they immediately go there.
translation.xho: Ukuba bayazi ukuba kuza kwabelwa ukutya, baye ngoko nangoko.

translation.en: The problem is we do not even have enough food to feed the people who are on the rolls, let alone add food for other people in the areas.
translation.xho: Ingxaki kukuba asinako nokutya okwaneleyo kokondla abantu abakwi-rolls, singasathethi ke ngokongeza ukutya kwabanye abantu kwiindawo.

translation.en: Is there a potential to become chaotic? Yes. "
translation.xho: Ngaba kukho isiphithiphithi esinokubakho? Ewe. "

translation.en: WFP'S Judith Lewis says at this time of year the agency is usually planning how to get food supplies into the region before the rainy season hits in October.
translation.xho: UJudith Lewis weWFP uthi ngeli xesha lonyaka le arhente idla ngokucwangcisa indlela yokufumana ukutya kulo mmandla phambi kokuba kufike ixesha lemvula kweyeDwarha.

translation.en: But she says since the WFP is already having difficulty meeting its present targets, it can't even begin to plan for future food deliveries.
translation.xho: Kodwa uthi kuba iWFP sele inobunzima ekufezekiseni iithagethi zayo zangoku, ayinakho nokuqalisa ukucwangcisa ukuhanjiswa kokutya kwixesha elizayo.

translation.en: Canadian PM Impressed With African Development Plan - 2002-04-05
translation.xho: I-PM yaseKhanada ichukumisekile siSicwangciso soPhuhliso lwase-Afrika - 2002-04-05

translation.en: Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien says he is impressed with the progress being made towards implementing an African development plan.
translation.xho: Inkulumbuso yaseKhanada uJean Chretien uthi uchukumisekile yinkqubela phambili eyenziwayo ekuphumezeni isicwangciso sophuhliso lwase-Afrika.

translation.en: Mr. Chretien made the remarks Sunday after meeting with South African President Thabo Mbeki and other regional leaders in Pretoria.
translation.xho: Umnumzana Chretien ukuthethe oku ngeCawe emva kokudibana nomongameli woMzantsi Afrika uThabo Mbeki kunye nezinye iinkokheli zengingqi ePitoli.

translation.en: Mr. Chretien, the current chairman of the group of the seven most industrialized nations plus Russia, is visiting Africa to discuss the New Partnership for Africa's Development, known as NEPAD.
translation.xho: UMnu. Chretien, usihlalo okhoyo ngoku weqela lamazwe asixhenxe ahambele phambili kwezoshishino kunye neRashiya, undwendwela i-Afrika ukuze axoxe ngeNtsebenziswano eNtsha yoPhuhliso lwe-Afrika, eyaziwa ngokuba yiNEPAD.

translation.en: He said NEPAD will be one of the top agendas at the June G-8 summit in Kananaskis, Canada.
translation.xho: Uthe iNEPAD iya kuba yenye yee-ajenda eziphambili kwingqungquthela ye-G-8 kaJuni eKananaskis, eCanada.

translation.en: The G-8 nations are Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United States and Russia.
translation.xho: Amazwe akwiG-8 yiBritane, iCanada, iFrance, iJamani, iItali, iJapan, iMelika kunye neRussia.

translation.en: Mr. Chretien says topics such as human rights, democracy the rule of law, transparency and good governance will be discussed at the G8 summit.
translation.xho: Umnumzana Chretien uthi imixholo efana namalungelo oluntu, idemokhrasi ulawulo lomthetho, ukungafihlisi kunye nolawulo olululo ziza kuxoxwa kwindibano yeG8.

translation.en: NEPAD outlines objectives of promoting democracy and good governance in Africa in return for Western economic assistance. It
translation.xho: I-NEPAD ichaza iinjongo zokukhuthaza idemokhrasi kunye nolawulo olululo e-Afrika njengembuyekezo yoncedo lwezoqoqosho lwaseNtshona. Yona

translation.en: seeks to achieve an annual growth rate of seven-percent on the African continent by 2015.
translation.xho: ijonge ukufikelela kwinqanaba lonyaka lokukhula kweepesenti ezisixhenxe kwilizwekazi lase-Afrika ngowama-2015.

translation.en: South African President Mbeki said he is convinced that Africa is ready for NEPAD saying there has been definite progress toward democracy in the continent.
translation.xho: Umongameli waseMzantsi Afrika uMbeki uthe uqinisekile ukuba i-Afrika iyilungele i-NEPAD esithi kukho inkqubela phambili eqinisekileyo kwidemokhrasi kwilizwekazi.

translation.en: Later, Mr. Chretien and Mr. Mbeki were joined by presidents Festus Mogae of Botswana, Bakili Muluzu of Malawi, Joaquim
translation.xho: Kamva, uMnu. Chretien noMnu. Mbeki bathelelwa ngoomongameli uFestus Mogae waseBotswana, uBakili Muluzu waseMalawi, uJoaquim.

translation.en: Chissano of Mozambique, Sam Nujoma of Namibia, Benjamin Makapa of Tanzania and Vice President Enoch Kavindele of Zambia.
translation.xho: Chissano waseMozambique, uSam Nujoma waseNamibia, uBenjamin Makapa waseTanzania kunye noSekela Mongameli u-Enoch Kavindele waseZambia.

translation.en: Zimbabwe's President Robert Mugabe, who won re-election in disputed voting last month, was not invited.
translation.xho: Umongameli waseZimbabwe uRobert Mugabe, ophumelele unyulo kwakhona kwinyanga ephelileyo, akamenywanga.

translation.en: Reuters news agency reports the Canadian prime minister who has already visited Morocco, Algeria and Nigeria on his
translation.xho: I-arhente yeendaba yeReuters ibika ukuba inkulumbuso yaseCanada esele ityelele eMorocco, eAlgeria naseNigeria kweyakhe

translation.en: six-nation tour will visit Ethiopia and Senegal after South Africa.
translation.xho: Ukhenketho lwamazwe amathandathu luzakundwendwela i-Ethiopia neSenegal emva koMzantsi Afrika.
