translation.xho: Olunye ulwazi lwale ngxelo lunikezelwe yiReuters kunye ne-AFP.

translation.en: Child Labor in Malawi - 2002-02-28
translation.xho: Ukuqeshwa kwabantwana eMalawi - 2002-02-28

translation.en: The organization, Eye of the Child, is expressing concern about what is says is a large number of children who are being forced to work due to poverty.
translation.xho: Umbutho, i-Eye of the Child, uvakalisa inkxalabo ngento ekuthiwa luninzi lwabantwana abanyanzelwa ukuba baphangele ngenxa yendlala.

translation.en: It says these children risk being abused.
translation.xho: Ithi aba bantwana basemngciphekweni wokuxhatshazwa.

translation.en: Some under aged children work as mini – bus call boys in the busy business district of Limbe in the commercial capital, Blantyre.
translation.xho: Abanye abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka yobudala basebenza njengabakhwazi kwiibhasi ezincinci kwindawo yoshishino exakekileyo eLimbe kwikomkhulu lezorhwebo, iBlantyre.

translation.en: They are some of the many children who have been forced into employment because of poverty.
translation.xho: Bangabanye babantwana abaninzi abaye banyanzeleka ukuba baphangele ngenxa yokusokola.

translation.en: Maxwell Matewere is the executive director of Eye of the Child. He says many of the children come from rural areas.
translation.xho: UMaxwell Matewere ngumlawuli olawulayo kwi-Eye of the Child. Uthi uninzi lwabantwana luphuma ezilalini.

translation.en: He says, "Currently we havent done a data analysis but the Ministry of Labor intends to do that as soon as possible with financial resources from the International Labor Organization.
translation.xho: Uthi, "Okwangoku asikenzi uhlalutyo lwedatha kodwa uMphathiswa wezaBasebenzi uzimisele ukwenza oko ngokukhawuleza ngemithombo yemali evela kwiInternational Labor Organization.

translation.en: But basing on our own assessment and through our works, we feel child labor is a serious problem particularly in the rural areas and you can tell that from trafficking of children from rural areas to urban areas where most of the young people are working in peoples houses.
translation.xho: Kodwa ngokusekwe kuvavanyo lwethu nangemisebenzi yethu, sivakalelwa kukuba ukuqeshwa kwabantwana kuyingxaki enkulu ngakumbi kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kwaye unokuxela ukuba ukusuka ekurhwebeni kwabantwana besuka ezilalini besiya ezidolophini apho uninzi lolutsha lusebenza kwizindlu zabantu. .

translation.en: Mr. Matewere says poor children often find work on large farm estates.
translation.xho: UMnu. Matewere uthi abantwana abangathathi ntweni bahlala befumana umsebenzi kumafama amakhulu.

translation.en: He said, "We have noticed that there are some indications that there are children who are working in tea estates and tobacco estates.
translation.xho: Uthe, “Siqaphele ukuba kukho izinto ezibonisa ukuba kukho abantwana abasebenza kwiindawo zeti necuba.

translation.en: There also are children who are working in brick making mostly their parents will facilitate for them to work in those kinds of employment. "
translation.xho: Kukwakho abantwana abasebenza ekwenzeni izitena ubukhulu becala abazali babo baya kubaququzelela ukuba basebenze kwezo ntlobo zengqesho. "

translation.en: Mr. Matewere says the Eye of the Child has established that there are gross violations of children rights in the country.
translation.xho: Umnu. Matewere uthi iEye of the Child ifumanise ukuba kukho ukunyhashwa kwamalungelo abantwana kweli lizwe.

translation.en: These include, rape, defilement and being overworked.
translation.xho: Oku kubandakanya, udlwengulo, ukungcola kunye nokusebenza ngokugqithisileyo.

translation.en: He says this violates the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child.
translation.xho: Uthi oku kunyhasha iNkomfa yeZizwe eziManyeneyo ngamaLungelo oMntwana.

translation.en: If you look at the Convention of the Rights of a Child, he said, "you will see that it provides for the protection for children from any kind of exploitation from any kind of harmful activities or act which threatens their health, their development which is a threat to education.
translation.xho: Ukuba ujonga kwiNgqungquthela yamaLungelo oMntwana, watsho, "uya kubona ukuba ibonelela ngokhuseleko lwabantwana kulo naluphi na uhlobo lokuxhaphaza kulo naluphi na uhlobo lwemisebenzi eyingozi okanye isenzo esisongela impilo yabo, ukukhula kwabo. nto leyo esisisongelo kwimfundo.

translation.en: So children who are found working in tea estates, who are found in brick making, obvious, their rights as it is provided for in the Convention for the Rights of the Children as well as in the constitution are violated. "
translation.xho: Ngoko ke abantwana abafunyanwa besebenza kwiindawo zeti, abafunyanwa ekwenzeni izitena, kucacile, amalungelo abo njengoko ebonelelwe kwiNgqungquthela yamaLungelo abaNtwana ngokunjalo nakumgaqo-siseko bayagxojwa. "

translation.en: The Eye of the Child executive director says his organization is looking at ways of protecting the rights of a child.
translation.xho: Umphathi we-Eye of the Child uthi umbutho wakhe ujonga iindlela zokukhusela amalungelo omntwana.

translation.en: He says to achieve this, the group has started a number of programs.
translation.xho: Uthi ukuphumeza oku, eli qela liqale iinkqubo eziliqela.

translation.en: We have recently started a new program and what we are trying to do is to inform the general public on the best interests of the child and to inform them on the rights of a child.
translation.xho: “Kutshanje siqale inkqubo entsha kwaye into esizama ukuyenza kukwazisa uluntu ngokubanzi ngezinto ezilungele umntwana nokubazisa nangamalungelo omntwana.

translation.en: At the same we want also to build up the capacity of the children themselves so that may be they can be use their authentic voice out their concerns. "
translation.xho: Kwangaxeshanye sifuna ukwakha amandla kubantwana ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukusebenzisa ilizwi labo lokwenyani ukuvakalisa iinkxalabo zabo. "

translation.en: According to the Ministry of Labor authorities, many children are forced to leave school and find work because parents cannot afford school fees.
translation.xho: Ngokutsho koMphathiswa wezaBasebenzi, abantwana abaninzi banyanzeleka ukuba bashiye isikolo baye kufuna umsebenzi ngenxa yokuba abazali bengakwazi ukuhlawula imali yesikolo.

translation.en: Although primary school is free in Malawi, most children do not attend due to lack of necessities like clothes.
translation.xho: Nangona isikolo samabanga aphantsi sisimahla eMalawi, uninzi lwabantwana aluyi ngenxa yokunqongophala kwezinto eziyimfuneko njengempahla.

translation.en: Over 60 per cent of Malawis nearly 11 million people live below the poverty line.
translation.xho: Ngaphezu kwama-60 eepesenti abantu baseMalawi abaphantse babe zizigidi ezili-11 abantu abaphila ngaphantsi komlinganiselo wentlupheko.

translation.en: Malawi Court Convicts 12 People in Albino Attack
translation.xho: Inkundla yaseMalawi ibagwebe abantu abali-12 kuhlaselo lweAlbino

translation.en: A high court in Malawi has convicted five people of murder for the 2018 killing of a 22-year-old albino man, including the victims brother.
translation.xho: Inkundla ephakamileyo yaseMalawi ibagwebe abantu abahlanu benetyala lokubulala ngo-2018 lokubulala indoda eneminyaka eyi-albino eneminyaka engama-22, kuquka nomzalwana wamaxhoba.

translation.en: The court convicted seven other people of selling the victim's body parts.
translation.xho: Inkundla igwebe abanye abantu abasixhenxe ngokuthengisa amalungu omzimba wexhoba.

translation.en: Malawi officials say more than 170 albinos have been attacked in the country since 2014 by people who believe their body parts bring luck and wealth.
translation.xho: Amagosa aseMalawi athi bangaphezu kwekhulu elinamashumi asixhenxe abantu abane-albino abathe bahlaselwa kweli lizwe ukusukela ngo-2014 ngabantu abakholelwa ukuba amalungu abo omzimba azisa amathamsanqa nobutyebi.

translation.en: Family members of the deceased, MacDonald Masambuka, left the courtroom Thursday with hopes of justice being served after the court convicted all 12 people accused in his death.
translation.xho: Amalungu osapho lomfi, uMacDonald Masambuka, aphume enkundleni ngoLwesine ngethemba lokuba ubulungisa buyenzeka emva kokuba inkundla ibagwebele bonke abantu abalishumi elinesibini abatyholwa ngokubhubha kwakhe.

translation.en: Family members, including Masambukas mother, appeared calm and composed as Judge Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga read the judgments.
translation.xho: Amalungu osapho, kuquka nomama kaMasambukas, babonakale bezolile kwaye bezolile ngelixa uJaji Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga efunda izigwebo.

translation.en: Those convicted included a Catholic priest, Father Thomas Muhosa, police officer Chikondi Chileka, clinician Lumbani Kamanga, and the deceaseds brother, Cassim Masambuka.
translation.xho: Kwabo bagwetywe benetyala baquka umfundisi weKhatholika, ubawo uThomas Muhosa, ipolisa uChileka Chileka, ugqirha Lumbani Kamanga, nomntakwabo obhubhileyo uCassim Masambuka.

translation.en: Charges included murder, extracting human tissues, causing harm to a person with disability, and trafficking in persons.
translation.xho: Izityholo zaziquka ukubulala, ukukhupha izicubu zomntu, ukwenza umonakalo kumntu okhubazekileyo, kunye nokurhweba ngabantu ngokungekho mthethweni.

translation.en: Kamanga convicted the victims brother and four others of murder.
translation.xho: UKmanga ugwebe amaxhoba ubhuti kunye nabanye abane ngokubulala.

translation.en: The court convicted seven other people, including the priest and police officer, of selling the victim's body parts.
translation.xho: Inkundla igwebe abanye abantu abasixhenxe abaquka umfundisi nepolisa ngokuthengisa amalungu omzimba wexhoba.

translation.en: Business with tissue  According to the court, Muhosha, Chileka and others offered to conduct business using human tissue extracted from a human corpse.
translation.xho: Ushishino ngeethishu Ngokwenkundla, uMuhosha, uChileka nabanye bazinikezele ngokuqhuba ishishini besebenzisa izicubu zomntu ezithathwe kwisidumbu somntu.

translation.en: The judge said the state proved beyond reasonable doubt the 12 people conspired to kill Masambuka to extract his bones based on a perception they would benefit financially.
translation.xho: Ijaji ithi urhulumente ungqinisise ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo ukuba abantu abalishumi elinesibini benze iyelenqe lokubulala uMasambuka ngenjongo yokukhupha amathambo akhe ngokwembono yokuba baza kuxhamla ngokwasezimalini.

translation.en: She said Masambuka is the latest victim of violent attacks on persons with albinism who have not been protected by the community.
translation.xho: Uthe uMasambuka lixhoba lamva nje lokuhlaselwa kwabantu abane-albinism abangakhuselwanga luluntu.

translation.en: Director of Public Prosecutions Steve Kayuni represented the state in the case. He said he was pleased the court agreed on all the seven charges he presented.
translation.xho: Umphathi wezoTshutshiso uSteve Kayuni ebemele umbuso kweli tyala. Uthi uyavuya inkundla ivumelene ngawo onke amatyala asixhenxe awathi wawabeka.

translation.en: Its really something overwhelming on the part of the state considering that this matter, if you notice, there is a police officer involved, a priest involved and there is a brother involved.
translation.xho: “Kuyinto exakileyo kwicala likarhulumente xa ucinga ukuba lo mba, ukuba uyaqaphela, kukho ipolisa elibandakanyekayo, umfundisi obandakanyekayo kwaye kukho umzalwana obandakanyekayo.

translation.en: If you notice, it all revolves around the position of trust — that somebody like the late Macdonald Masambuka trusted so much, they are the ones who ended up betraying him," Kayuni said.
translation.xho: Ukuba uyaqaphela, yonke le nto ijikela kwisikhundla sokuthembana — into yokuba umntu ofana nongasekhoyo uMacdonald Masambuka ebemthembile kakhulu, ngabo abagqibele bemngcatsha,” utshilo uKayuni.

translation.en: Masambuka went missing from his village on March 9, 2018, and his limbless body was found buried in a garden on April 2, 2018, in his home district of Machinga south of Malawi.
translation.xho: UMasambuka waduka kwilali yakhe ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2018, waza umzimba wakhe ongenamalungu wafunyanwa ungcwatywe egadini ngomhla wesibini kuTshazimpuzi ka-2018, kwisithili sakowabo eMachinga emazantsi eMalawi.

translation.en: Enticement  Court documents show that Masambuka was enticed by his brother to meet his friends, who he claimed had found a girl for him to marry.
translation.xho: Amaxwebhu enkundla yamatyala abonisa ukuba uMasambuka wahendwa ngumntakwabo ukuba adibane nabahlobo bakhe, abathi bamfumanele intombi afuna ukuyitshata.

translation.en: But when they reached the scene, the alleged friends grabbed Masambuka by the neck and dragged him to a garden where they killed him. Here, his assailants cut off his limbs, burned his body using petrol and buried it there.
translation.xho: Kodwa bathe bakufika kwindawo yexhwayelo, abo batyholwa ngokuba ngabahlobo bam bambamba uMasambuka entanyeni bamrhuqela egadini apho bambulala khona. Apha, abahlaseli bakhe bamnqumla amalungu omzimba, batshisa umzimba wakhe ngepetroli baza bawungcwaba apho.

translation.en: This was the first such case involving high-profile community members involved in attacks on persons with albinism.
translation.xho: Eli yayilityala lokuqala elilolu hlobo libandakanya abantu abakwizinga eliphezulu ababandakanyeka kuhlaselo lwabantu abane-albinism.

translation.en: Masauko Chamkakala, the lawyer for the 12 defendants in the case, said he would comment once he had gone through the judgment.
translation.xho: UMasauko Chamkakala, igqwetha labamangalelwa abalishumi elinesibini kweli tyala, uthe uzakuhlomla xa sele egqibile ukuwisa isigwebo.

translation.en: We are still waiting to see the perfected judgment so that we can read it and study it and talk to our clients, Chamkakala said.
translation.xho: “Sisalindele ukubona isigwebo esigqibeleleyo ukuze sifunde sifunde kwaye sithethe nabathengi bethu,” uthethe watsho uChamkakala.

translation.en: Rights activists said they expected the court to give stiffer punishment to those convicted.
translation.xho: Abalwela amalungelo bathi balindele ukuba inkundla inike isohlwayo esiqatha kwabo babanjiweyo.

translation.en: Serious sentencing'
translation.xho: Isigwebo esiqatha'

translation.en: Ian Simbota represented the Association of Persons with Albinism at the court.
translation.xho: UIan Simbota ebemele umbutho wabantu abaneAlbinism kule nkundla.

translation.en: When the judge was reading, what concerned me was that part of a [Priest] Father Muhosha [and others] who have been convicted of transacting body parts.
translation.xho: “Xa ijaji yayifunda, eyona nto yayindixhalabisa yile nxalenye [kaMbingeleli] uTata uMuhosha [nabanye] abagwetyelwe ukutshintshisa amalungu omzimba.

translation.en: If you go to the Anatomy Act, it is not so hard on such offenses.
translation.xho: Ukuba uya kwi-Anatomy Act, ayinzima kangako kwezo ziphoso.

translation.en: So, we are really looking forward to the judge, if at all its possible, to put a human face to the case so that at least we really need to see serious sentencing on this case," Simbota said.
translation.xho: Ngoko ke, sijonge ngenene ukuba ijaji, ukuba kunokwenzeka, ibeke ubuso bomntu kweli tyala ukuze noko sidinga ukubona isigwebo esiqatha kweli tyala,” utshilo uSimbota.

translation.en: The high court is expected to sentence the perpetrators on May 30.
translation.xho: Inkundla ephakamileyo kulindeleke ukuba igwebe abenzi bobubi ngomhla wamashumi amathathu kuCanzibe.

translation.en: In another case, a high court on Thursday sentenced a 37-year-old man to life in prison for the 2020 murder of a 14-year-old-boy with albinism in Phalombe district.
translation.xho: Kwelinye ityala, inkundla ephakamileyo ngoLwesine igwebe ixhego elineminyaka engamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe (37) ubudala ngetyala lokubulala inkwenkwana eneminyaka elishumi elinesine (albinism) kwisithili sasePhalombe ngo2020.

translation.en: Zimbabwe Official Defends Crackdown on Protests, Urges Patience with Economy
translation.xho: Igosa laseZimbabwe likhusela uqhanqalazo, libongoza umonde kuQoqosho

translation.en: Zimbabwe's minister of foreign affairs and international trade on Monday defended crackdowns on anti-government demonstrations and urged patience in turning around the country's foundering economy.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wemicimbi yangaphandle kunye norhwebo lwamazwe ngamazwe eZimbabwe ngoMvulo ukhusele uqhanqalazo oluchasene norhulumente kwaye wabongoza ukuba nomonde ekuguquleni uqoqosho olusekiyo.

translation.en: Though "everybody's got the right to demonstrate," there have "been a lot of insinuations and campaigns of violence,"
translation.xho: Nangona "wonke umntu enelungelo lokubonisa," kuye kwakho "iintetho ezininzi kunye namaphulo obundlobongela,"

translation.en: Sibusiso B. Moyo told VOA in an interview.
translation.xho: USibusiso B. Moyo uxelele iVOA kudliwano-ndlebe.

translation.en: Citing public safety, he endorsed a Zimbabwe court's ruling hours earlier to uphold a police ban on a protest organized by the opposition Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) alliance.
translation.xho: Ecaphula ukhuseleko loluntu, uye wavumelana nesigqibo senkundla yaseZimbabwe kwiiyure ezingaphambili zokuxhasa ukuvalwa umlomo kwamapolisa kuqhanqalazo olwaluququzelelwa ngumbutho ophikisayo weMovement for Democratic Change (MDC).

translation.en: Alliance leaders are pressing President Emmerson Mnangagwa and the ruling ZANU-PF party for a role in a transitional government.
translation.xho: Iinkokheli zomanyano zinyanzelisa uMongameli Emmerson Mnangagwa kunye neqela elilawulayo leZANU-PF ukuba bathathe inxaxheba kurhulumente wenguqu.

translation.en: They had organized a demonstration Monday in Bulawayo, the country's second-largest city, but police authorities banned it hours before its intended start.
translation.xho: Bebeququzelele uqhanqalazo ngoMvulo koBulawayo, isixeko sesibini ngobukhulu kweli lizwe, kodwa amapolisa aluvala kwiiyure ezimbalwa phambi kokuba luqale.

translation.en: Two other opposition demonstrations still are planned this week: for the central city of Gweru on Tuesday and the southeastern city of Masvingo on Wednesday.
translation.xho: Eminye imiqhankqalazo emibini yenkcaso isacwangcisiwe kule veki: kumbindi wesixeko saseGweru ngoLwesibini nakwisixeko esikumazantsi mpuma eMasvingo ngolwesithathu.

translation.en: Police also had pre-emptively banned a demonstration in Harare last Friday, a decision upheld by a Zimbabwe court.
translation.xho: Amapolisa nawo aye aluvala kwangaphambili uqhanqalazo eHarare ngoLwesihlanu odlulileyo, isigqibo esixhaswe yinkundla yaseZimbabwe.

translation.en: Hundreds of MDC supporters ignored the ban, leading to clashes between civilians and police.
translation.xho: Amakhulu-khulu abalandeli be-MDC akasihoyanga esi sithintelo, nto leyo ekhokelele kungquzulwano phakathi kwabahlali namapolisa.

translation.en: Video and photographs showed police hitting and kicking some demonstrators among actions that drew complaints of excessive force from civil and human rights groups, including the United Nations human rights office.
translation.xho: Ividiyo kunye neefoto zibonise amapolisa ebetha kwaye ekhaba abanye abaqhankqalazi phakathi kwezenzo eziye zazisa izikhalazo zamandla agqithisileyo kumaqela oluntu kunye namalungelo oluntu, kuquka ne-ofisi yamalungelo oluntu yeZizwe eziManyeneyo.

translation.en: Police, not demonstrators, showed up in force on Bulawayo streets Monday, with foot patrols wielding shields, batons and, in some cases, pistols.
translation.xho: Amapolisa, hayi abaqhankqalazi, athe agaleleka kwizitalato zakwaBulawayo ngoMvulo, ephethe amakhaka, amakhuni, kwezinye iimeko, imipu.

translation.en: The Associated Press reported police trucks and water cannons positioned in the downtown area.
translation.xho: I-Associated Press inike ingxelo ngeelori zamapolisa kunye neenkanunu zamanzi ezibekwe kumbindi wedolophu.

translation.en: A young man in Bulawayo, identifying himself only as James, told VOA that negotiations between the government and opposition leaders were even more important than demonstrations.
translation.xho: Umfana wakwaBulawayo ozichaze njengoJames kuphela, uxelele iVOA ukuba uthethathethwano phakathi kukarhulumente neenkokheli zamaqela aphikisayo zibaluleke ukodlula uqhanqalazo.

translation.en: Honestly, to demonstrate, we can end up being hurt by being beaten, being chased around.
translation.xho: “Enyanisweni, ukubonisa, singaphela sonzakele ngokubethwa, sileqwa.

translation.en: There's really nothing that we see coming out of it," James said.
translation.xho: Akukho nto siyibona iphuma kuyo,” utshilo uJames.

translation.en: But these men should sit down and see what they can do for us, especially us, the youth. …
translation.xho: “Kodwa la madoda kufuneka ahlale phantsi abone ukuba angasenzela ntoni, ingakumbi thina silulutsha. …

translation.en: We have been affected a lot, and we are getting old just running."
translation.xho: Sichaphazeleke kakhulu, kwaye siyaguga sibaleka nje. "

translation.en: Moyo, the foreign minister, told VOA the administration is "undertaking economic reforms [that] are fundamental and they are key to ensuring that even the youth would finally have jobs created for them, so that we can create an environment where investors and the capital will find it easy to come into this country, where jobs will be created, and the youth will be part and parcel of economic activity."
translation.xho: UMoyo, umphathiswa wezangaphandle, uxelele iVOA ukuba ulawulo "lwenza utshintsho lwezoqoqosho olusisiseko kwaye lungundoqo ekuqinisekiseni ukuba nolutsha ekugqibeleni luya kudalelwa imisebenzi, ukuze sikwazi ukudala imeko apho abatyali-mali kunye nenkunzi. uzakufumana kulula ukungena kweli lizwe, apho kuza kudaleka imisebenzi, kwaye ulutsha luzakuba yinxalenye yemisebenzi yezoqoqosho.”

translation.en: Moyo said Zimbabwe is midway into a two-year "transition stabilization program" to revive the country's devastated economy:
translation.xho: UMoyo uthe iZimbabwe iphakathi kwi "transition stabilization program" yeminyaka emibini yokuvuselela uqoqosho lweli lizwe olunxungupheleyo:

translation.en: We have got one year to go and we are saying we should by then be out of the doldrums.
translation.xho: Sinonyaka omnye ukuba sihambe kwaye sithi ngelo xesha kufuneka siphume kwi-doldrum.

translation.en: The southern African country of nearly 16 million is experiencing its worst financial crisis since 2008, beset by hyperinflation and the fallout of decades of corruption.
translation.xho: Ilizwe elikumazantsi e-Afrika eliphantse libe zizigidi ezili-16 lijongene nengxaki enkulu yezemali ukusukela ngo-2008, lithwaxwa kukunyuka kwamaxabiso ezinto kunye nokuwa korhwaphilizo lwamashumi eminyaka.

translation.en: Many struggle to buy basics such as food and medicine.
translation.xho: Abaninzi bayasokola ukuthenga izinto ezisisiseko ezifana nokutya namayeza.

translation.en: With the poor economy and crops devastated by drought and a spring cyclone, the UN World Food Program anticipates that 5.5 million people will need emergency food aid by next April.
translation.xho: Ngoqoqosho oluhlwempuzekileyo kunye nezityalo ezitshatyalaliswe yimbalela kunye nesivunguvungu sasentwasahlobo, i-UN World Food Programme ilindele ukuba abantu abazizigidi ezi-5.5 baya kufuna uncedo lokutya olungxamisekileyo ngo-Aprili ozayo.

translation.en: Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube, who had predicted 3.1% growth for 2019, offered a sobering update to Zimbabwe's parliament in early August.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wezeziMali uMthuli Ncube, othe waqikelela ukukhula nge-3.1% ngo-2019, unike ingxelo eyothusayo kwipalamente yaseZimbabwe ekuqaleni kuka-Agasti.

translation.en: The revised 2019 GDP growth is expected to be negative, Reuters news service reported him as saying.
translation.xho: Ukukhula okuhlaziyiweyo kwe-GDP ka-2019 kulindeleke ukuba kube kubi, utshilo ingxelo yeendaba zeReuters.

translation.en: Ncube did not provide any updated figure.
translation.xho: UNcube khange anike manani ahlaziyiweyo.

translation.en: Civil Society Workers Run Afoul of Tanzania Security Officials in Sign of Increasing Clampdown
translation.xho: Abasebenzi bemibutho yoluntu baqhubela phambili amagosa okhuseleko eTanzania ngomqondiso wokwandiswa kweClampdown

translation.en: African civil society campaigners attending a conference in Tanzania were questioned and warned over the weekend, in what human rights activists say is part of a continuing clampdown on free speech in the East African nation.
translation.xho: Abakhankasi boluntui base-Afrika bezimase inkomfa e-Tanzania babuzwa imibuzo kwaye balunyukiswa kwimpelaveki, kwinto abathi abalwela amalungelo oluntu yinxalenye yokuqhubekeka koxinzelelo kwintetho ekhululekileyo kwisizwe saseMpuma Afrika.

translation.en: Details are still emerging over what exactly happened to at least 40 civil society workers who ran afoul of security officials at this year's summit of the Southern African Development Community in Dar es Salaam.
translation.xho: Iinkcukacha zisaphuma malunga nokuba kwenzeke ntoni kanye kanye kubasebenzi boluntu abangama-40 abathe bangquzulana namagosa okhuseleko kwingqungquthela yalo nyaka yoMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika eDar es Salaam.

translation.en: But rights experts said Monday that the episode is another worrying sign of heightened paranoia and harassment from the government.
translation.xho: Kodwa iingcali zamalungelo zathi ngoMvulo esi siqendu sesinye isibonakaliso esixhalabisayo sokunyuka kwezenzo ezingenangqiqo kunye nokuxhatshazwa ngurhulumente.

translation.en: Catherine Eden, a lawyer for the Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition, says the incident stemmed from a misunderstanding.
translation.xho: UCatherine Eden, igqwetha leTanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition, uthi esi siganeko sibangelwe kukungaqondi kakuhle.

translation.en: South African delegates to the 15-nation conference, she said, wanted to hold a short commemoration of the seventh anniversary of South Africa's deadly Marikana mine massacre on Aug. 16.
translation.xho: Abathunywa boMzantsi Afrika kwinkomfa yamazwe ali-15, uthe, babefuna ukubamba isikhumbuzo esifutshane sesikhumbuzo sesixhenxe sokubulawa kwendyikitya yokufa yaseMarikana eMzantsi Afrika ngomhla we-16 ka-Agasti.

translation.en: Thirty-four striking miners were killed by police in the deadliest security incident since the end of apartheid in 1994.
translation.xho: Abasebenzi-mgodini abangamashumi amathathu anesine babulawa ngamapolisa kwesona siganeko sabulala abantu abaninzi ukususela ekupheleni kocalucalulo ngo-1994.

translation.en: So delegates at a side event sang the South African anthem, held a moment of silence and availed on their government to better protect its people.
translation.xho: Ngoko abathunywa kumsitho osecaleni bacula umhobe woMzantsi Afrika, bathi cwaka umzuzwana baze bamemelela kurhulumente wabo ukuba akukhusela ngcono abantu bakhe.

translation.en: But something they wrote on a piece of paper convinced security police the delegates had bigger plans.
translation.xho: Kodwa into ababeyibhale ephepheni yaqinisekisa amapolisa ezokhuseleko ukuba abathunywa banezicwangciso ezinkulu kunoko.

translation.en: They wrote some messages on the flip charts, of which the little content that was captured in the flip charts read,
translation.xho: Babhala imiyalezo ethile kwiitshathi, apho umxholo omncinci owawufakwe kule tshati wawufundeka ngoluhlobo,

translation.en: Stop killing our people,'" she said. "...
translation.xho: Yekani ukubulala abantu bethu,'” utshilo.

translation.en: So I think there was a national security person in that meeting and he saw those messages and so he interpreted that as a plan to demonstrate.
translation.xho: Ke ndicinga ukuba kwakukho umntu wokhuseleko lwesizwe kuloo ntlanganiso kwaye wayibona loo miyalezo kwaye ke wayitolika njengesicwangciso sokubonisa.

translation.en: But if you look closely, you can't see any relationship as to why they would want to demonstrate for the Marikana shootings in Tanzania."
translation.xho: Kodwa ukuba uyajongisisa, awuboni nabuphi na ubudlelwane bokuba kutheni befuna ukubonisa udubulo lwaseMarikana eTanzania. "

translation.en: It's not clear if anyone was actually arrested. Other rights groups say that some foreign campaigners were arrested, but not interrogated.
translation.xho: Akukacaci ukuba ukhona umntu owabanjwayo. Amanye amaqela amalungelo athi abanye abakhankasi bamazwe angaphandle babanjwa, kodwa abakhange baabuzwe mibuzo.

translation.en: Eden says she was summoned by authorities as she went to the police station Friday night to meet with a local coordinator and then was let go with a warning.
translation.xho: U-Eden uthi ubizwe ngabasemagunyeni njengoko wayesiya kwisikhululo samapolisa ngolwesiHlanu ukuya kudibana nomnxibelelanisi wendawo emva koko wakhululwa ngesilumkiso.

translation.en: Police later went to delegates' hotel rooms looking for materials that they thought were a security threat.
translation.xho: Kamva amapolisa aya kumagumbi eehotele zabathunywa ekhangela izinto awayecinga ukuba ziyingozi yokhuseleko.

translation.en: They found nothing, she said.
translation.xho: Abafumananga nto, watsho.

translation.en: Janet Zhou, director of the Zimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, was one of the campaigners questioned by security forces at her hotel.
translation.xho: UJanet Zhou, umlawuli weZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, ngomnye wabakhankasi ababuzwa imibuzo ngabezokhuseleko kwihotele yakhe.

translation.en: I was afraid, I was insecure, I was traumatized to say the least, she told VOA, after returning home to Harare.
translation.xho: “Ndandisoyika, ndandiziva ndingakhuselekanga, ndihlukumezekile ukuba ndingatsho,” uxelele iVOA, emva kokubuyela ekhaya eHarare.

translation.en: Because seven security details coming over after midnight and questioning me about a demonstration and placards that I wasn't going to be able to give them, was something else.
translation.xho: Ngenxa yokuba amadoda asixhenxe okhuseleko eza emva kobusuku kwaye andibuza imibuzo malunga nomboniso kunye neeplakhadsi endandingazokukwazi ukubanika, yayiyenye into.

translation.en: I didn't understand it. It left me really terrified."
translation.xho: Andizange ndiyiqonde. Yandishiye ndosoyika ngokwenene. "

translation.en: She said police then told her — and her 40-person delegation — to remain in their hotel all day Saturday.
translation.xho: Uthe amapolisa amxelela kunye negqiza lakhe labantu abangama-40- ukuba bahlale ehotele imini yonke yangoMgqibelo.

translation.en: She asked them if they were under arrest, to which they did not reply.
translation.xho: Wababuza ukuba babanjiwe na, abazange bamphendule.

translation.en: Oryem Nyeko, a Kampala-based researcher for Human Rights Watch, noted that Tanzanian police didn't do anything technically illegal.
translation.xho: U-Oryem Nyeko, umphandi oseKampala kwi-Human Rights Watch, uqaphele ukuba amapolisa aseTanzania akazange enze into engekhosemthethweni.

translation.en: But, he said, that doesn't make it right, either.
translation.xho: Kodwa, wathi, oko akukwenzi ukuba kulunge, kananjalo.

translation.en: I think it's a perfectly valid thing for police to do, he said.
translation.xho: “Ndicinga ukuba yinto efanelekileyo ukuba amapolisa ayenze,” utshilo.

translation.en: However, the challenge with that is that it speaks to a wider problem in Tanzania as far as a closing civic space and the opportunities that people in civic society have to freely express themselves.
translation.xho: “Nangona kunjalo, umceli mngeni apho kukuba ibonisa ngengxaki ebanzi eTanzania xa kujongwe umba wokuvala indawo yasekuhlaleni kunye namathuba okuba abantu basekuhlaleni baveze izimvo zabo ngokukhululekileyo.

translation.en: This is part of a wider pattern of civic repression in the country."
translation.xho: Le yinxalenye yendlela ebanzi yocinezelo loluntu kweli lizwe. "

translation.en: International groups like the Committee to Protect Journalists have also warned of increased repression.
translation.xho: Amaqela amazwe ngamazwe afana neCommittee to Protect Journalists nawo alumkise ngokwanda kwengcinezelo.

translation.en: Ahead of the SADC summit, the watchdog group noted its concerns about a "deeply troubling erosion of press freedom," and of "attacks on individual journalists, media suspensions, internet shutdowns, and restrictive legislation."
translation.xho: Phambi kwengqungquthela ye-SADC, iqela labajongi liqaphele iinkxalabo zalo malunga "nokhukuliseko olukhulu lwenkululeko yeendaba," kunye "nohlaselo lweentatheli ezizimeleyo, ukumiswa kweendaba, ukuvalwa kwe-intanethi, kunye nomthetho othintelayo."

translation.en: The CPJ made special mention of Tanzanian journalists Azory Gwanda, who has been missing since 2017, and Erick Kabendera, who was arrested last month and charged with economic crimes, which the organization says is in retaliation for his critical journalism.
translation.xho: I-CPJ ithethe ngokukodwa ngeentatheli zaseTanzania u-Azory Gwanda, owalahleka ukusukela ngo-2017, kunye no-Erick Kabendera, owabanjwa kwinyanga ephelileyo wabekwa ityala lolwaphulo-mthetho lwezoqoqosho, apho mbutho uthi uziphindezela ngobuntatheli bakhe obugxekayo.

translation.en: Kabendera remains behind bars. On Monday, Eden, his lawyer, said the court decided to adjourn to give prosecutors more time to investigate. That will keep him in jail for more than a week longer, until Aug. 30.
translation.xho: UKabendera  usavalelwe. NgoMvulo, u-Eden, igqwetha lakhe, uthe inkundla igqibe kwelokuba inqumamise ukunika abatshutshisi ixesha elongezelelweyo lokuphanda. Loo nto iza kumgcina entolongweni ixesha elingaphezu kweveki, kude kube ngu-Agasti 30.

translation.en: Anna Henga, director of the Legal and Human Rights Center, said police actions only further a worrying trend in Tanzania under President John Magafuli, whom critics say is becoming increasingly authoritarian.
translation.xho: U-Anna Henga, umlawuli weLegal and Human Right Center, uthe izenzo zamapolisa ziqhubela phambili inkxalabo eTanzania phantsi koMongameli uJohn Magafuli, apho abangxeki bathu uya ephatha ngegunya.

translation.en: This means the continuation of a limited civic space. Because this has happened since 2016.
translation.xho: Oku kuthetha ukuqhubeka kweendawo zokuhlala ezilinganiselweyo. Kuba oku oko kusenzeke ukususela ngo-2016.

translation.en: There are a lot of issues, there is a negative development toward limited civic space.
translation.xho: Kukho imiba emininzi, kukho uphuhliso olubi olubhekiselele kwindawo elinganiselweyo yoluntu.

translation.en: And it is targeted to people like civil society organizations, the media, hindering the freedom of speech, the freedom of association."
translation.xho: Kwaye ijolise kubantu abafana nemibutho yoluntu, amajelo eendaba, ethintela inkululeko yokuthetha, inkululeko yombutho."

translation.en: Few Demonstrators Turn Up for Zimbabwe Protest in Bulawayo
translation.xho: Bambalwa abaqhankqalazi abazimase uqhankqalazo lwaseZimbabwe eBulawayo

translation.en: Few people have turned up for an opposition protest in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe's second city, on Monday as armed police maintained heavy presence on the streets and at a courthouse where the opposition is pressing to be allowed to hold the demonstration.
translation.xho: Bambalwa abantu abathe bazimasa  uqhankqalazo eBulawayo, isixeko sesibini saseZimbabwe, ngoMvulo njengoko amapolisa axhobileyo ethe gqolo ukuhlala ezitalatweni nakwinkundla yamatyala apho amaqela aphikisayo anyanzelise ukuba avunyelwe ukuba enze umboniso.

translation.en: Business in Bulawayo's usually bustling downtown was subdued with the most traffic from police trucks, water cannons and dozens of police officers patrolling on foot.
translation.xho: Amashishini edolophini yakwaBulawayo ahlala ephithizela yothotywa kukuzala kweelori zamapolisa, iimoto zamanzi kunye nentaphane yamapolisa ejikeleza ngeenyawo.

translation.en: The opposition party, the Movement for Democratic Change, had called the protest as part of a planned series of demonstrations to push President Emmerson Mnangagwa to agree to a transitional government amid a rapidly deteriorating economy and rising political tensions.
translation.xho: Umbutho ophikisayo, iMovement for Democratic Change, yabiza uqhankqalazo njengenxalenye yoqhankqalazo olucwangcisiweyo lokunyanzela uMongameli Emmerson Mnangagwa ukuba avume urhulumente wenguqu phakathi koqoqosho oluwohlokayo kunye noxinzelelo lwezopolitiko.

translation.en: But the police banned the protest in the southern city, citing security concerns.
translation.xho: Kodwa amapolisa aluvala uqhanqalazo kwidolophu esemazantsi, echaza inkxalabo yokhuseleko.

translation.en: A Bulawayo magistrate is hearing the opposition party's challenge to the ban.
translation.xho: Umantyi waseBulawayo umamele umngeni wombutho ophikisayo malunga nokuvalwa koluqhankqalazo.

translation.en: The protest was planned as a follow up to demonstrations held in the capital, Harare, on Friday when several hundred demonstrators marched in defiance of a police ban that was upheld by the High Court.
translation.xho: Olu qhankqalazo belucwangciswe njengokulandelela uqhankqalazo obelubanjwe kwikomkhulu, iHarare, ngoLwesihlanu xa abaqhankqalazi abangamakhulu bebengahambisani nomthetho wamapolisa owaphunyezwa yiNkundla ePhakamileyo.

translation.en: Police used tear gas and beatings with batons to quell the Harare protest.
translation.xho: Amapolisa asebenzise izintywizisi kunye nokubetha ngeentonga ukunqanda uqhankqalazo lwaseHarare.

translation.en: Zimbabweans Claim Police Brutality During Economic Protests
translation.xho: Abemi baseZimbabwe babanga inkohlakalo yamapolisa ngexesha yoqhanqalazo lwezoqoqosho

translation.en: Zimbabweans defied a police ban Friday and held demonstrations to protest the country's deteriorating economy.
translation.xho: Abantu baseZimbabwe baye badelela ukuvalwa koqhanqalazo ngamapolisa ngoLwesihlanu kwaye babambe uqhanqalazo bekhalazela ukudodobala koqoqosho lweli lizwe.

translation.en: Despite the High Court ban on planned protests, members of the Movement for Democratic Change took to the streets and clashed with police.
translation.xho: Nangona iNkundla ePhakamileyo iye yaluvala uqhanqalazo olucetywayo, amalungu eMovement for Democratic Change angena ezitalatweni angquzulana namapolisa.

translation.en: Some of the injured accused police of derailing protests, which they said were meant to persuade President Emmerson Mnangagwa's government to breathe life into Zimbabwe's moribund economy.
translation.xho: Abanye abonzakeleyo batyhola amapolisa ngokudodobalisa uqhanqalazo, abathi lwenzelwe ukucenga urhulumente kaMongameli Emmerson Mnangagwa ukuba aphefumlele ubomi kuqoqosho lwaseZimbabwe.

translation.en: With tears on her cheeks, 32-year-old Tafadzwa Bvuta said her degree had not helped her get anything for her three children.
translation.xho: Ethe gwantyi iinyembezi, uTafadzwa Bvuta oneminyaka engama-32 uthe isidanga sakhe asimncedanga nokuba akwazi ukwenzela abantwana bakhe abathathu izinto.

translation.en: They beat us up, she said of the police. "What have we done? All these security forces are supposed to protect us all — not just one person.
translation.xho: “Basibethe basibetha,” watsho ngamapolisa. "Senze ntoni? Yonke le mikhosi yezokhuseleko kufanele ukuba isikhusele sonke - hayi umntu omnye.

translation.en: Where will we go and survive?
translation.xho: Siza kuya phi size sisinde?

translation.en: Shall we kill our kids since we are struggling to take care of them?"
translation.xho: Ingaba kufuneka sibabulale abantwana bethu ekubeni sisokola ukubagcina?"

translation.en: Make Nyashanu, 27, said he would continue protesting because he is miserable about being unemployed.
translation.xho: UMake Nyashanu ona-27, uthe uzakuqhubeka noqhanqalazo kuba ukhathazekile ngokungaphangeli.

translation.en: He said police were indiscriminately beating demonstrators — even elderly ones and people not protesting.
translation.xho: Uthe amapolisa ebebetha ngokungakhethiyo abaqhankqalazi - nabantu abadala kunye nabantu abangaqhankqalaziyo.

translation.en: Is this democracy? he asked, adding that it was a peaceful demonstration but police were causing chaos.
translation.xho: Ingaba yidemokhrasi le? ubuze watsho esongeza esithi ibiluqhankqalazo olunoxolo kodwa amapolisa ebedala isiphithiphithi.

translation.en: The opposition said it will hold another protest Monday in Zimbabwe's second largest city, Bulawayo, and will go to other cities and places until the government addresses the economy.
translation.xho: Iqela eliphikisayo lithi liza kubamba olunye uqhankqalazo ngoMvulo kwidolophu yesibini ngobukhulu eZimbabwe, iBulawayo, kwaye lizakuya kwezinye izixeko neendawo de urhulumente alungise uqoqosho.

translation.en: Government response
translation.xho: Impendulo karhulumente

translation.en: Information Minister Monica Mutsvangwa called the protests counterproductive, saying January's demonstrations against fuel price increases resulted in $20 million to $30 million in losses for businesses from looting and non-productive days.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wezoLwazi uMonica Mutsvangwa uthe olu qhankqalazo alusebenzi, esithi uqhankqalazo lukaJanuwari oluchasene nokunyuswa kwexabiso lepetroli lubangele ilahleko yezigidi ezingama-20 ukuya kwi-30 yezigidi zeedola kumashishini ngenxa yokuphangwa kunye neentsuku ezingenamveliso.

translation.en: Government calls on all progressive Zimbabweans to desist from being used by negative forces to destabilize their own country, as this will only prolong the hardships which the government is tirelessly trying to address in a more sustainable manner, she said.
translation.xho: “Urhulumente uhlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi baseZimbabwe abanenkqubela ukuba bayeke ukusetyenziswa ziimpembelelo ezimbi ukudodobalisa ilizwe labo, kuba oku kuzakwandisa ubunzima urhulumente azama ukubulungisa ngendlela ezinzileyo,” utshilo.

translation.en: I wish to reiterate the call by His Excellency Comrade ED Mnangagwa for all patriotic Zimbabweans to resort to dialogue as a means to solve the challenges we face as a nation.
translation.xho: Ndinqwenela ukuphinda ikhwelo elenziwe ngoHloniphekileyo u-ED Mnangagwa lokuba bonke abemi baseZimbabwe abathand' izwe babhenele kwiingxoxo njengendlela yokusombulula imingeni esijongene nayo njengesizwe.

translation.en: Daniel Molokhele, the spokesman for the opposition, said his party was against Mnangagwa leading talks and accused him of stealing Zimbabwe's last election in 2018.
translation.xho: UDaniel Molokhele, isithethi seqela eliphikisayo, uthe umbutho wakhe uchasene neengxoxo azikhokelayo uMnangagwa kwaye wamtyhola ngobusela kunyulo lokugqibela lwaseZimbabwe ngo-2018.

translation.en: He said the protests would continue until Zimbabwe's economy gets back on track.
translation.xho: Uthe olu qhankqalazo luzakuqhubeka de uqoqosho lwaseZimbabwe lubuyele esimeni.

translation.en: UN Condemns Government Crackdown on Peaceful Protests in Zimbabwe
translation.xho: I-UN Igxeka urhulumente ngokuqhawula uqhankqalazo olunoxolo eZimbabwe.

translation.en: The U.N. human rights office is condemning a crackdown Friday in Zimbabwe by riot police on peaceful protesters in the capital, Harare.
translation.xho: I-Ofisi yamalungelo oluntu ye-UN igxeka intshukumo yangoLwesihlanu eZimbabwe eyenziwe ngamapolisa  kubantu abaqhankqalaza ngoxolo kwikomkhulu iHarare.

translation.en: The agency is calling for an investigation into excessive use of force by security forces.
translation.xho: Le arhente imemelela ukuba kwenziwe uphando malunga nokusetyenziswa kakhulu kwezigalo ngoonogada.

translation.en: U.N. Human Rights spokesman Rupert Colville says there are better ways to deal with the populations legitimate grievances on the economic situation in the country than by cracking down on peaceful protestors.
translation.xho: Isithethi samaLungelo oLuntu kwi-UN uRupert Colville uthi kukho iindlela ezingcono zokujongana nezikhalazo ezisemthethweni zabemi malunga nemeko yezoqoqosho kweli lizwe kunokuba kunqandwe abaqhankqalaza ngoxolo.

translation.en: We are deeply concerned by the socio-economic crisis that continues to unfold in Zimbabwe.
translation.xho: “Sixhalabile kakhulu ngemeko yezoqoqosho nentlalontle eqhubeka eZimbabwe.

translation.en: While acknowledging efforts made by the government, the international community and the U.N. in Zimbabwe to mitigate the effects of the crisis and reform
translation.xho: Ngelixa sivuma iinzame ezenziwe ngurhulumente, uluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe kunye ne-UN eZimbabwe ukunciphisa iziphumo zobunzima kunye nohlaziyo.

translation.en: process, the dire economic situation is now impacting negatively on the realization of economic and social rights of millions of Zimbabweans," Colville said.
translation.xho: Inkqubo, imeko yezoqoqosho emaxongo ngoku inefuthe elibi ekufezekisweni kwamalungelo ezoqoqosho nezentlalo ezigidi zabantu baseZimbabwe,” utshilo uColville.

translation.en: Zimbabwes citizens are struggling with hyperinflation, which has sent prices soaring for essential commodities such as fuel, food, transportation and health care.
translation.xho: Abemi baseZimbabwe batsala nzima ngenxa yokonyuka kakhulu kwamaxabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha , ebangele ukuba amaxabiso anyuke kwizinto ezibalulekileyo ezifana namafutha, ukutya, izithuthi kunye nokhathalelo lwezempilo.

translation.en: Compounding the problems is the ongoing impact of cyclone Idai that hit Zimbabwe in March and a severe drought.
translation.xho: Okongeza iingxaki yimpembelelo eqhubekayo yenkanyamba i-Idai ehlasele iZimbabwe ngoMatshi kunye nembalela enkulu.

translation.en: The United Nations says one third of Zimbabwes population of 16 million people is in need of humanitarian aid.
translation.xho: Umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo uthi isinye kwisithathu sabemi baseZimbabwe abantu abazizigidi ezilishumi elinesithandathu badinga uncedo loluntu.

translation.en: The fallout in terms of casualties and possible arrests from Fridays protests is not yet clear.
translation.xho: Ukuwa malunga nokwenzakala kunye nokubanjwa okunokwenzeka kuqhanqalazo lwangoLwezihlanu akukacaci.

translation.en: But Colville tells VOA his office has received disturbing reports of human rights violations over the past few months.
translation.xho: Kodwa uColville uxelele iVOA ukuba iofisi yakhe ifumene iingxelo eziphazamisayo zokunyhashwa kwamalungelo oluntu kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zidlulileyo.

translation.en: There are, as I said, reports coming through right now of very recent abductions, beatings and so on of activists or human rights defenders.
translation.xho: “Kukho, njengoko benditshilo, iingxelo ezizayo ngoku zokuxhwilwa kwabantu, ukubethwa njalo njalo kwamatsha ntliziyo okanye abakhuseli bamalungelo abantu.

translation.en: We have not had a chance to verify those and look in detail apart from the two that occurred a few days ago," Colville said.
translation.xho: Asikhange sibenalo ithuba lokuqinisekisa ezo kwaye sijonge ngokweenkcukacha ngaphandle kwezi zimbini zenzekileyo kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo, utshilo uColville.

translation.en: So, it is clearly a very tense situation.
translation.xho: Ngoko, kucacile ukuba yimeko enzima kakhulu.

translation.en: Colville says state authorities have a duty to ensure peoples rights to freedom of expression and to protect the right to peaceful assembly.
translation.xho: UColville uthi abasemagunyeni banoxanduva lokuqinisekisa amalungelo abantu okuthetha ngokukhululekileyo kunye nokukhusela ilungelo lokuhlanganisana ngoxolo.

translation.en: The U.N. human rights office is urging the government to engage in a national dialogue to ensure that civil society in all its guises can carry out its activities without fear of intimidation or reprisals for its work.
translation.xho: I-Ofisi yamalungelo oluntu ye-UN ibongoza urhulumente ukuba abandakanyeke kwingxoxo yelizwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba uluntu kuwo onke amaqhinga alo lukwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yalo ngaphandle koloyiko lokugrogriswa okanye impindezelo ngomsebenzi walo.

translation.en: Despite Oil and Gas Reserves, Africa Feels Pressure of Rising Energy Costs
translation.xho: Ngaphandle  koovimba be-oyile negesi, i-Afrika ifumana uxinzelelo lokunyuka kweendleko zamandla ombane

translation.en: Africans are feeling the pinch caused by soaring global energy prices, say analysts, even in countries like Nigeria and Angola that are major exporters of crude oil.
translation.xho: Abantu baseAfrika baziva becinezelekile ngenxa yokunyuka kwamaxabiso ombane ehlabathini, batsho abahlalutyi, nakumazwe afana neNigeria neAngola angawona athumela ioli ekrwada kwamanye amazwe.

translation.en: While that handful of oil producers is seeing an increase in revenue – especially since the Russian invasion of Ukraine on February 24 – much of the continent lacks refining capability, forcing countries to pay high prices to import gasoline and other petroleum products from Asia and Europe.
translation.xho: Ngelixa elo qela labavelisi be-oyile libona ukunyuka kwengeniso - ingakumbi ukususela ekuhlaseleni kweRussia i-Ukraine ngoFebruwari 24 - ininzi yelizwekazi ayinakho ukucokisa, okunyanzela amazwe ukuba ahlawule amaxabiso aphezulu ukungenisa i-petroli kunye nezinye iimveliso zepetroliyamu ezivela e-Asia naseYurophu.

translation.en: The continent is further affected by increasing costs for natural gas, a key component of nitrogen-based fertilizers used in food production.
translation.xho: Ilizwekazi lichaphazeleka ngakumbi ngokunyuka kweendleko zegesi yendalo, inxalenye ephambili yezichumisi ezisekelwe kwinitrogen ezisetyenziselwa ukuveliswa kokutya.

translation.en: With salaries largely stagnant, more than two-thirds of Africans feel pressured by the rising prices, said Franklin Cudjoe, founding president of the Ghana-based Imani Center for Policy and Education.
translation.xho: Njengoko imivuzo ubukhulu becala imile, ngaphezu kwesibini esithathwini sabantu baseAfrika baziva becinezelekile ngenxa yokunyuka kwamaxabiso, utshilo uFranklin Cudjoe, umongameli owaseka i-Imani Centre for Policy and Education yaseGhana.

translation.en: The continent is affected simply because we depend largely on global oil suppliers, since not many African countries have [their own] oil products, Cudjoe told VOA.
translation.xho: “Ilizwekazi liyachaphazeleka nje kuba sixhomekeke kakhulu kubathengisi be-oyile behlabathi, kuba amazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika engenazo iimveliso ze-oyile,” utshilo uCudjoe.

translation.en: Prices spiked on the global oil market after the invasion of Ukraine triggered a wave of international sanctions against
translation.xho: Amaxabiso onyuke kwimarike yeoli yehlabathi emva kohlaselo lwase-Ukraine olubangele ukohlwaywa kwamazwe ngamazwe

translation.en: Russia, one of the worlds leading exporters of crude.
translation.xho: IRussia, yenye yamazwe ahamba phambili ekuthengiseni izinto ezikrwada kumazwe angaphandle.

translation.en: The price briefly climbed to over $120 per barrel this month before settling down to $103 per barrel on Friday.
translation.xho: Ixabiso linyuke ngokufutshane laya kuthi ga kwi-120 yeedola umphanda kule nyanga ngaphambi kokuba lihle liye kutsho kwi-103 yeedola umphanda ngoLwesihlanu.

translation.en: The surge in energy prices is helping to fuel inflation across Africa.
translation.xho: Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso ombane kungunbangela wokunyuka kwezinga lwamaxabiso kwi-Afrika iphela.

translation.en: In Ghana, for example, overall consumer price inflation was pegged at 15.7% year-on-year in February compared with 13.9% in January, the countrys Statistical Service said last week.
translation.xho: E-Ghana, umzekelo, ukunyuka kwamaxabiso omthengi kuwonke kwakuxhomekeke kwi-15.7% ngonyaka-nonyaka ngoFebruwari xa kuthelekiswa ne-13.9% ngoJanuwari, i-Statistical Service yelizwe yatsho kwiveki ephelileyo.

translation.en: In Zimbabwe, prices are climbing sharply – even overnight.
translation.xho: EZimbabwe, amaxabiso enyuka kakhulu – nangobusuku.

translation.en: At a TM supermarket in the capital of Harare, a crate of 30 eggs cost the $6.70 on Tuesday and about $7.81 on Wednesday.
translation.xho: Kwivenkile enkulu yeTM kwikomkhulu laseHarare, ikhreyithi yamaqanda angama-30 ixabisa i-6.70 yeedola ngoLwesibini kwaye malunga ne-7.81 yeedola ngoLwesithathu.

translation.en: The price of a loaf of bread went from $1.49 to $1.84; for a kilo of beef, the price jumped from $3.35 to $5.22.
translation.xho: Ixabiso lesonka lasuka kwi-1,49 yeedola ukuya kwi-1,84 yeedola; ngekhilogram yenkomo, ixabiso lenyuke ukusuka kwi-3.35 ukuya kwi-5,22 yeedola.

translation.en: Gasoline costs climbed, too. In Harare, the per-liter price climbed from $1.41 to $1.69 from Tuesday to Wednesday.
translation.xho: Amaxabiso epetroli anyukile, nawo. E-Harare, ixabiso le-litha linyuke ukusuka kwi-$ 1.41 ukuya kwi-$ 1.69 ukusuka ngoLwesibini ukuya ngoLwesithathu.

translation.en: The surge in food prices was the biggest driver behind consumer inflation in Egypt, it rose by 8.8% in February – the sharpest increase in nearly three years, according to the state statistics agency, CAPMAS.
translation.xho: Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso okutya kwaba ngoyena mqhubi mkhulu wokunyuka kwamaxabiso e-Egypt, anyuke nge-8.8% ngoFebruwari – okona kunyuka kuphezulu phantse kwiminyaka emithathu, ngokutsho kwe-arhente karhulumente yezibalo, iCAPMAS.

translation.en: Cudjoe said it was crucial for governments and regional bodies such as the African Union to build defenses to cushion consumers in times of economic uncertainty.
translation.xho: UCudjoe uthe kubalulekile ukuba oorhulumente kunye namaqumrhu engingqi anje ngeManyano yase-Afrika bakhe ukhuselo lokukhusela abathengi ngamaxesha okungaqiniseki kwezoqoqosho.

translation.en: Even if it means building defenses in terms of the provision of food, said Cudjoe, adding, "I could imagine Nigeria, if it had had its way, it could be selling foodstuff to most countries at reduced rates by now."
translation.xho: Nokuba oko kuthetha ukwakha ukhuseleko malunga nokubonelela ngokutya, utshilo uCudjoe, esongeza, "Ndiyayicingela iNigeria, ukuba yayinendlela yayo, inokuthengisa ukutya kumazwe amaninzi ngexabiso elithotyiweyo ngoku."

translation.en: There must be that urgency of building for themselves defenses, funds that would make us sustain ourselves -- at least to prevent us from being completely annihilated by these uncertainties in the world.
translation.xho: Kunokuba khukho ukungxamiseka kokuzakhela ukhuseleko ngokunokwabo, iimali ebezinokusenza ukuba sizigcine-- noko ukusithintela ekutshatyalalisweni ngokupheleleyo koku kungaqiniseki emhlabeni.

translation.en: Chibamba Kanyama, an economist in the Zambian capital of Lusaka, said suspending fuel taxes would be "the most ideal thing to do now under the circumstances" to cushion consumers and industries.
translation.xho: UChibamba Kanyama, ingcali yezoqoqosho kwikomkhulu laseZambia eLusaka, uthe ukunqumamisa irhafu yamafutha kuya kuba "yeyona nto ilungileyo ukuyenza ngoku phantsi kwelemeko" ukuxhasa abathengi kunye namashishini.

translation.en: African governments must find a way of responding," he said.
translation.xho: “Oorhulumente baseAfrika kufuneka bafumane indlela yokusabela,” utshilo.

translation.en: It is a choice of whether to reduce taxes to lower the prices or to maintain the price levels and use the revenues to subsidize the most vulnerable in society."
translation.xho: Kufuneka kukhetwe phakathi kuncitshiswa irhafu ukuthoba amaxabiso okanye ukugcina amaxabiso aphantsi kunye nokusebenzisa ingeniso ukuxhasa abona bantu basesichengeni kuluntu."

translation.en: But Kanyama also suggested that the geopolitical crisis involving Russia and Ukraine – both big grain exporters to Africa – may create opportunities for African producers.
translation.xho: Kodwa uKanyama ukwacebise ukuba ingxaki yezelizwe kunye nezopolitiko ebandakanya iRussia ne-Ukraine - omabini amazwe angabathengisi abakhulu bokutya okuziinkozo e-Afrika - ingadala amathuba kubavelisi baseAfrika.

translation.en: Supply countries like South Africa, with robust and highly mechanized systems, may find a window of exporting [commodities]
translation.xho: “Amazwe abonelela ngeenkonzo afana noMzantsi Afrika, aneenkqubo ezomeleleyo noomatshini abaphezulu, anokufumana ifestile yokuthumela ngaphandle [impahla]

translation.en: like wheat and other products to fill the gaps left by Russia and Ukraine," Kanyama said.
translation.xho: njengengqolowa kunye nezinye iimveliso zokuvala izikhewu ezishiywe yiRussia ne-Ukraine," utshilo uKanyama.

translation.en: Kanyama also said support by the international community – for instance, in the form of debt relief for some African nations – is welcome.
translation.xho: UKanyama uphinde wathi inkxaso yoluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe - umzekelo, ngendlela yokunciphisa amatyala kwamanye amazwe aseAfrika - yamkelekile.

translation.en: He noted that the Group of 20 – which encompasses seven industrialized nations, some countries with strong or fast-growing economies, and the European Union – "is trying to offer some debt relief."
translation.xho: Waphawula ukuba iQela lama-20 - eliquka amazwe asixhenxe aphuhlileyo, amanye amazwe anoqoqosho oluqinileyo okanye olukhula ngokukhawuleza, kunye ne-European Union - "izama ukunika isiqabu kwityala."

translation.en: Some other countries, such as Zambia, [are] undergoing debt restructuring processes and an IMF program, and to me, this is the only way out of the crisis," Kanyama added.
translation.xho: Amanye amazwe, afana neZambia, aphantsi kweenkqubo zokuhlengahlengisa amatyala kunye nenkqubo ye-IMF, kwaye kum, le kuphela kwendlela yokuphuma kule ngxaki, wongeze watsho uKanyama.

translation.en: This story originated in VOA's English-to-Africa service, with contributions from the Zimbabwe service.
translation.xho: Eli bali liqale kwinkonzo ye-VOA yesiNgesi ukuya e-Afrika, ngamagalelo aphuma kwinkonzo yaseZimbabwe.

translation.en: WHO Says Africa's COVID Vaccinations Rose by 15% in February
translation.xho: I-WHO ithi ugonyo lwaseAfrika lwe-COVID lwenyuke nge-15% ngoFebruwari

translation.en: The World Health Organization says Africas COVID-19 vaccinations rose by 15% between January and February, as several countries embarked on mass inoculation drives to expand coverage and protect populations from the pandemic.
translation.xho: IWolrd Health Organisation ithi ugonyo lwe-COVID-19 eAfrica lunyuke nge-15% phakathi kukaJanuwari noFebruwari, njengoko amazwe aliqela aye aqalisa ukuqhubela phambili ngokugonywa ukuze andise ukhuseleko kunye nokukhusela abantu kwesisifo sikazwelonke.

translation.en: Zimbabwes government says it is launching a "national vaccination blitz" targeting those who have not yet been vaccinated in a country where resistance to the shots has been an issue since the program started last year.
translation.xho: Urhulumente waseZimbabwe uthi usungula "inational vaccination blitz" elijolise kwabo bangekagonywa kwilizwe apho abantu banokungawethembi amayeza okugonya ukususela oko yaqalayo inkqubo yogonyo kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

translation.en: The drive come amid government concern over rising COVID-19 cases.
translation.xho: Eli phulo liza phakathi kwenkxalabo karhulumente ngokunyuka kwamanani abantu abafunyenwe bene-COVID-19.

translation.en: Dr. Matshidiso Moeti, WHO regional director for Africa, said in a statement that the increase in COVID-19 vaccinations on the continent was driven mainly by campaigns in populous countries, including the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya, and Nigeria.
translation.xho: UGqr. Matshidiso Moeti, ongumlawuli wengingqi ye-Afrika kwo-WHO, uthethe wenjenje kwingxelo, ukwanda kogonyo lwe-COVID-19 kwilizwekazi kuqhutywa ikakhulu ngamaphulo kumazwe anabantu abaninzi, ukuquka iDemocratic Republic of Congo, i-Ethiopia, iKenya kunye neNigeria.

translation.en: Dr. Thierno Balde, the WHO Africa regional COVID-19 incident manager, he says the continent must remain vigilant.
translation.xho: UGqr. Thierno Balde, umphathi we-WHO kwingingqi yaseAfrika kwicandelo le-COVID-19, uthi ilizwekazi kufuneka lihlale liphaphile.

translation.en: We have seen what is happening around, in China, and the risk of also having new imitations, new variants still possible.
translation.xho: Siyibonile into eyenzekayo eChina, kunye nomngcipheko wokuba nohlobo lwesifo olutsha, uhlobo lwalentsholongwane ohlustha lusenokwenzeka.

translation.en: We really need to continue to safeguard our population by taking the vaccine by not relaxing totally.
translation.xho: Ngokwenene kunyanzelekile siqhubeke nokukhusela abantu bethu ngokuthatha inxaxhwba kugonyo ngokungaphumli ngokupheleleyo.

translation.en: The situation might change.
translation.xho: Le meko inokutshintsha.

translation.en: So we really need to continue adapting some of these social measures and also to get vaccination," Balde said.
translation.xho: Ke kunyanzelekile ukuba siqhubeke sihlengahlengisa amanye ala manyathelo asekuhlaleni kwaye sifumane ugonyo, utshilo uBalde.

translation.en: The WHO said to boost African COVID-19 vaccine acceptance, it and other organizations were supporting mass vaccination drives in at least 10 priority countries to reach 100 million people by the end of next month.
translation.xho: I-WHO ithe ukonyusa ukwamkelwa kwesitofu sokugonya i-COVID-19 eAfrica, yona kunye neminye imibutho ixhasa ugonyo lwesininzi kumazwe ali-10 aphambili ukufikelela kubantu abazizigidi ezili-100 ekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.

translation.en: Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, Zimbabwes acting information minister, said his country would not be left behind.
translation.xho: UNqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, umphathiswa wezolwazi obambeleyo waseZimbabwe, uthe ilizwe lakhe alizukushiywa ngasemva.

translation.en: Regarding the vaccination program, as of 15 March, 2022, a total of 159,628 third doses have been administered to date.
translation.xho: Ngokuphathelele kwinkqubo yogonyo, ukusukela nge-15 kaMatshi, 2022, xa kubalwa i-159,628 yezigonyo zesithathu sele zikhutshiwe ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.

translation.en: The national vaccination blitz campaign will kick off on Monday, 21 March, 2022, and [the] government is urging those that have not yet been vaccinated to take advantage of this exercise to do so," Ndlovu said.
translation.xho: Iphulo leNational vaccination blitz liza kuqala ngoMvulo, umhla we21 kaMatshi, ngo-2022, kwaye urhulumente ubongoza abo bangekagonywa ukuba basebenzise eli thuba ukwenza oko,” utshilo uNdlovu.

translation.en: A number of Zimbabweans have refused vaccination, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines.
translation.xho: Uninzi lwabantu baseZimbabwe abalufuni ugonyo, besithi abaluthembi izitofu zogonyo ekunikelwe ngazo zohlobo lweSinopharm kunye neSinovac eyenziwe eChina.

translation.en: The country has lately recorded a rise in new infections – now cumulatively at 244,012 with 5,418 deaths, according to the Johns Hopkins University, which is tracking the global outbreak.
translation.xho: Ilizwe kutsha nje lirekhode ukonyuka kohlobo olutsha lwesifo - ngoku lunyuke lwafika ku-244,012 kunye nabaswelekiyeyo abayi-5,418, ngokutsho kweYunivesithi yaseJohns Hopkins, elandelela esisifo sihlasele ihlabathi lonke.

translation.en: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributes that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns.
translation.xho: UGqr. Cleophas Chimbetete, umongameli weZimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, uthi loo nto ibangelwa kukushenxiswa kwamva nje kwemiqathango ethintelayo, enje ngokulwa kwezinto.

translation.en: He says, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.
translation.xho: Uthi, nangona kunjalo, ayiloxesha lokoyika, lixehsa lokunyanzelisa imigaqo ye-WHO, efana nokufihla ubuso kunye nokuncitshiswa kwentlalo.

translation.en: After relaxing measures, it is expected that cases will slightly go up.
translation.xho: “Emva kokuba kuncitshiswe lemithetho, kulindeleke ukuba amanani abantu abanesisifu anyuke kancinci.

translation.en: But I also think that it is too early to make any meaningful conclusions, I think it is just an opportunity for us to strengthen our preventative measures and continue highlighting to the rest of the population that COVID is still with us.
translation.xho: Kodwa ndicinga ukuba kusekutsha kakhulu ukuba senze naziphi na izigqibo ezinentsingiselo, ndicinga ukuba lithuba nje lethu lokuba someleze amanyathelo ethu okuthintela kwaye siqhubeke nokungxininisa kuluntu ukuba i-COVID iseyinto ekhoyo.

translation.en: The good news, though, is that severe cases have not gone up.
translation.xho: Noko ke, iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba imeko zabagula ngamandla azikho phezulu.

translation.en: What we need to do is to continue to get vaccinated and what is important is that the government should – as it is doing – is monitor these numbers.
translation.xho: Into ekunyazeleke ukuba siyenzile kukuqhubeka nokugonywa kwaye okubalulekileyo kukuba urhulumente enze – njengoko esenza – abeke iliso kula manani.

translation.en: There is no cause for alarm or cause for us to introduce new measures," Chimbetete said.
translation.xho: Akukho sizathu soloyiko okanye isizathu sokuba senze amanyathelo amatsha, ”utshilo uChimbetete.

translation.en: Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance.
translation.xho: Ilizwe laseZimbabwe belijolise ekugonyeni abantu abazizigidi ezilishumi ubuncinci ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo, inani abathi bekunzima ukufikelela kulo ngenxa yokunqongophala kwezixhobo kunye nokuthandabuza koluntu.

translation.en: It has yet to announce when it plans to achieve herd immunity.
translation.xho: Kusafuneka ibhengeze ukuba iceba ukufezekisa ukugonyeka kwabantu abaninzi.

translation.en: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
translation.xho: IFinland ithweswe isithsaba sokuba lelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwiminyaka emihlanu elandelelanayo.

translation.en: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
translation.xho: IFinland ibizwe njengelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwihlabathi kunyaka wesihlanu uqhuba, kwisalathiso sonyaka esixhaswe yi-UN ephinde yabeka i-Afghanistan njengelona lizwe lingonwabanga, ilandelwa ngokusondeleyo yiLebhanon.

translation.en: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing.
translation.xho: ISerbia, iBulgaria kunye neRomania zirekhode ezona zinyuso zinkulu kwimpilontle.

translation.en: The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
translation.xho: Ukuwa okukhulu kwi World Hapiness Table, ekhutshwe ngoLwesihlanu, yeza eLebhanon, eVenezuela nase-Afghanistan.

translation.en: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
translation.xho: ILebhanon, ejongene nokudodobala kwezoqoqosho, yawela kwindawo yesibini ukusuka ekugqibeleni kwisalathiso samazwe ali-146, ngezantsi nje kweZimbabwe.

translation.en: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.
translation.xho: I-Afghanistan ehlaselwe yimfazwe, esele isezantsi etafileni, ibone ingxaki yobuntu isiba nzulu ukusukela oko iTaliban yathatha isihlalo sokuphatha kwakhona ngo-Agasti ophelileyo.

translation.en: U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
translation.xho: I-arhente yeZizwe eziManyeneyo iUNICEF iqikelela ukuba abantwana abasisigidi abangaphantsi kweminyaka emihlanu banokubulawa yindlala kobu busika ukuba abancediswa.

translation.en: This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims," co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said.
translation.xho: Esi (isalathiso) sibonisa isikhumbuzo esicacileyo sezinto ezibonakalayo kunye nomonakalo ongabonakaliyo owenziwa yimfazwe kumaxhoba ayo amaninzi, utsho umbhali uJan-Emmanuel De Neve.

translation.en: The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
translation.xho: IWorld Hapiness Report, ngoku kunyaka wayo we-10, isekelwe kuvavanyo lwabantu lolonwabo lwabo, kunye neenkcukacha zezoqoqosho nezentlalo.

translation.en: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period.
translation.xho: Inika amanqaku olonwabo kwisikali ukusuka kwiqanda ukuya kwi-10, ngokusekwe kumndilili wedatha kwisithuba seminyaka emithathu.

translation.en: This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
translation.xho: Olu shicilelo lwamva lwenziwa phambi kokuba iRussia ihlasele iUkraine.

translation.en: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch.
translation.xho: Abantu baseMntla baseYurophu baphinde balawula iindawo eziphezulu - iDanes yikwindawo yesibini emva kweFinns, ilandelwa yi-Icelandic, iSwiss kunye neDutch.

translation.en: The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
translation.xho: I-United States inyuke iindawo ezintathu ukuya kwi-16, enye ngaphambi kweBritain, ngelixa iFrance inyuke yaya kwindawo yama-20, indawo yayo ephezulu okwangoku.

translation.en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
translation.xho: Kunye nokuba sempilweni entle, esekwe kuvoto lweGallup kwilizwe ngalinye, amanqaku olonwabo athathela ingqalelo iGDP, inkxaso yezentlalo, inkululeko yomntu kunye nenqanaba lorhwaphilizo.

translation.en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.xho: Kulo nyaka ababhali basebenzise ulwazi oluvela kwimithombo yeendaba zentlalo ukuthelekisa iimvakalelo zabantu ngaphambi nasemva kwesifo sikazwelonke i-Covid-19.

translation.en: They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
translation.xho: Bafumene "ukwanda okunamandla kwixhala kunye nokungonwabii" kumazwe ali-18 kodwa ukwehla kweemvakalelo zomsindo.

translation.en: The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing," report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
translation.xho: Imfundiso yengxelo yeWorld Hapiness Report  kwiminyaka edlulileyo kukuba inkxaso yentlalontle, isisa komnye nomnye kunye nokunyaniseka kukarhulumente kubalulekile kwintlalo-ntle, utshilo umbhali uJeffrey Sachs.

translation.en: World leaders should take heed."
translation.xho: Iinkokheli zehlabathi kufuneka zithathele ingqalelo.

translation.en: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.
translation.xho: Ingxelo yaba nokuthandabuzeka emva kokuba ibeke iFinland phezulu kuluhlu lwayo ngo-2018.

translation.en: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
translation.xho: Uninzi lwabantu belizwe laseNordic lizizigidi ezi-5.5 zabantu bazichaza njengabantu abapholileyo kwaye bathanda ukuba nosizi, kwaye bavume ukuba bajonga imiboniso yoluntu yolonwabo ngeliso lokukrokra.

translation.en: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
translation.xho: Kodwa ilizwe elinamahlathi namachibi amakhulu likwadume ngeenkonzo zalo zoluntu ezisebenza kakuhle, iisaunas ezifumaneka kuyo yonke indawo, ukuthembela ngokubanzi kwabasemagunyeni namanqanaba aphantsi olwaphulo-mthetho nokungalingani.
